GV02pncvbr1u:335_2: tat kṣatrāya ca viśam anugāṃ karoti kṣatrasyevāsya prakāśo bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:337: astomā vā ete yac chandogā ayujo hi stomā yugmanti chandāṃsi yad eṣā yujinī catuścatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutis tenāstomāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:338: (PB 3.9.4) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā catuścatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhait ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:340_0: caturdaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa ekayā pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:340_1: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekādaśabhiḥ sa ekayā
GV02pncvbr1u:342: astīva vā ayaṃ loko 'stīvāsau chidram ivedam antarikṣaṃ yad eṣā nirmadhyā bhavatīmān eva lokān anu prajāyate pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:344: pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ sa ekayā pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ caturdaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:347_0: yājyānāṃ sā hotur yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya yokthānāṃ sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsino
GV02pncvbr1u:347_1: yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ sahotur yokthānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya yājyānāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:347_2: sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsino yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya yokthānāṃ sā hotur yājyānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya
GV02pncvbr1u:347_3: yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsino yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya sarvā ājyeṣu sarvāḥ pṛṣtheṣu sarvā uktheṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:349: paśavo vai samīṣantī yad eṣā sarvāṇi savanāny anusaṃcaraty anusavanam evainaṃ paśubhiḥ samardhayati paśuman bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:351: ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvadaśabhiḥ sa ekayā ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvādaśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa dvādaśabhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:353: anto vā aṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ paśavaś chandogā yat ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ-ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti ṣoḍaśakalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:355_0: dvādaśabhir vihitaikā paricarā dvādaśamāsās saṃvvatsaro yajamānaḥ paricarā yad dvādaśabhir
GV02pncvbr1u:355_1: vidadhāty ekā paricarā bhavati yajamānam eva tad antatas saṃvvatsare paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayaty
GV02pncvbr1u:355_2: eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitāṣṭācatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:357_0: ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa
GV02pncvbr1u:357_1: tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa
GV02pncvbr1u:359: anto vā aṣṭācatvāriṃśo yathā mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ sṛptvā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmaty evam etan nedīyaḥsaṃkramayā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:361_0: daśabhir vihitā tisraḥ paricarā daśākṣarā virāḍ etāvān puruṣo yad ātmā prajā jāyā
GV02pncvbr1u:361_1: yad daśabhir vidadhātt tisraḥ paricarā bhavanti yajamānam eva tad virājy annādye
GV02pncvbr1u:361_2: 'ntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayaty annādo bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:363: gāvo vā etat sattram āsata tāsāṃ daśasu māssu śṛṅgaṇy ajāyanta tā abruvannarāḥ smottiṣṭhāmopaśā no 'jñateti tā udatiṣṭhan
GV02pncvbr1u:365_0: tāsāṃ tv evābruvann āsāmahā evemau dvādaśau māsau saṃsaṃvvatsaram āpayāmeti tāsāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:365_1: dvādaśasu māḥsu śṛṅgāṇi prāvartanta tāḥ sarvam annādyam āpnuvaṃs tā etās tūparās
GV02pncvbr1u:365_2: tasmāt tāḥ sarvān dvādaśamāsaḥ prerate sarvaṃ hi tā annādyam āpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:366: (PB 4.1.3) sarvam annādyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:368: prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa etam atirātram apaśyat tam āharat tenāhorātre prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:370: yad eṣo 'tirātro bhavaty ahorātre eva prajanayanty ahorātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhanty etāvān vāva saṃvvatsaro yad ahas ca rātriś cāhorātrābhyām eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:372: yaj jyotiṣṭomo bhavati yajñamukhaṃ tad ṛdhnuvanti yad uktho yajñakrator anantarayāya yad rātriḥ sarvasyāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:374: sa etān stomān apaśyat jyotir gaur aur itīme vai lokā ete stomā ayam eva jyotir ayaṃ madhyamo gaur asāv uttama āyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:375: (PB 4.1.8) yad ete stomā bhavantīmān eva lokān prajanayanty eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:376: (PB 4.1.9) sa etaṃ tryahaṃ punaḥ prāyauṅkta tena ṣaḍahena ṣaṭkratūn prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:377: (PB 4.1.10) yad eṣa ṣaḍaho bhavati ṛtūn eva prajanayanti ṛtuṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:378: (PB 4.1.11) sa etaṃ ṣaḍahaṃ punaḥ prāyuṅkta tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ ṣaḍahābhyāṃ dvādaśamasaḥ prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:379: (PB 4.1.12) yad etau ṣaḍahau bhavato māsān eva prajanayanti māseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:381: sa etau dvau ṣaḍahau punaḥ prayuṅkta taiś caturbhiḥ ṣaḍahaiś caturviṃśatim ardhamāsān prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:382: (PB 4.1.14) yad ete catvāraḥ ṣaḍahā bhavanty ardhamāsān eva prajanayanty ardhamāseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:383: (PB 4.1.15) sa idaṃ bhuvanaṃ prajanayitva pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍahena vīryam ātmany adhatta
GV02pncvbr1u:384: (PB 4.1.16) yad eṣaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati vīrya evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:386: tena māsān saṃvvatsaraṃ prājanayad yad eṣa māso bhavati saṃvvatsaram eva prajanayanti saṃvvatsare pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:388: (PB 4.2.2) prāyaṇīyena vā ahnā devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ prāyan yat prāyaṃs tat prāyaṇīyasya prāyaṇīyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:390: tasmāt prāyaṇīyasyāhna ṛtvijā bhavitavyam etad dhi svargasya lokasya nediṣṭhaṃ ya etasyartviṅ na bhavati hīyate svargāl lokāt
GV02pncvbr1u:393: caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam ārabhya prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:394: (PB 4.2.6) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati caturviṃśo vai saṃvvatsaraḥ sākṣād eva saṃvvatsaram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:396: yāvatyaś caturviṃśasyokthasya stotrīyās tāvatyaḥ saṃvvatsarasya rātrayaḥ stotrīyābhir eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:398: pañcadaśastotrāṇi bhavanti pañcadaśārdhamāsasya rātrayo 'rdhamāsaśa eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:399: (PB 4.2.9) pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśaśastrāṇi samāso māsaśa eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:401_0: tad āhur īrma iva vā eṣā hotrā yad acchāvākyā yad acchāvākam anusaṃtiṣṭhata īśvarermā
GV02pncvbr1u:401_1: bhavitor iti yady ukthaṃ smātraikakubhañcodvaṃśīyañcāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpye vīryaṃ vā
GV02pncvbr1u:403: atho khalv āhur agniṣṭomam eva kāryam eṣa vai yajñaḥ svargyo yad agniṣṭoma ūrdhvo hi hotāram anusaṃtiṣṭhate
GV02pncvbr1u:405_0: dvādaśastotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvvatsaras tena saṃvvatsarasaṃmito dvādaśa
GV02pncvbr1u:405_1: stotraṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaras
GV02pncvbr1u:406: (PB 4.2.13) atho khalv āhur uktham eva kāryam ahnaḥ samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:407: (PB 4.2.14) sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kriyante sarvaṃ hy etāhnāpyate
GV02pncvbr1u:408: (PB 4.2.15) pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasrapājasa iti sahasravatī pratipat kāryā
GV02pncvbr1u:409: (PB 4.2.16) saṃvvatsarasya rūpaṃ sarvan evainān etayā punāti sarvān abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:411: atho khalv āhuḥ pavasva vāco agriya ity eva kāryā mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yad vāco 'graṃ mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:413: mithunam iva vā eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ pavasveti puṃso rūpaṃ vāca iti striyāḥ someti puṃso rūpaṃ citrābhir iti striyā mithunam evaibhyo yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:415: agne yuṅkṣvā hi ye taveti jarābodhīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryaṃ yuktenaiva saṃvvatsareṇa prayanti caturviṃśatyakṣarāsu bhavati caturviṃśasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:416: (PB 4.2.20) atho khalv āhur yajñāyajñīyam eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:417: (PB 4.2.21) panthā vai yajñāyajñīyaṃ patha eva tan na yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:420: abhīvartena vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati svargasya lokasyābhivṛttyai
GV02pncvbr1u:421: (PB 4.3.3) ekākṣaraṇidhano bhavaty ekākṣarā vai vāg vācaiva tad ārabhya svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:424: sāma vai asau loka ṛg ayaṃ yad itaḥ sāmnā yanti svargaṃ lokam ārabhya yanti yad ṛcā punar āyanty asmin loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:425: (PB 4.3.6) yat sāmāvasṛjeyur ava svargāl lokāt padyeran yad ṛcam anusṛjeyur naśyeyur asmāl lokāt
GV02pncvbr1u:426: (PB 4.3.7) samānaṃ sāma bhavaty anyo-'nyaḥ pragātho 'nyad-anyad dhi citram adhvānam avagacchann eti
GV02pncvbr1u:428_0: vṛṣā vā eṣa retodhā yad abhīvartaḥ pragātheṣu reto dadhad eti yad itaḥ samānaṃ sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:428_1: bhavaty anyo-'nyaḥ pragātho reta eva tad dadhati yat parastāt samānaḥ pragātho bhavaty
GV02pncvbr1u:428_2: anyad-anyat sāma reta eva tad dhitaṃ prajanayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:429: (PB 4.3.9) sāmnetaḥ pragāthāṃ dugdhe pragāthena parastāt sāmāni dugdhe salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:431: yo vā adhvānaṃ punar nivartayanti nainaṃ te gacchanti ye 'punar nivartaṃ yanti te gacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:432: (PB 4.3.11) ya āstutaṃ kurvate yathā dugdhām upasīded evaṃ tat
GV02pncvbr1u:433: (PB 4.3.12) ye nāstutaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam abhyaśnuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:435: brahmavādino vadanti yātayāmāḥ saṃvvatsarā3 ayātayāmā3 iti te nāyātayāmeti vaktavyaṃ punar anyāni stotrāṇi nivartanta ūrdhvam eva brahmasāmaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:438: (PB 4.4.3) tisra uṣṇihaḥ syur ekā gāyatrī tās tisro bṛhatyo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:439: (PB 4.4.4) tad āhuḥ saṃśara iva vā eṣa cchandasāṃ yad dve chandasī saṃyuñjantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:441: (PB 4.4.6) paśavo vai caturuttarāṇi cchandasāṃsi paśubhir eva tat svargaṃ lokam ākramam ānayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:443: ekaṃ gāyatrīm ekāham upeyur ekāmuṣṇiham ekāham ekām anuṣṭubham ekāhaṃ bṛhatyā pañcamāsa iyuḥ paṅktim ekāham upeyus triṣṭubhā ṣaṣṭhaṃ māsam īyuḥ śvo viṣuvān bhaviteti jagatīm upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:444: (PB 4.4.8) tad āhur anavakḷptāni vā etāni cchandāṃsi madhyandine bṛhatyā caiva triṣṭubhā caitavyam
GV02pncvbr1u:445: (PB 4.4.9) ete vai chandasī vīryavatī ete pratyakṣaṃ madhyandinasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:447_0: rathantare 'hani bṛhatī kāryaitad vai rathantarasya svam āyatanaṃ yad bṛhatī sva
GV02pncvbr1u:447_1: eva tad āyatane rathantaraṃ pratitiṣṭhati bārhate 'hani triṣṭup kāryaitad vai bṛhataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:447_2: svam āyatanaṃ yat triṣṭup sva eva tad āyatane bṛhadrathantare pratitiṣṭhantī itaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:449_0: trayastriṃśatā pragāthair etavyaṃ trayastriṃśad devatā devatāsv eva pratitiṣṭhanto
GV02pncvbr1u:449_1: yanti caturviṃśatyaitavyaṃ caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsara eva
GV02pncvbr1u:449_2: pratitiṣṭhanto yanti dvādaśabhir etavyaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsara eva
GV02pncvbr1u:449_3: pratitiṣṭhanto yanti ṣaḍbhir etavyaṃ ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanto yanti caturbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:449_4: etavyaṃ catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanto yanti tribhir etavyaṃ traya
GV02pncvbr1u:449_5: ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanto yanti dvābhyām etavyaṃ dvipād yajamānaḥ svargasya
GV02pncvbr1u:449_6: lokasyākrāntyā anyenānyena hi padā puruṣaḥ pratitiṣṭhann eti
GV02pncvbr1u:452: svarbhānur vā āsur ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat taṃ devāḥ svarair aspṛṇvan yat svarasāmāno bhavanty ādityasya spṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:453: (PB 4.5.3) parair vai devā ādityaṃ svargaṃ lokam apārayan yad aparayaṃs tat parāṇāṃ paratvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:454: (PB 4.5.4) pārayanty enaṃ parāṇi ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:457: (PB 4.5.7) anuṣṭup chandaso bhavanty ānuṣṭubho vai prajāpatiḥ sākṣād eva prajāpatim ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:460: devā vā ādityasya svargāl lokād avapādād abibhayus tam etaiḥ stomaiḥ saptadaśair adṛṃhan yad ete stomābhavanty ādityasya dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:461: (PB 4.5.10) catustriṃśā bhavanti varṣma vai catustriṃśo varṣmaṇaivainaṃ saṃmimate
GV02pncvbr1u:463: tasya parācīnātipādād abibhayus taṃ sarvaiḥ stomaiḥ +paryārṣan viśvajidabhijidbhyāṃ vīryaṃ vā etau stomau vīryeṇaiva tad ādityaṃ paryuṣanti dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:466: tad āhuḥ kartapraskanda iva vā eṣa yat trayastriṃśata+ḥ saptadaśam upayantīti pṛṣṭhyo 'ntaraḥ kāryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:467: (PB 4.5.14) tasya yat saptadaśam ahas tad uttamaṃ kāryaṃ salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:469: tad āhur udaraṃ vā eṣa stomānāṃ yat saptadaśo yat saptadaśaṃ madhyato nirhareyur aśanāyavaḥ prajāḥ syur aśanāyavaḥ sattriṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:471: trayastriṃśād eva saptadaśa upetyo varṣma vai trayastriṃśo varṣma saptadaśo varṣmaṇa eva tad varṣmābhisaṃkrāmanti
GV02pncvbr1u:472: (PB 4.5.17) nānāhur ukthāḥ kāryā3 iti yady ukthāḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:473: (PB 4.5.18) paśavo vā ukthāni śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntenaiva tad viṣuvantam upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:475: tad āhur vivīvadham iva vā etad yad agniṣṭomo viṣuvān agniṣṭomau viśvajidabhijitāv athetara ukthāḥ syur iti
GV02pncvbr1u:478: vīryaṃ vā agniṣṭomo vīrya eva madhyataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti nava saṃstutā bhavanti nava prāṇāḥ praṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:480: (PB 4.6.2) devaloko vā eṣa yad viṣuvān devaokam eva tad abhyārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:481: (PB 4.6.3) ekaviṃśo bhavaty ekaviṃśo vā asya bhuvanasyāditya ādityalokam eva tad abhyārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:482: (PB 4.6.4) dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:484: (PB 4.6.6) vāyo śukro ayāmi ta iti śukravatī pratipad bhavaty ādityasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:485: (PB 4.6.7) vāyur vā etaṃ devatānām ānaśe 'nuṣṭup chandasaṃ yad ato 'nyā pratipat syāt pradahet
GV02pncvbr1u:487: yanti vā ete prāṇādityāhur ye gāyatryāḥ pratipado yantīti yad vayavyā bhavanti tena prāṇān na yanti prāṇo hi vāyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:488: (PB 4.6.9) atho śamayanty evainam etayā śantir hi vāyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:489: (PB 4.6.10) ā yāhi somapītaya iti saumī pāvamānī
GV02pncvbr1u:490: (PB 4.6.11) niyutvatī bhavati paśavo vai niyutaḥ śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntenaiva tad ādityam upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:493_0: svarbhānur vā āsur ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat tasya devā divākīrtyais tamo 'pāghnan yad
GV02pncvbr1u:493_1: divākīrtyāni bhavanti tama evāsmād apaghnanti raśmayo vā eta ādityasya yad divākīrtyāni
GV02pncvbr1u:493_2: raśmibhir eva tad ādityaṃ sākṣād ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:494: (PB 4.6.14) bhrājābhrāje pavamānamukhe bhavato mukhata evāsya tābhyāṃ tamo 'paghnanti
GV02pncvbr1u:496: mahādivākīrtyaṃ ca vikarṇaṃ ca madhyato bhavato madhyata evāsya tābhyāṃ tamo 'paghnanti bhāsam antato bhavati patta evāsya tena tamo 'paghnanti
GV02pncvbr1u:497: (PB 4.6.16) daśastobhaṃ bhavti daśākṣarā virāḍ virājy eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:499: yat tv ity āhuḥ ṣaḍbhir ito māsair adhvānaṃ yanti ṣaḍbhiḥ punar āyanti kva tarhi svargo loko yasya kāmāya sattram āsata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:500: (PB 4.6.18) mūrdhānaṃ diva iti svargaṃ lokam ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:501: (PB 4.6.19) aratiṃ pṛthivyā ity asmiṃ loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:502: (PB 4.6.20) vaiśvānaram ṛta ājātam agnim iti viṣuvata eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:503: (PB 4.6.21) kaviṃ samrājam atitihiṃ janānām ity annādyam evopayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:504: (PB 4.6.22) āsan nāpātraṃ janayanta devā iti jāyanta eva
GV02pncvbr1u:506: tat triṣṭub jagatīṣu bhavati traiṣṭubhjāgato vā ādityo yad ato 'nyāsu syād ava svargāl lokāt padyeran
GV02pncvbr1u:507: (PB 4.6.24) samrāḍvatīṣu bhavati sāmrājyaṃ vai svargo lokaḥ svarga eva loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:509_0: ātmā vā eṣa saṃvvatsarasya yad viṣuvān pakṣāv etāv abhito bhavato yena ceto 'bhīvartena
GV02pncvbr1u:509_1: yanti yaś ca parasmāt pragātho bhavati tāv ubhau viṣuvati kāryau pakṣāv eva tad yajñasyātman
GV02pncvbr1u:510: (PB 4.7.2) indra kratuṃ na ābhareti pragātho bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:512: vasiṣṭho vā etaṃ putrahato 'paśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad eṣa pragātho bhavati prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:513: (PB 4.7.4) jīvā jyotir aśīmahīti ye vai svasti saṃvvatsaraṃ saṃtaranti te jīvā jyotir aśnuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:515: māno ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso 'vakramur iti ye vai stenā ripavas te durādhyas tān eva tad atikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:517: tvayā vyayaṃ pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāma so 'tisaṃvvatsaro vai pravataḥ śaśvatīr apas tam eva tat taranti
GV02pncvbr1u:519: adyādyāśvaḥ śvas tvām idā hyo naro vayam enam idā hya iti saṃtanayaḥ pragāthā bhavanti teṣām ekaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāya śvastanam evābhisaṃtanvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:520: (PB 4.7.8) atho khalv āhur indra kratuṃ na ābharety eva kāryaṃ samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:523: yathā vā ito vṛkṣaṃ rohanty evam enaṃ pratyavarohanti svargam eva lokaṃ rūḍhvāsmiṃl loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:526: (PB 4.8.3) ūnātiriktau bhavata ūnātiriktaṃ vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:527: (PB 4.8.4) vairājau bhavato 'nnaṃ virāḍ annādya eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:529: (PB 4.8.6) virāḍ vā eṣā samṛddhā yad daśāhāni virājy eva samṛddhāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:531_0: pṛṣthāni bhavanti vīryaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrya eva pratitiṣṭhanti cchandomā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:531_1: paśavo vai cchandomāḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanty athaitad daśamam ahar āptastomam
GV02pncvbr1u:532: (PB 4.8.8) yad adhyāhur ati tad recayanti tasmān na vyucyam
GV02pncvbr1u:534: parokṣam anuṣṭubham upayanti prajāpatir vā anuṣṭub yat pratyakṣam upeyuḥ prajāpatim ṛccheyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:536: yo vai sattrasya sad veda sad bhavati vāmadevyaṃ vai sāmnāṃ sad agnir devatānāṃ virāṭ chandasāṃ trayastriṃśaḥ stomānāṃ tāny eva tad ekadhā saṃbhṛtyottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:537: (PB 4.8.11) brahmavādino vadanti yataḥ sattrād udasthātā3sthitā3d iti
GV02pncvbr1u:539_0: ye rathantareṇa stutvottiṣṭhanti te yata uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyād apratiṣṭhānā bhaviṣyantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:539_1: ye bṛhatā stutyottiṣṭhanti te sthitād uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyāt sthāyukaiṣāṃ śrīr bhaviṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:541: ye vāmadevyena stutvottiṣṭhanti te sataḥ sad abhyuttiṣṭhanti pūrṇāt pūrṇam āyatanād āyatanam antarikṣāyatanā hi prajā
GV02pncvbr1u:544: prājāpatyaṃ vai vāmadevyaṃ prajāpatāv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti paśavo vai vāmadevyaṃ paśuṣv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:545: (PB 4.9.1) patnīḥ saṃyājya prāñca udetyāyaṃ sahasramānava ity aticchandasāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:546: (PB 4.9.2) ime vai lokā aticchandā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:547: (PB 4.9.3) gor iti nidhanaṃ bhavati virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad gaur virājy eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:549: (PB 4.9.5) arbudaḥ sarpa etābhir mṛtāṃ tvacam apāhata mṛtām evaitābhirs tvacam apaghnate
GV02pncvbr1u:550: (PB 4.9.6) iyaṃ vai sārparājñy asyām eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:551: (PB 4.9.7) tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti traya ime lokā eṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:554: manasā hiṅ karoti manasā prastauti manasodgāyati manasā pratiharati manasā nidhanam upayanty asamāptasya samāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:555: (PB 4.9.10) yad vai vācā na samāpnuvanti manasā tat samāpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:558: (PB 4.9.13) caturhotāraṃ hotā vyācaṣṭe stutam eva tad anuśaṃsati nahi tat stutaṃ yad ananuśastam
GV02pncvbr1u:559: (PB 4.9.14) prajāpatiṃ parivadanty āptvevainaṃ tad vyācakṣate tāvad āpāmainam iti
GV02pncvbr1u:560: (PB 4.9.15) gṛhapatir audumbarīṃ dhārayati gṛhapatir vā ūrjo yantorjam evaibhyo yacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:562: (PB 4.9.17) dugdhānīva vai tarhi chandasāṃsi yātayāmāny antargatāni tāny eva tad rasenāpyāyayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:565: (PB 4.9.20) yadā vai puruṣa ātmano 'vadyati yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:567: dvābhyāṃ lomāvadyati dvābhyāṃ tvacaṃ dvābhyāṃ māṃsaṃ dvābhyām asthi dvābhyāṃ majjānaṃ dvābhyāṃ pīvaś ca lohitaṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:568: (PB 4.9.22) śikhā anupravapante pāpmānam eva tad apaghnate laghīyāṃsaḥ svargaṃ lokam ayāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:571_0: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata so 'ricyata so 'padyata taṃ devā abhisamagacchanta te 'bruvan
GV02pncvbr1u:571_1: mahad asmai vrataṃ saṃbharāma yad imaṃ dhinavad iti tasmai yat saṃvvatsaram annaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:571_2: pacyate tat samabharaṃs tad asmai prāyacchaṃs tad avrajayat tad enam adhinon mahan
GV02pncvbr1u:571_3: maryā vrataṃ yad imam adhinvīd iti tan mahāvratasya mahāvratatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:572: (PB 4.10.2) prajāpatir vāva mahāṃs tasyaitad vratam annam eva
GV02pncvbr1u:573: (PB 4.10.3) tad āhur madhyaḥ saṃvvatsarasyopetyaṃ madhyato vā annaṃ jagdhaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:575: tad v āhur yan madhyata upayanty ardham annādyasyāpnuvanty ardhaṃ sambaṭ kurvantīty upariṣṭād eva saṃvvatsarasyopetyaṃ saṃvvatsare vā annaṃ sarvaṃ pacyate
GV02pncvbr1u:576: (PB 4.10.5) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati caturviṃśo vai saṃvvatsaro 'nnaṃ pañcaviṃśam
GV02pncvbr1u:577: (PB 4.10.6) yad vā adaś caturviṃśaṃprāyaṇīyaṃ tad etad udayanīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:578: (PB 4.10.7) yat saṃvvatsaram annaṃ saṃbharanti saiṣā pañcaviṃśy upajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:581: (PB 5.1.3) trivṛd dhy eva śiro loma tvag asthi
GV02pncvbr1u:582: (PB 5.1.4) pāṅkta itara ātmā loma tvaṅ māṃsam asthi majjā
GV02pncvbr1u:584: (PB 5.1.6) tasmāc chiro 'ṅgāni medyanti nānumedyati na kṛśyanty anukṛśyati
GV02pncvbr1u:585: (PB 5.1.7) punar abhyāvartam itareṇātmanā stuvate tasmād itara ātmā medyati ca kṛśyati ca
GV02pncvbr1u:588: annaṃ vā arko brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatry annādyaṃ caivaibhyo brahmavarcasaṃ ca mukhato dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:590: pañcadaśasaptadaśau pakṣau bhavataḥ prakṣābhyāṃ vai yajamāno vayo bhūtvā svargaṃ lokam eti
GV02pncvbr1u:591: (PB 5.1.11) tāv āhuḥ samau kāryau pañcadaśau vā saptadaśau vā savīvadhatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:593: tad v āhur yat samau bhavata ekavīryau tarhi bhavata iti pañcadaśasaptadaśāv eva kāryau sācīva vai vayaḥ pakṣau kṛtvāpatīyaḥ patati
GV02pncvbr1u:594: (PB 5.1.13) dakṣiṇato bṛhat kāryaṃ dakṣiṇo vā ardha ātmano vīryavattaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:596: atho khalv āhur uttarata eva kāryaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsino 'rdhāt traiṣṭubhaṃ vai bṛhat traiṣṭubho vai brāhmaṇācchaṃsī traiṣṭubhaḥ pañcadaśastomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:598: dakṣiṇato rathantaraṃ kāryaṃ maitrāvaruṇasyārdhād gāyatraṃ vai rathantaraṃ gāyatro maitrāvaruṇo gāyatraḥ saptadaśastomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:601: ekaviṃśo vai stomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā tasmād vayaḥ pucchena pratiṣṭhāyotpatati pucchena pratiṣṭhāya niṣīdati
GV02pncvbr1u:602: (PB 5.1.18) yajñāyajñīyaṃ pucchaṃ kāryaṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ hy eva mahāvratasya puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:603: (PB 5.1.19) atho khalv āhur atiśayaṃ vai dvipadāṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ bhadram kāryaṃ samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:605: vāmadevyaṃ mahāvrataṃ kāryaṃ tasya gāyatraṃ śiro bṛhadrathantare pakṣau yajñāyajñīyaṃ puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:606: (PB 5.2.2) yo vai mahāvrate sahasraṃ protaṃ veda pra sahasraṃ paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:608_0: tasya prācī dik śiras tac chandobhiḥ sahasram asāv anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ sanakṣattraiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:608_1: sāhasro 'yam anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ sa oṣadhibhiś ca vanaspatibhiś ca sāhasro 'ntarikṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:608_2: ātmā tad vayobhiḥ sāhasraṃ pratīcī dik pucchaṃ tad agnibhiś ca raśmibhiś ca sāhasraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:608_3: pra sasasraṃ paśūn āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:609: (PB 5.2.4) tad āhur apṛṣṭhaṃ vai vāmadevyam anidhanaṃ hīti
GV02pncvbr1u:610: (PB 5.2.5) anāyatanaṃ vā etat sāma yad anidhanam
GV02pncvbr1u:612: (PB 5.2.7) etad vai sākṣād annaṃ yad rājanaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhavati pāṅktaṃ hy annam
GV02pncvbr1u:616: (PB 5.2.11) ati vā eṣānyāni cchandāṃsi yad aticchandā aty etad anyāny ahāny ahar yan mahāvratam
GV02pncvbr1u:620: (PB 5.3.2) etad vai sākṣād annaṃ yad ilāndam irānnaṃ etad irāyām evānnādye 'ntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:622: samudro vā etac chandaḥ salilaṃ lomaśaṃ samudra iva khalu vai sa bhavati salila iva lomaśa iva yo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:625: vratam iti nidhanaṃ bhavati mahāvratasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate svar iti bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai śakuna iti bhavati śakuna iva vai yajamāno vayo bhūtvā svargaṃl lokam eti
GV02pncvbr1u:628: yad vā anyā vāṅ nātivadet tad agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ na vai vāg vācam ativadati vāg yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:631: agnir vā idaṃ vaiśvānaro 'dahan naitasmād devā abibhayus taṃ varaṇaśākhayāvārayanta yad avārayanta tasmād vāravantīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:632: (PB 5.3.10) tasmād varaṇo bhiṣajya etena hi devā ātmānam atrāyanta
GV02pncvbr1u:633: (PB 5.3.11) tasmād brāhmaṇo vāraṇena na pibed vaiśvānaraṃ necchamayā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:634: (PB 5.3.12) paśavo vai vāravantīyaṃ śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntād eva tat saṃvvatsarād uttiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:635: (PB 5.4.1) prāṇena purastād āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante prāṇam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:636: (PB 5.4.2) apānena paścāt puccham upatiṣṭhante apānam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:637: (PB 5.4.3) vratapakṣābhyāṃ pakṣāv upatiṣṭhante diśa eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:638: (PB 5.4.4) prajāpater hṛdayenāpikakṣam upatiṣṭhante jyaiṣṭhyam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:639: (PB 5.4.5) vasiṣṭhasya nihavena cātvālam upatiṣṭhante svargam eva tal lokam āotvā śriyaṃ vadante
GV02pncvbr1u:640: (PB 5.4.6) vaiśvadevyām ṛci bhavati viśvarūpaṃ vai paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ paśūn eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:642: (PB 5.4.8) caturakṣarāṇidhanaṃ bhavati catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:643: (PB 5.4.9) ātamitor nidhanam upayanty āyur eva sarvam āpnuvanti

GV02pncvbr1u:645: (PB 5.4.11) yāmena mārjālīyam upatiṣṭhante pitṛlokam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:646: (PB 5.4.12) āyurṇavastobhābhyāṃ sada upatiṣṭhante brahma caiva tat kṣatraṃ ca jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:649: indraṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny astuvaṃs tasyarśya ekam aṅgam astutam acāyat tad asyaitenāstaut tenāsya priyaṃ dhāmopāgacchat priyam evāsyaitena dhāmopagacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:651: yat paro'kṣaṃ nidhanam upeyur hrītamukhaṃ pratimuñceran pratyakṣam upayanti hrītamukham evāpajayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:652: (PB 5.5.1) āsandīm āruhyodgāyati devasākṣya eva tad upariṣadyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:653: (PB 5.5.2) audumbarī bhavaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarunddhe
GV02pncvbr1u:655: (PB 5.5.4) chandobhir ārohati svargam eva tal lokam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:657: (PB 5.5.6) sarveṇātmanā samuddhṛtyodgeyam eṣu lokeṣu ned vyāhito 'sānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:659: (PB 5.5.8) saha nidhanena pratiṣṭhām upayanty eṣeṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:660: (PB 5.5.9) preṅkhām āruhya hotā śaṃsati mahasa eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:661: (PB 5.5.10) yadā vai prajā maha āviśati preṅkhās tarhy ārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:663: (PB 5.5.12) kūrcān itare 'dhyāsata ūrdhvā eva tad utkrāmanto yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:665: abhigarāpagarau bhavato nindaty enān anyaḥ prānyaḥ śaṃsati ya enān nindati pāpmānam eṣāṃ so 'pahanti yaḥ praśaṃsati yad evaiṣāṃ suṣṭutaṃ suśastaṃ tat so 'bhigṛṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:666: (PB 5.5.14) śūdrāryau carmaṇi vyāyacchete tayor āryaṃ varṇam ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:668: devāś ca vā asurāś cāditye vyāyacchantas taṃ devā abhyajayaṃs tato devā abhavan / parāsurā abhavann ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:669: (PB 5.5.16) yadāryaṃ varṇam ujjāpayanty ātmānam eva tad ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:670: (PB 5.5.17) parimaṇḍalaṃ carma bhavaty ādityasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:671: (PB 5.5.18) sarvāsu sraktiṣu dundubhayo vadanti yā vanaspatiṣu vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:672: (PB 5.5.19) bhūmidundubhir bhavati yā pṛthivyāṃ vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:673: (PB 5.5.20) sarvā vāco vadanti yeṣu lokeṣu vāk tām eva taj jayanti
