GV02pncvbr1u:678: adhvaryuḥ śirasodgāyan maitrāvaruṇo dakṣiṇena pakṣeṇa brāhmaṇācchaṃsy uttareṇa gṛhapatiḥ pucchenodgātātmanā
GV02pncvbr1u:679: (PB 5.6.3) tad yady evaṃ kuryur ekaikayā stotrīyayāstutayodgātāram abhisameyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:681_0: tisṛbhir udgātātmana udgīyātha yā śirasaḥ stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyād aparābhis tisṛbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:681_1: udgīyātha yā dakṣiṇasya pakṣasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyād aparābhis tisṛbhir udgīyātha
GV02pncvbr1u:681_2: yottarasya pakṣasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyāt tisṛbhir vaikayā vā stutaṃ syād atha yā
GV02pncvbr1u:682: (PB 5.6.5) ātmany eva tad aṅgāni pratidadhati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:684: atho khalv āhuḥ katham adhvaryur bahvṛcaḥ sāma gāyed ity udgātaiva sarveṇodgāyet tad eva samṛddhaṃ samṛddhāv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:686_0: havirdhāne śirasā stutvā saṃrabdhāḥ pratyañca eyus te dakṣiṇena dhiṣṇyān parītya
GV02pncvbr1u:686_1: paścān maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyasyopaviśya rathantareṇa pañcadaśena stuvīraṃs ta udañcaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:686_2: saṃsarpeyur jaghanena hotur dhiṣṇyaṃ paścād brāhmaṇācchaṃsino dhiṣṇyasyopaviśya bṛhatā
GV02pncvbr1u:686_3: saptadaśena stuvīraṃs te yenaiva prasarpeyus tena punar niḥsṛpyottareṇāgnīdhraṃ parītya
GV02pncvbr1u:686_4: paścād gārhapatyasyopaviśya pucchenaikaviṃśena stuvīraṃs te yenaiva niḥsarpeyus tena
GV02pncvbr1u:688: taṃ patnyo 'paghāṭilābhir upagāyanty ārtvijyam eva tat patnyaḥ kurvanti saha svargaṃl lokam ayāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:690: kule-kule 'nnaṃ kriyate tad yat pṛccheyuḥ kim idaṃ kurvantītīme yajamānā annam atsyantīti brūyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:692: yo vai dīkṣitānāṃ pāpaṃ kīrtayati tṛtīyam evāṃśaṃ pāpmano haraty annādas tṛtīyaṃ pipīlikās tṛtīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:694: parimādbhiś caranti tvak ca vā etal loma ca mahāvratasya yat parimādas tvacaṃ caiva tal loma ca mahāvratasyāptvāvarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:695: (PB 5.6.12) vāṇaṃ vitanvanty anto vai vāṇo 'nto mahāvratam antenaiva tad antam abhivādayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:696: (PB 5.6.13) śatatantrīko bhavati śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:697: (PB 5.6.14) tam ullikhet prāṇāya tvāpānāya tvā vyānāya tveti prāṇāpānavyānān eva tad āptvāvarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:699: pari kumbhinyo mārjālīyaṃ yantīdaṃ madhv idaṃ madhv iti saghoṣā eva tad vayo bhūtvā saha svargaṃl lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:701: devā vai vācaṃ vyabhajanta tasyā yo raso 'tyaricyata tad gaurīvitam abhavad anuṣṭubham anu pariplavate vāg anuṣṭub vāco raso gaurīvitam
GV02pncvbr1u:702: (PB 5.7.2) yad gaurīvitenānvahaṃs stuvate vācy eva tad vācā rasaṃ dadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:703: (PB 5.7.3) rasavad vācā vadati ya evaṃv vedeti
GV02pncvbr1u:705: dvyudāsaṃ bhavati svargasya vā etau lokasyāvasānadeśau pūrveṇaiva pūrvam ahaḥ saṃsthāpayanty uttareṇottaram ahar abhyativadanti
GV02pncvbr1u:707: etad vai yajñasya śvastanaṃ yad gaurīvitaṃ yad gaurīvitam anusṛjeyur aśvastanā aprajasaḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:709: saṃ vā anyo yajñas tiṣṭhata ity āhur vāg eva na saṃtiṣṭhata iti yad gaurīvitam anvahaṃ bhavati vācam eva tat punaḥ prayuñjate
GV02pncvbr1u:712_0: devakṣetraṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ye svarṇidhanam upayanti sa u vai sattriṇaḥ sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:712_1: upanayed ity āhur ya enān devakṣetram abhyārohed iti na vai devakṣetra āsīna ārtim
GV02pncvbr1u:712_2: ārchati yat svarṇidhanam anvahaṃ bhavati naiva kāṃ canārtim ārchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:714_0: cyavante vā ete 'smāl lokād ity āhur ye svarṇidhanam upayantīti yad ṛcā svarūpaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:714_1: yanty asmiṃ loke pratitiṣṭhanti yad ekāro 'tarikṣe yat sāmnāmuṣmint sarveṣu lokeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:717: devā vai svargaṃl lokaṃ yanto 'jñātād abibhayus ta etat saṃjñānam apaśyaṃs tena jñātram agacchan yat sujñānam anvahaṃ bhavati jñātram eva gacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:718: (PB 5.8.1) ye vai vācam annam ādayanty annādā bhavanti ye vitarṣayanti rukṣā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:720: gaurīvitaṃ śyāvāśvaṃ nihava etāni vai sāmāni vāco 'nnam eteṣāṃ vāg annaṃ yad etāni na cyavante vācam eva tad annam ādayanti tena sarve 'nnādā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:721: (PB 5.8.3) abhikrāntāpakrāntāni bhavanty abhikrāntāpakrāntaṃ vai vāco rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:724: samudraṃ vā ete prasnānti ye saṃvvatsaram upayanti yo vā aplavaḥ samudraṃ prasnāti na sa tata udeti yat plavo bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:725: (PB 5.8.6) ati viśvāni duritā taremeti yad evaiṣāṃ duṣṭutaṃ duḥśastaṃ tad etena taranti
GV02pncvbr1u:728: parāṃ vā ete parāvataṃ gacchanti ye ṣaḍahasyāntaṃ gacchanti yadokonidhanaṃ ṣaḍahamukhe bhavati prajñātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:729: (PB 5.8.9) yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam oka āgacchati sarvaṃ tarhi prajānāti sarvam asmai divā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:732: eṣā vai saṃvvatsarasya patnī yad ekāṣṭakaitasyāṃ vā gatāṃ rātriṃ vasati sākṣād eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:735: vicchinnaṃ vā ete saṃvvatsarasyābhidīkṣante ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣante 'ntanāmānāv ṛtū bhavete
GV02pncvbr1u:736: (PB 5.9.5) ārtaṃ vā ete saṃvvatsarasyābhidīkṣante ye 'ntanāmānāv ṛtū abhidīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:739: (PB 5.9.8) mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yat phālguno mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:740: (PB 5.9.9) tasya sāniryā yat saṃmeghe viṣuvān saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:743: cakṣur vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yac citrāpūrṇamāso mukhato vai cakṣur mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante tasya na niryāsti
GV02pncvbr1u:745: (PB 5.9.13) teṣām akāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpadyate tenaikāṣṭakāṃ na saṃbaṭ kurvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:747_0: teṣāṃ pūrvapakṣe sutyā saṃpadyate pūrvapakṣe māsāḥ saṃtiṣṭhamānā yanti pūrvapakṣa
GV02pncvbr1u:747_1: uttiṣṭhanti tān uttiṣṭhataḥ paśava oṣadhayo 'nūttiṣṭhanti tān kalyāṇī vāg abhivadary
GV02pncvbr1u:747_2: arātsur ime sattriṇa iti te rādhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:748: (PB 5.10.1) ā vā ete saṃvvatsaraṃ pyāyayanti ya utsṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:750: yathā vai dṛtir ādhmāta evaṃ saṃvvatsaro 'nutsṛṣṭo yan notsṛjeyur amehena pramāyukāḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:752: prāṇo vai saṃvvatsara udānā māsā yad utsṛjanti prāṇa evodānān dadhati yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate yā saṃvvatsarasyānutsṛṣṭasya śuk sā tam ṛcchati
GV02pncvbr1u:754: (PB 5.10.5) yady utsṛjeyur ukthāny utsṛjeyus tad evotsṛṣṭaṃ tad anutsṛṣṭam
GV02pncvbr1u:755: (PB 5.10.6) atho khalv āhur ekatrikaṃ kāryaṃ tad eva sākṣād utsṛṣṭam abhyutṣuṇvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:756: (PB 5.10.7) chidro vā eteṣāṃ saṃvvatsara ity āhur ye stomam utsṛjantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:757: (PB 5.10.8) paśum ālabhante stomam eva tad ālabhante stomo hi paśuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:759_0: śva utsṛṣṭāḥ sma iti vatsān apākurvanti prātaḥ paśum ālabhante tasya vapayā pracaranti
GV02pncvbr1u:759_1: tatas savanīyenāṣṭākapālena tata āgneyenāṣṭākapālena tato dadhnaindreṇa tataś caruṇā
GV02pncvbr1u:761: tataḥ paśupuroḍāśenaikādaśakapālena tataḥ savanīyenaikādaśakapālena tato marutvatīyenaikādaśakapālena tataś caruṇaindreṇa tan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:763: paśunā pracaranti tataḥ savanīyena dvādaśakapālena tato vaiśvadevena dvādaśakapālena tataś caruṇāgnimārutena tat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:766: prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa etam agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tenemāḥ prajā asṛjata
GV02pncvbr1u:768: ekādaśena ca vai satā stotreṇāgniṣṭomasyāsṛjataikādaśena ca māsā saṃvvatsarasya tā dvādaśena ca stotreṇāgniṣṭomasya paryagṛhṇād dvādaśena ca māsā saṃvvatsarasya
GV02pncvbr1u:770: tasmāt prajā daśamāso garbhaṃ bhṛtvaikādaśam anu prajāyante tasmād dvādaśaṃ nābhyatiharanti dvādaśena hi parigṛhītās tad ya evaṃv veda pari jātāḥ prajā gṛhṇāti pra jātā janayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:772: tāsāṃ parigṛhītānām aśvatary atyakrāmat tasyā anuhāya reta ādattā tad vaḍavāyāṃ nyamāḍ yasmād vaḍavā dviretās tasmād aśvatary aprajā āttaretā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:774: tasmād v adakṣiṇīyāti hi sā yajñam aricyatātiriktasya dakṣiṇā syāt salomatvāya ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotredeyātirikto vai ṣoḍaśy atirikta evātiriktāṃ dadāti
GV02pncvbr1u:776_0: so 'kāmayata yajñaṃ sṛjeyeti sa mukhata eva trivṛtam asṛjata taṃ gāyatrī cchando
GV02pncvbr1u:776_1: 'nyasṛjyatāgnir devatā brāhmaṇo manuṣyo vasanta ṛtus tasmāt trivṛt stomānāṃ mukhaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:776_2: gāyatrī cchandasām agnir devatānāṃ brāhmaṇo manuṣyāṇāṃ vasanta ṛtūnāṃ tasmād brāhmaṇo
GV02pncvbr1u:776_3: mukhena vīryaṃ karoti mukhato hi sṛṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:777: (PB 6.1.7) karoti mukhena vīryaṃ ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:779_0: sa urasta eva bāhubhyāṃ pañcadaśam asṛjata taṃ triṣṭup chando 'nvasṛjyatendro devatā
GV02pncvbr1u:779_1: rājanyo manuṣyo grīṣma ṛtus tasmād rājanyasya pañcadaśa stomas triṣṭup chanda indro
GV02pncvbr1u:779_2: devatā grīṣma ṛtus tasmād u bāhuvīryo bāhubhyāṃ hi sṛṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:780: (PB 6.1.9) karoti bāhubhyāṃ vīryaṃ ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:782_0: sa madhyata eva prajananāt saptadaśam asṛjata taṃ jagatī cchando 'nvasṛjyata viśve
GV02pncvbr1u:782_1: devā devatā vaiśyo manuṣyo varṣā ṛtus tasmād vaiśyo 'dyamāno na kṣīyate prajananād
GV02pncvbr1u:782_2: dhi sṛṣṭas tasmād u bahupaśur vaiśvadevo hi jāgato varṣā hy asyartus tasmād brāhmaṇasya
GV02pncvbr1u:784_0: sa patta eva pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśam asṛjata tam anuṣṭup chando 'nvasṛjyata na kā cana
GV02pncvbr1u:784_1: devatā śūdro manuṣyas tasmāc chūdra uta bahupaśur ayajñiyo videvo hi na hi taṃ kā
GV02pncvbr1u:784_2: cana devatā 'nvasṛjyata tasmāt pādāv anejyaṃ nāti vardhate patto hi sṛṣṭas tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:784_3: ekaviṃśastomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhāyā hi sṛṣṭas tasmād anuṣṭubhaṃ chandāṃsi nānu vyūhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:786: (PB 6.1.13) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:787: (PB 6.2.1) yo vai stomān upadeśanavato vedopadeśanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:789: prāṇo vai trivṛd ardhamāsaḥ pañcadaśaḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saptadaśa āditya ekaviṃśa ete vai stomā upadeśanavanta upadeśanavān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:790: (PB 6.2.3) ime vai lokās triṇavas triṇavasya vai brāhmaṇeneme lokās triṣ punar navā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:791: (PB 6.2.4) eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:793: devatā vāva trayastriṃśo 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityāḥ prajāpatiś ca vaṣaṭkāraś ca trayastriṃśau
GV02pncvbr1u:794: (PB 6.2.6) sa devena yajñena yajate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:795: (PB 6.2.7) yo vā adhipatiṃ vedādhipatir bhavati trayastriṃśo vai stomānam adhipatiḥ puruṣaḥ paśumān
GV02pncvbr1u:796: (PB 6.2.8) tasmān nyañco 'nye paśavo 'danty ūrdhvaḥ puruṣo 'dhipatir hi saḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:797: (PB 6.2.9) adhipatiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:801: dvādaśa stotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tena paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:803: dvādaśa stotrāṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nuprajāyante tena paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:804: (PB 6.3.5) agnau stotram agnau śastraṃ pratitiṣṭhati tena brahmavarcasasya
GV02pncvbr1u:806: kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasya jyotiṣṭomatvam ity āhur virājaṃ saṃstutaḥ saṃpadyate virāḍ vai cchandasāṃ jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:807: (PB 6.3.7) jyotiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:810: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmai śraiṣṭhyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa etam agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tato 'smai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:811: (PB 6.3.10) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:813: yat tv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kva tarhi turīyaṃ cchando 'nuṣṭub iti
GV02pncvbr1u:816: aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī hiṅkāro navama ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub dvādaśākṣarā jagatī cchandobhirevānuṣṭubham āpnoti yajamānasyānavalopāya
GV02pncvbr1u:818: yo vā anuṣṭubhaṃ sarvatrāpiṃ savanāny anvāyattāṃ veda sarvatrāsyāpir bhavaty eṣā vā anuṣṭup sarvatrāpiḥ savanāny anvāyattā tad ya evaṃ vveda sarvatrāpir bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:820: yad vai rājāno 'dhvānaṃ dhāvayanti ye 'śvānāṃv vīryavattamās tān yuñjate trivṛt pañcadaśa ekaviṃśa ete vai stomānāṃv vīryavattamās tān eva yuṅkte svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:821: (PB 6.3.16) catuṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai catuṣṭomaḥ pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:823_0: prajāpatir devebhya ūrjaṃ vyabhajat tata udumbaraḥ samabhavat prājāpatyo vā udumbaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:823_1: prājāpatya udgātā yad udgātaudumbarīṃ prathamena karmaṇānvārabhate svayaiva tad devatayātmānam ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte
GV02pncvbr1u:825: tām ucchrayati dyutānas tvā māruta ucchrayatūd divaṃ stabhānāntarikṣaṃ pṛṇa dṛṃha pṛthivīm
GV02pncvbr1u:826: (PB 6.4.3) tām anvārabhata āyoṣ ṭvā sadane sādayāmy avataś chāyāyāṃ samudrasya hṛdaya iti
GV02pncvbr1u:827: (PB 6.4.4) yajño vā āyus tasya tat sadanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:828: (PB 6.4.5) yajño vā avati tasya sā cchāyā kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:829: (PB 6.4.6) madhyato vā ātmano hṛdayaṃ tasmān madhye sadasa audumbarī mīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:831: namaḥ samudrāya namaḥ samudrasya cakṣuṣa ity āha vāg vai samudro manaḥ samudrasya cakṣus tābhyām eva tan namas karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:832: (PB 6.4.8) sāmā yūnarvāhāsīd ity āha sāma vai yūnarvā sāmna eva tan namaskaroty ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyan
GV02pncvbr1u:833: (PB 6.4.9) yo vā evaṃ sāmne namaskṛtya sāmnārtvijyaṃ karoti na sāmno hīyate nainaṃ sāmāpahate
GV02pncvbr1u:834: (PB 6.4.10) ya enam anuvyāharati sa ārtim ārchati
GV02pncvbr1u:836_0: ūrg asy ūrjodā ūrjaṃ me dehy ūrjaṃ me dhehy annaṃ me dehy annaṃ me dhehi prajāpater
GV02pncvbr1u:836_1: vā etad udaraṃ yat sada ūrg udumbaro yad audumbarī madhye sadaso mīyate madhyata
GV02pncvbr1u:837: (PB 6.4.12) tasmād yatraiṣā yātayāmā kriyate tat prajā aśanāyavo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:839: sāma devānām annaṃ sāmany eva tad devebhyo 'nna ūrhaṃ dadhāti sa eva tad ūrji śritaḥ prajābhya ūrjaṃ vibhajati
GV02pncvbr1u:841_0: udaṅṅ āsīna udgāyaty udīcīṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati pratyaṅṅ āsīnaḥ prastauti pratīcīṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:841_1: tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati dakṣiṇāsīnaḥ pratiharati dakṣiṇāṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati prāñco
GV02pncvbr1u:841_2: 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvanti tasmād eṣā diśāṃ vīryavattamaitāṃ hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ prīṇanti
GV02pncvbr1u:843_0: brahmavādino vadanti kasmāt satyāt prāñco 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti viparikramyodgātāra
GV02pncvbr1u:843_1: iti diśām abhīṣṭyai diśām abhiprītyā iti brūyāt tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annaṃv vidyate
GV02pncvbr1u:845_0: prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti so 'śocat tasya śocata ādityo mūrdhno
GV02pncvbr1u:845_1: 'sṛjyata so 'sya mūrdhānam udahan sa droṇakalaśo 'bhavat tasmin devāḥ śukram agṛhṇata
GV02pncvbr1u:848: raṃ prohed vānaspatyo 'si bārhaspatyo 'si prājāpatyo 'si prajāpater mūrdhāsy atyāyupātram asīdam ahaṃ māṃ prāñcaṃ prohāmi tejase brahmavarcasāyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:849: (PB 6.5.4) yad āha vānaspatya iti satyenaivainaṃ tat prohati
GV02pncvbr1u:850: (PB 6.5.5) yad āha bārhaspatya iti bṛhaspatir vai devānām udgātā tam eva tad yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:852: yad āha prājāpatya iti prājāpatyo hy eṣa devatāyā yad droṇakalaśo yad āha prajāpater mūrdheti prajāpater hy eṣa mūrdhna udahanyata
GV02pncvbr1u:853: (PB 6.5.7) yad āhātyāyupātram ity ati hy etad anyāni pātrāṇi yad droṇakalaśo devapātraṃ droṇakalaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:856: brāhmaṇaṃ pātre na mīmāṃseta yaṃ brāhmaṇam iva manyate pra devapātram āpnoti na manuṣyapātrāc chidyate
GV02pncvbr1u:858_0: vāg vai devebhyo 'pakrāmat sāpaḥ prāviśat tāṃ devāḥ punar ayācaṃs tā abruvan yat
GV02pncvbr1u:858_1: punar dadyāma kiṃ nas tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayadhva ity abruvaṃs tā abruvan yad evāsmāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:859: (PB 6.5.11) śuddhā asmā āpaḥ pūtā bhavanti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:861_0: sā punartātyakrāmat sā vanaspatīn prāviśat tān devāḥ punar ayācaṃs tāṃ na punar adadus
GV02pncvbr1u:861_1: tān aśapan svena vaḥ kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścān iti tasmād vanaspatīn svena kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:863: tāṃv vanaspatayaś caturdhā vācaṃv vinyadadhur dundubhau vīṇāyām akṣe tūṇave tasmād eṣā vadiṣṭhaiṣā valgutamā vāg vā vanaspatīnāṃ devānāṃ hy eṣā vāg āsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:865: adho-'dho 'kṣaṃ droṇakalaśaṃ prohanti tasyā vāco 'varudhyā upary-upary akṣaṃ pavitraṃ prayacchanty ubhayata eva vācaṃ parigṛhṇanti
GV02pncvbr1u:867_0: yasya kāmayetāsuryam asya yajñaṃ kuryāṃv vācaṃv vṛñjīyeti droṇakalaśaṃ prohan bāhubhyām
GV02pncvbr1u:867_1: akṣan upaspṛśed asuryam asya yajñaṃ karoti vācaṃv vṛṅkte yo 'sya priyaḥ syād anupaspṛśann
GV02pncvbr1u:867_2: akṣaṃ prohet prāṇā vai droṇakalaśaḥ prāṇān evāsya kalpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:868: (PB 6.5.16) yan nv ity āhur vācānyān ṛtvijo vṛṇate kasmād udgātāro vṛtā ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:870: (PB 6.5.18) prājāpatyā vā udgātāraḥ prājāpatyo droṇakalaśo droṇakalaśa evainām ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte
GV02pncvbr1u:873: anabhijitā vā eṣodgātṝṇāṃ dig yat prācī yad droṇakalaśaṃ prāñcaṃ prohanti diśo 'bhijityai
GV02pncvbr1u:875: yan nv ity āhur antarāśvaḥ prāsevau yujyate 'ntarā śamya anaḍvān ka udgātṝṇāṃ yoga iti yad droṇakalaśam upasīdanti sa eṣāṃ yogas tasmād yuktair evopasadyaṃ na hy ayukto vahati
GV02pncvbr1u:877: grāvṇaḥ saṃsādya droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viḍ vai grāvāṇo 'nnaṃ somo rāṣṭraṃ droṇakalaśo yad grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viśy eva tad rāṣṭram adhyūhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:879: yaṃ dviṣyād vimukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amum amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyā viśo 'muṣmād annādyān nirūhāmīti nirūhed viśa evainam annādyān nirūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:881: yo 'sya priyaḥ syāt saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyāṃ viśy amuṣinn annādye 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhed viśy evainam annādye 'dhyūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:883: atho tad ubhayam anādṛtyedam ahaṃ māṃ tejasi brahmavarcasse 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhet tejasy eva brahmavarcasa ātmānam adhyūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:885_0: yaḥ kāmayeta viśā rāṣṭraṃ hanyām iti vyūhya grāvṇo 'dho droṇakalaśaṃ sādayitvopāṃśusavanam
GV02pncvbr1u:885_1: upariṣṭād abhinidadhyād idam aham amuyā viśā 'do rāṣṭraṃ hanmīti viśaiva tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti
GV02pncvbr1u:887: yo vai daivāni pavitrāṇi veda pūto yajñiyo bhavati cchandāṃsi vai daivāni pavitrāṇi tair droṇakalaśaṃ pāvayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:889_0: vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa cchandasā punantu rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena cchandasā punantv
GV02pncvbr1u:889_1: ādityās tvā jāgatena cchandasā punantv etāni vai daivāni pavitrāṇi pūto yajñiyo bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:891_0: svarbhānur vā āsura ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat taṃ devā na vyajānaṃs te 'trim upādhāvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:891_1: tasyātrir bhāsena tamo 'pāhan yat prathamam apāhan sā kṛṣṇāvir abhavad yad dvitīyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:891_2: sā rajatā yat tṛtīyaṃ sā lohinī yayā varṇam abhyatṛṇat sā śuklāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:892: (PB 6.6.9) tasmāc chuklaṃ pavitraṃ śukraḥ somaḥ sa śukratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:894_0: yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaiteṣāṃ varṇānām api pavitre kuryāt pāpmanaivainaṃ tamasā vidhyati
GV02pncvbr1u:894_1: kṛṣṇam iva hi tamo yo 'sya priyaḥ syād āsaktiśuklaṃ kuryāj jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ jyotir evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:895: (PB 6.6.11) tasmād ātreyaṃ candreṇecchanty atrir hi tasya jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:897: abhyatṛṇat pavitraṃv vigṛhṇanti hastakāryam eva tad yajñasya kriyata etad vā udgātṝṇāṃ hastakāryaṃ yat pavitrasya vigrahaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:898: (PB 6.6.13) na hastaveṣyān nir ṛcchati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:899: (PB 6.6.14) yo 'pi na vigṛhṇāti prāṇād enam antaryanti
GV02pncvbr1u:900: (PB 6.6.15) taṃ brūyād vepamānaḥ prameṣyasa iti vepamāna eva pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:901: (PB 6.6.16) pra śukraitu devī manīṣāsmad rathaḥ sutaṣṭo na vājīty udgātā dhārām anumantrayate
GV02pncvbr1u:903: āyuṣe me pavasva varcase me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitrāc chṛṇvantv āpo 'dhaḥ kṣarantīḥ somehodgāyety āha mahyaṃ tejase brahmavarcasāyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:904: (PB 6.6.18) eṣa vai somasyodgītho yat pavate somodgītham eva sāma gāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:906: ācchinnaṃ pāvayanti yajñaṃ caiva prāṇāṃś ca saṃtanvanti saṃtataṃ pāvayanti yajñasya saṃtatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:908: bṛhaspatir vai devānām udagāyat taṃ rakṣāṃsy ajighāṃsan sa ya eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopādhāvat
GV02pncvbr1u:909: (PB 6.7.2) sūryo mā divābhyo nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣābhyo 'gniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāheti juhoti
GV02pncvbr1u:910: (PB 6.7.3) ete vā eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopāsarat
GV02pncvbr1u:911: (PB 6.7.4) karoti vācā vīryaṃ na sadasyām ārtim ārcchati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:913_0: vāg vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat tāṃ devā anvamantrayanta sā 'bravīd abhāgāsmi bhāgadheyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:913_1: me 'stv iti kas te bhāgadheyaṃ kuryād ity udgātāra ity abravīd udgātāro vai vāce
GV02pncvbr1u:915: tasyai juhuyād bekurānāmāsi juṣṭā devebhyo namo vāce namo vācas pataye devi vāg yat te vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāheti
GV02pncvbr1u:916: (PB 6.7.7) vāh vai sarasvatī tām eva tad bhāgadheyenārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:917: (PB 6.7.8) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaitām āhutiṃ juhuyād vācaṃ manasā dhyāyed vācam evāsya vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:918: (PB 6.7.9) bahiṣpavamānaṃ sarpanti svargam eva tal lokaṃ sarpanti
GV02pncvbr1u:920: prakvāṇā iva sarpanti pratikūlam iva hītaḥ svargo lokaḥ tsaranta iva sarpanti mṛgadharmo vai yajño yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:922: vācaṃ yacchanti yajñam eva tad yacchanti yad vyavavadeyur yajñaṃ nirbrūyus tasmān na vyavavadyam
GV02pncvbr1u:923: (PB 6.7.12) pañcartvijaḥ saṃrabdhāḥ sarpanti pā-nkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam eva saṃtanvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:925: yadi prastotāvacchidyate yajñasya śiraś chidyate brahmaṇe varaṃ dattvā sa eva punar vartavyaś chinnam eva tat pratidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:927: yady udgātāvacchidyate yajñena yajamāno vyṛdhyate 'dakṣiṇaḥ sa yajñakratuḥ saṃsthāpyo 'thānya āhṛtyas tasmin deyaṃ yāvad dāsyan syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:929: yadi pratihartā 'vacchidyate paśubhir yajamāno vyṛdhyate paśavo vai pratihartā sarvavedasaṃ deyaṃ yadi sarvavedasaṃ na dadāti sarvajyāniṃ jīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:931: (PB 6.7.17) yajamāno vai prastaro yajamānam eva tat svargaṃl lokaṃ harati
GV02pncvbr1u:933: yajño vai devebhyo 'śvo bhūtvāpākrāmat taṃ devāḥ prastareṇāsamayaṃs tasmād aśvaḥ prastareṇa saṃmṛjyamāna upāvarabhate yad adhvaryuḥ prastaraṃ harati yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:935_0: prajāpatiḥ paśun asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā aśanāyanto 'pākrāmaṃs tebhyaḥ prastaram annaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:935_1: prāyacchat enam upāvartanta tasmād adhvaryuṇā prastara īṣad iva vidhūyo vidhūtim
GV02pncvbr1u:936: (PB 6.7.20) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:940: aṣṭhīvatopaspṛśatodgeyaṃ tenāsya havir askannaṃ bhavati na yajamānaṃ svargāl lokād avagṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:942_0: cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānaṃ stuvanty atra vā asāv āditya āsīt ta devā bahiṣpavamānena
GV02pncvbr1u:942_1: svargaṃl lokam aharan yac cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānaṃ stuvanti yajamānam eva
GV02pncvbr1u:943: (PB 6.8.1) sa tu vai yajñena yajetety āhur yasya virājaṃ yajñamukhe dadhyur iti
GV02pncvbr1u:944: (PB 6.8.2) navabhiḥ stuvanti hiṅkāro daśamo daśākṣarā virāḍ virājam evāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:946: navabhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāḥ prāṇair evainaṃ samarddhayanti hiṅkāro daśamas tasmān nābhir anavatṛṇṇā daśamī prāṇānām
GV02pncvbr1u:948: navabhiḥ stuvanti navādhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇāti tān eva tat pāvayanti teṣāṃ prāṇān utsṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:950: prajāpatir vai hiṅkāras trayo bahiṣpavamānyo yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti mithunam evāsyā yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:951: (PB 6.8.6) eṣa vai stomasya yogo yad dhiṅkāro yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti yuktenaiva stomena prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:952: (PB 6.8.7) eṣa vai sāmnāṃ raso yad dhiṅkāro yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti rasenaivaitā abhyudya prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:954: āraṇyebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad bahiṣpavamānam ekārūpābhiḥ stuvanti tasmād ekarūpā āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:955: (PB 6.8.9) parācībhiḥ stuvanti tasmāt parāñcaḥ prajāyante parāñco vitiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:956: (PB 6.8.10) apariśrite stuvanti tasmād aparigṛhītā āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:957: (PB 6.8.11) bahiḥ stuvanty antar anuśaṃsanti tasmād grāmam āhṛtair bhuñjate
GV02pncvbr1u:959: grāmebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad ājyair nānārūpaiḥ stuvanti tasmān nānārūpā grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:960: (PB 6.8.13) punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmāt pretvaryaḥ pretya punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:961: (PB 6.8.14) pariśrite stuvanti tasmāt parigṛhītā grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:963: amuṣmai vā etal lokāya stuvanti yad bahiṣpavamānaṃ sakṛd dhiṅkṛtābhiḥ parācībhiḥ stuvanti sakṛd dhīto 'sau parāṅ lokaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:965: asmai vā etal lokāya stuvanti yad ājyaiḥ punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmād ayaṃl lokaḥ punaḥ-punaḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:967: parāñco vā eteṣāṃ prāṇā bahvantīty āhur ye parācībhir bahiṣpavamānībhiḥ stuvata ity āvatīm uttamāṃ gāyet prāṇānāṃ dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:969: cyavante vā ete 'smāl lokād ity āhur ye parācībhir bahiṣpavamānībhiḥ stuvata iti rathantaravarṇam uttamāṃ gāyed iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:970: (PB 6.9.1) upāsmai gāyata nara iti grāmakāmāyapratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:971: (PB 6.9.2) naro vai devānāṃ grāmo grāmam evāsmā upākaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:973: (PB 6.9.4) upoṣu jātam apturam iti prajākāmāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:974: (PB 6.9.5) upa vai prajā tāṃ jātam ity evājījanat
GV02pncvbr1u:975: (PB 6.9.6) sa naḥ pasvasya śaṃ gava iti pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:976: (PB 6.9.7) yāṃ samāṃ mahādevaḥ paśūn hanyāt sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ gava iti catuṣpade bheṣajaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:977: (PB 6.9.8) śaṃ janāyeti dvipade śam arvata ity ekaśaphāya
GV02pncvbr1u:979_0: viṣeṇa vai tāṃ samām oṣadhayo 'ktā bhavanti yāṃ samāṃ mahādevaḥ paśūn hanti yac chaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:979_1: rājann oṣadhībhya ity āhauṣadhīr evāsmai svadayaty ubhayyo 'smai svaditāḥ pacyante
GV02pncvbr1u:980: (PB 6.9.10) pavasva vāco agriya iti pratipadaṃ kuryād yaṃ kāmayeta samānānāṃ śīreṣṭhaḥ syād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:981: (PB 6.9.11) pavasva vāco agriya ity agram evainaṃ pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:982: (PB 6.9.12) śrīr vai vāco 'graṃ śriyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:983: (PB 6.9.13) ete asṛgram indava iti bahubhyaḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:984: (PB 6.9.14) eta iti sarvān evainān ṛddhyai bhūtyā abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:986: eta iti vai prajāpatir devān asṛjatāsṛgram iti manuṣyān indava iti pitṝṃs tiraḥ pavitra iti grahān āśava iti stotraṃv viśvānīti śastram abhi saubhagety anyāḥ prajāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:987: (PB 6.9.16) yad eta iti tasmād yāvanta evāgre devās tāvanta idānīm
GV02pncvbr1u:988: (PB 6.9.17) sarvān vṛddhim ārdhnuvaṃ sthiteva hy eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:989: (PB 6.9.18) yad asṛgram iti tasmān manuṣyāḥ śvaḥ-śvaḥ sṛjyante
GV02pncvbr1u:990: (PB 6.9.19) yad indava itīndava iva hi pitaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:993: yāntāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭā ṛddhim ārdhnuvaṃs tām ṛdhnuvanti yeṣām evaṃv vidvān etāṃ pratipadaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:995_0: chandāṃsi vai somam āharaṃs taṃ gandharvo viśvāvasuḥ paryamuṣṇāt. tenāpaḥ prāviśat
GV02pncvbr1u:995_1: taṃ devatā anvaicchaṃs taṃ viṣṇur apsu paryapaśyat sa vyakāṅkṣad ayaṃ nū3 nā3 iti
GV02pncvbr1u:995_2: taṃ padā prāsphurat tasmāt pṛthag indavo 'sṛjyanta sa devatābhyo 'bhitas tiṣṭhantībhya
GV02pncvbr1u:995_3: ete asṛgram indava iti prābravīd bahiṣpavamānena vai yajñaḥ sṛjyate yad ete asṛgram
GV02pncvbr1u:995_4: indava iti prastauti yajñam eva tat sṛṣṭaṃ devatābhyaḥ prāha
GV02pncvbr1u:997: vyṛddhaṃ vā etad apaśavyaṃ yat prātaḥsavanam aniḍaṃ hi yad iḍām asmabhyaṃ saṃyatam ity āha prātaḥsavanam eva tad iḍāvat paśumat karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1000_0: davidyūtatyā receti vai gāyatryā rūpaṃ pariṣṭobhantyeti triṣṭubhaḥ kṛpety anuṣṭubhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1000_1: somāḥ śukrā gavāśira iti jagatyāḥ sarveṣāṃ vā eṣā cchandasāṃ rūpaṃ cchandāṃsīva khalu
GV02pncvbr1u:1000_2: vai vratopadeṣā pratipad bhavati svenaivaināṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1002: vṛddhā vā eta indriyeṇa vīryeṇa yad vrāta indriyaṃ vīryaṃ chandāṃsīndriyeṇaivainān vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1003: (PB 6.10.1) agna āyūṃṣi pavasa iti pratipadaṃ kuryād yeṣāṃ dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1005: apūtā iva vā ete yeṣāṃ dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate yady eṣāgnipāvamānī pratipad bhavaty agnir evainān niṣṭapati pavamānaḥ punāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1006: (PB 6.10.3) yad āyūṃṣīty āha ya eva jīvanti teṣv āyur dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1007: (PB 6.10.4) ā no mitrāvaruṇeti jyogāmayāvine pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1009: apakrāntau vā etasya prāṇāpānau yasya jyog āmayati prāṇāpānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇāpānāv evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1010: (PB 6.10.6) apaghnan pavate mṛdho 'pa somo arāvṇa ity anṛtam abhiśasyamānāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1011: (PB 6.10.7) arāvāṇo vā ete ye 'nṛtam abhiśaṃsanti tān evāsmād apahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1012: (PB 6.10.8) gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam iti pūtam evainaṃ yajñiyam indrasya niṣkṛtaṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1014: vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti rājanyāya pratipadaṃ kuryād vṛṣā vai rājanyo vṛṣāṇam evainaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1016: marutvate ca matsara iti maruto vai devānāṃ viśo viśam evāsmā anu niyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1018: viśvā dadhāna ojasety ojasaivāsmai vīryeṇa viśaṃ purastāt parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1019: (PB 6.10.12) pavasvendo vṛṣāsuta iti pratipadaṃ kuryād yaḥ kāmayeta jane ma ṛdhyeteti
GV02pncvbr1u:1020: (PB 6.10.13) kṛdhī no yaśaso jana iti janatāyām evāsmā ṛdhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1022: yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥ patī iti dvābhyāṃ pratipadaṃ kuryāt samāvadbhājāv evainau yajñasya karoty ubhau yajñayaśasenārpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1023: (PB 6.10.15) prāsya dhārā akṣarann iti vṛṣṭikāmāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1024: (PB 6.10.16) prāsya dhārā akṣarann iti divo vṛṣṭiṃ cyāvayati vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasa ity antarikṣāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1025: (PB 6.10.17) devāṃ anu prabhūṣata ity asmin loke pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1027: ojasā vā etad vīryeṇa pradīyate yad aprattaṃ bhavati yad vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasa ity āhaujasaivāsmai vīryeṇa divo vṛṣṭiṃ prayacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:1029_0: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgamañ janyāsa up no gṛham iti pratipadaṃ kuryād
GV02pncvbr1u:1029_1: yaḥ kāmayetopa mā janyā gāvo nameyur vindeta me janyā gā rāṣṭram iti yad eṣā pratipad
GV02pncvbr1u:1029_2: bhavaty upainaṃ janyā gāvo namanti vindate 'sya janyā gā rāṣṭram
GV02pncvbr1u:1031: ime vai lokā gāyatraṃ tryāvṛd geyaṃ trayo hīme lokā yat tryāvṛd gāyaty ebhir evainaṃ lokaiḥ saṃmimīte
GV02pncvbr1u:1033: (PB 7.1.3) yat trir avanardaty ati tad gāyatraṃ recayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1034: (PB 7.1.4) yo vai gāyatreṇāpratihṛtenodgāyaty apratiṣṭhāno bhavati hiṅkāro vai gāyatrasya pratihāraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1035: (PB 7.1.5) sa manasā dhyeyaḥ pratihṛtena gāyatreṇodgāyati pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1037: yo vā ebhyo lokebhyo gāyatraṃ gāyati naibhyo lokebhya āvṛścyata ima enaṃ lokā ūrjjābhisaṃvasate
GV02pncvbr1u:1038: (PB 7.1.7) mandram ivāgra ādadītātha tārataram atha tāratamaṃ tad ebhyo lokebhyo 'gāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:1040: aniruktaṃ geyam etad vai gāyatrasya krūraṃ yan niruktaṃ yad aniruktaṃ gāyati krūram evāsya parivṛṇakti
GV02pncvbr1u:1042: prāṇo gāyatraṃ na vyavānyāt prāṇasyāvicchedāya yadi vyavāniti pramāyuko bhavati yadi na vyavāniti sarvam āyur eti
GV02pncvbr1u:1044: yadi vyavānyān madhya ṛco vyavānyāt prāṇo vai gāyatraṃ prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇam eva tan madhyata ātman dadhāti sa sarvam āyur eti
GV02pncvbr1u:1046: iḍāṃ paśukāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt svaḥ svargakāmāya yaśo brahmavarcasakāmāyāyur āmayāvine haṃsīty abhicarate
GV02pncvbr1u:1048: (PB 7.1.13) brahmavarcasasī paśumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1050: prajāpatir devebhya ātmānaṃ yajñaṃ kṛtvā prāyacchat te 'nyo 'nyasmā agrāya nātiṣṭhanta tān abravīd ājim asminn iteti ta ājim āyan yad ājim āyaṃs tad ājyānām ājyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1052_0: sa indro 'ved agnir vā idam agra ujjyeṣyatīti so 'bravīd yataro nāv idam agra ujjayat
GV02pncvbr1u:1052_1: tan nau saheti so 'gnir agra udajayad atha mitrāvaruṇāv athendro 'thaiṣaikā hotrānujjitāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:1052_2: sa indro 'gnim abravīd yat sahāvocāvahī yan nau tad iti saiṣaindrāgny adhyardham
GV02pncvbr1u:1054: (PB 7.2.4) ṣaḍdhā vihito yajño yāvān yajñas tam evārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:1055: (PB 7.2.5) sarvāṇi svārāṇy ājyāni taj jāmi nānādevatyaiḥ stuvanty ajāmitāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1057: grāmyebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad ājyaiḥ punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmāt parāñcaḥ prājyante pratyañcaḥ prajāyante tasmād u pretya punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1059: (PB 7.3.2) tribhiś ca cchandobhiḥ pañcabhiś ca sāmabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1060: (PB 7.3.3) yan mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti mādhyandinam eva tat savanaṃ pāvayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1061: (PB 7.3.4) etāvanti vāva sarvāṇi sāmāni yāvanti mādhyandine pavamāne
GV02pncvbr1u:1063: (PB 7.3.6) yan mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti sarvair eva tat sāmabhiḥ stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1065: ātmā vai yajñasya pavamāno mukhaṃ gāyatrī prāṇo gāyatraṃ yad gāyatryāṃ gāyatreṇa stuvanti mukhata eva tat prāṇān dadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1067: prāṇāpānā vā etāni cchandāṃsi prāṇo gāyatrī vyāno bṛhaty apānas triṣṭub yad etaiś chandobhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāpānānām avicchedāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1069: ime vai lokā etāni cchandāṃsy ayam eva gāyatry ayaṃ madhyamo bṛhaty asāv uttamas triṣṭub yad etaś chandobhiḥ saṃhitaiḥ stuvanty eṣāṃ lokānām avicchedāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1070: (PB 7.3.10) yad anyac chando 'ntarā vyaveyād imāṃl lokān vicchindyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1071: (PB 7.3.11) gāyatreṇa stutvā nidhanavatā stuvantīyaṃ vai gāyatry asyām eva tad āyatanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1072: (PB 7.3.12) yad anidhanenāgre stuyur anāyatano yajamānaḥ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1074: nidhanavatā stuvanti vīryaṃ vai gāyatrī vīryaṃ nidhanaṃ vīryeṇaiva tad vīryaṃ samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1076: (PB 7.3.15) paśavo vā iḍā paśavo bṛhatī paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1079: (PB 7.3.18) abaliṣṭha iva vā ayaṃ madhyami lokas tasyaiva tad āyatanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1080: (PB 7.3.19) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati trīṇi savanānāṃ chidrāṇi tāni tenāpidhīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1081: (PB 7.3.20) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati traya ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1083: triṇidhanaṃ bhavaty etena vai mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yat triṇidhanaṃ yat triṇidhanaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1085: dvyakṣarāṇi nidhanāni bhavanti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣthāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1087: (PB 7.3.24) yan nidhanavat syād yajamānaṃ svargāl lokān nirhanyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1090: svareṇa vai devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pradīyate svareṇaiva tad devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ prayacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:1093: prāṇo vai gāyatraṃ prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evatad ubhayato dadhāti tasmād ubhayataḥ prāṇāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1094: (PB 7.3.29) yad gāyatraṃ purastād bhavati svāram antataḥ prāṇair eva praity apāne pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1096: etad vai yajñasya svargyaṃ yan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ mādhyandinasya pavamānaḥ pavamānasya bṛhatī yad bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante svargasyaiva tal lokasyāyatane dīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1098_0: devā vai cchandāṃsy abruvan yuṣmābhiḥ svargyaṃl lokam ayāmeti te gāyatrīṃ prāyuñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1098_1: tayā na vyāpnuvaṃs triṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvañ jagatīṃ prāyuñjata tayā
GV02pncvbr1u:1098_2: na vyāpnuvann anuṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayālpakādi na vyāpnuvaṃs ta āsāṃ diśāṃ rasān
GV02pncvbr1u:1098_3: prabṛhya catvāry akṣarāṇy upādadhuḥ sā bṛhaty abhavat tayemāṃl lokān vyāpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:1099: (PB 7.4.3) bṛhatī maryā yayemāṃl lokān vyāpāmeti tad bṛhatyā bṛhattvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1101: paśūn vā asyāntān upādadhuḥ paśavo vai bṛhatī yad bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante sva eva tad āyatane dīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1103_0: yan nv ity āhur anyāni cchandāṃsi varṣīyāṃsi kasmād bṛhaty ucyata eṣā hīmāṃl lokān
GV02pncvbr1u:1103_1: vyāpnon nānyac chandaḥ kiṃ cana yāni sapta caturuttarāṇi cchandāṃsi tāni bṛhatīm
GV02pncvbr1u:1105: yan nv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kasmād bṛhatyā madhyandine stuvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1107: bahiṣpavamānena vai devā ādityaṃ svargaṃl lokam aharan sa nādhriyata taṃ bṛhatyā madhyandine 'stabhnuvaṃs tasmād bṛhatyā madhyandinaṃ stuvanty ādityaṃ hy eṣā madhyandine dādhāra
GV02pncvbr1u:1109: yair u kaiś ca cchandobhir madhyandine stuvanti tāni triṣṭubham abhi saṃpadyante tasmāt triṣṭubho nayanti mādhyandināt savanāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1111: prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa śocann amahīyamāno 'tiṣṭhat sa etad āmahīyavam apaśyat tenemāḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā amahīyanta yad amahīyanta tasmād āmahīyavam
GV02pncvbr1u:1113_0: tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tāsāṃ divi sad bhūmy ādada iti prāṇān ādatta tā enaṃ prāṇeṣv
GV02pncvbr1u:1113_1: ātteṣu punar upāvartanta tābhya ugraṃ śarma mahi śrava iti punaḥ prāṇān prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:1113_2: tā asmād ud evāyodhaṃs tāsāṃ stauṣa iti manyūn avāśṛṇāt tato vai tasmai tāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1114: (PB 7.5.3) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1115: (PB 7.5.4) prajānāṃ ca vā eṣā sṛṣṭiḥ pāpavasīyaś ca vidhṛtir yad āmahīyavam
GV02pncvbr1u:1116: (PB 7.5.5) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1118_0: devā vai yaśaskāmāḥ sattram āsatāgnir indro vāyur makhas te 'bruvsn yan no yaśa ṛcchāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1118_1: tan naḥ sahāsad iti teṣā makhaṃ yaśa ārcchat tad ādāyāpākrāmat tad asya prāsahāditsanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1118_2: taṃ paryayatanta svadhanuḥ pratiṣṭhābhyātiṣṭhat tasya dhanurārtnir ūrdhvā patitvā
GV02pncvbr1u:1118_3: śiro 'cchinat sa pravargyo 'bhavad yajño vai makho yat pravargyaṃ pravṛñjanti yajñasyaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:1119: (PB 7.5.7) tad devā yaśo vyabhajanta tasyāgnī rauravaṃ prābṛhata
GV02pncvbr1u:1120: (PB 7.5.8) tad vai sa paśuvīryaṃ prābṛhata paśavo vai rauravam
GV02pncvbr1u:1124: asurā vai devān paryayatanta tata etāv agnī rūrau viṣvañcau stobhāv apaśyat tābhyām enān pratyauṣat te pratyuṣyamāṇā aravanta yad aravanta tasmād rauravam
GV02pncvbr1u:1125: (PB 7.5.12) athendro yaudhājayaṃ prābṛhata tad vai sa vajraṃ prābṛhata vajro vai yaudhājayam
GV02pncvbr1u:1126: (PB 7.5.13) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1130: (PB 7.5.17) tad vai sa prāṇvīryaṃ prābṛhata prāṇā vā auśanam
GV02pncvbr1u:1131: (PB 7.5.18) sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1134: uśanā vai kāvyo 'surāṇāṃ purohita āsīt taṃ devāḥ kāmadughābhir apāmantrayanta tasmā etāny auśanāni prāyacchan kāmadughā vā auśanāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1135: (PB 7.5.21) kāmadughā enam upatiṣṭhante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1137: prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa tūṣṇīṃ manasādhyāyat tasya yan manasy āsīt tad bṛhat samabhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1138: (PB 7.6.2) sa ādadhīta garbho vai me 'yam antarhitas taṃv vācā prajanayā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1139: (PB 7.6.3) sa vācaṃ vyasṛjata sā vāg rathantaram anvapadyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1140: (PB 7.6.4) ratham aryāḥ kṣeplātārīd iti tad rathantarasya rathantaratvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1141: (PB 7.6.5) tato bṛhad anu prājāyata bṛhan maryā idaṃ sa jyog antarabhūd iti tad bṛhato bṛhattvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1142: (PB 7.6.6) yathā vai putro jyeṣṭha evaṃ bṛhat prajāpateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1144: (PB 7.6.8) pra jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1146: yan nv ity āhur bṛhat pūrvaṃ prajāpatau samabhavat kasmād rathantaraṃ pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśa iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1147: (PB 7.6.10) bṛhad eva pūrvaṃ samabhavad rathantaraṃ tu pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyāsṛjata tasmāt pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:1149: tayoḥ samānaṃ nidhanam āsīt tasmin nātiṣṭhetāṃ ta ājim aitāṃ tayor has iti bṛhat prāṇam udajayad as iti rathantaram apānam abhisamaveṣṭata
GV02pncvbr1u:1151: prāṇāpānau vai bṛhadrathantare jyog āmayāvina ubhe kuryād apakrāntau vā etasya prāṇāpānau yasya jyog āmayati prāṇāpānāv evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1153: yan nv ity āhur ubhe bṛhadrathantare bahirṇidhane kasmād bṛhad bahirṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntarṇidhanāni rathantaram iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1155: prāṇo bṛhat tasmād bahirṇidhanāni bhajate bahir hi prāṇo 'pāno rathantaraṃ tasmād antarṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntar hy apānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1157: (PB 7.6.16) yad vai mahāvṛkṣau samṛcchete bahu tatra vibhagnaṃ prabhagnaṃ śete
GV02pncvbr1u:1159_0: airaṃ vai bṛhad aiḍaṃ rathantaraṃ mano vai bṛhad vāg rathantaraṃ sām a vai bṛhad
GV02pncvbr1u:1159_1: ṛg rathantaraṃ prāṇo vai bṛhad apāno rathantaram asau vai loko bṛhad ayaṃ rathantaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1162: ṛcaḥ prastauty aṣṭāśaphāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1164: dvyakṣareṇottarayor ṛcoḥ prastauti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1165: (PB 7.7.3) pañcākṣareṇa rathantarasya pratiharati pāṅktāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1166: (PB 7.7.4) caturakṣareṇa bṛhataḥ pratiharati catuṣpadas tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1168_0: na vai bṛhan na rathantaram ekaṃ chando 'yacchat tataḥ kakubhāv uttare upādadhus
GV02pncvbr1u:1168_1: tasmād bṛhatī prathamā kakubhāv uttare tasmād bṛhadrathantare ekarcena kurvanti na
GV02pncvbr1u:1169: (PB 7.7.6) nava bṛhato rohān rohati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇān evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1171_0: trīn prathamāyāṃ rohati bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyat tān evāvarundhe trīn madhyamāyāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1171_1: rohaty ātmānaṃ prajāṃ paś+ūṃs tān evāvarundhe trīn uttamāyāṃ rohati traya ime lokā
GV02pncvbr1u:1172: (PB 7.7.8) sarvān kāmān avarundhe ya evaṃv vidvān bṛhato rohān rohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1174: vajreṇa vā etat prastotodgātāram abhipravartayati yad rathantaraṃ prastauti samudram antardhāyodgāyed vāg ity ādeyaṃv vāg vai samudraḥ samudram evāntardadhāty ahiṃsāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1175: (PB 7.7.10) balavad geyaṃ vajram evaṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyudgṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1176: (PB 7.7.11) balvalā kurvatā geyam abhilobhayateva vajram evābhilobhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1179: devaratho vai rathantaram akṣareṇākṣareṇa pratiṣṭhāpayatodgeyam areṇāreṇa hi rathaḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1181: yo vai devaratham ananvālabhyātiṣṭhaty avāsmāt padyata iyaṃ vai devaratha imām ālabhyodgāyen nāsmād avapadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1183: īśvaraṃ vai rathantaram udgātuś cakṣuḥ pramathitoḥ prastuyamāne saṃmīlet svardṛśaṃ prativīkṣeta nainaṃ cakṣur jahāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1185_0: prajananaṃ vai rathantaraṃ yat tasthuṣa ity āhāsthāyukodgātur vāg bhavaty api prajananaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1185_1: hanty asthuṣa iti vaktavyaṃ susthuṣa iti vā sthāyukodgātur vāg bhavati na prajananam api hanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1187: pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta tair devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ rathantaraṃ mahimnā nāśaknod utpatat
GV02pncvbr1u:1188: (PB 7.7.18) tasya vaśiṣṭho mahimno vinidhāya tena stutvā svargaṃl lokam ait tān saṃbhṛtyodgāyet
GV02pncvbr1u:1190: yas te goṣu mahimā yas te apsu rathe vā te stanayitnau ya u te yas te agnau mahimā tena saṃbhava rathantara draviṇavan na edhi
GV02pncvbr1u:1192: apo vā ṛtvyam ārcchat tāsāṃv vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tato vasu vāmaṃ samabhavat tasmin mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatāṃ tāv abrūtāṃv vāmaṃ maryā idaṃ deveṣv ājānīti tasmād vāmadevyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1194: tat parigṛhṇantāv abrūtām idam avidāvedaṃ nau mābhyartiḍhvam iti tat prajāpatir abravīn mad vā etad dhy ajani mama vā etad iti tad agnir abravīn māṃ (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1195_0: vā etad annam ajani mama vā etad iti tad indro 'bravīc chreṣṭhasthā vā etad ahaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1195_1: vaḥ śreṣṭho 'smi mama vā etad iti tad viśve devā abruvann asmaddevatyaṃ vā etad yad
GV02pncvbr1u:1195_2: adbhyo 'dhi samabhūd asmākaṃ vā etad iti tat prajāpatir abravīt sarveṣāṃ na idam
GV02pncvbr1u:1195_3: astu sarva idam upajīvāmeti tat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ sarvadevatyaṃ vai vāmadevyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1197: yat kavatīṣu tena prājāpatyaṃ ko hi prajāpatir yad aniruktāsu tena prājāpatyam anirukto hi prajāpatiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1198: (PB 7.8.4) yad gāyatrīṣu tenāgneyaṃ gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1199: (PB 7.8.5) yat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadadhus tenaindraṃ sarvāṇi hi pṛṣṭhānīndrasya niṣkevalyāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1201: (PB 7.8.7) yad bahudevatyam uttamaṃ padaṃ tena vaiśvadevaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1202: (PB 7.8.8) prajāpatir vā etāṃ gāyatrīṃ yonim apaśyat sa ādīdhītāsmād yoneḥ pṛṣṭhāni sṛjā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1203: (PB 7.8.9) sa rathantaram asṛjata tad rathasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1205: sa bṛhad asṛjata tat stanayitnor ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata sa vairūpam asṛjata tad vā tasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1206: (PB 7.8.11) sa vairūpam asṛjata tad agner ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1207: (PB 7.8.12) sa śakvarīr asṛjata tad apāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1208: (PB 7.8.13) sa revatīr asṛjata tad gavāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1209: (PB 7.8.14) etair vā etāni saha ghoṣair asṛjyanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1210: (PB 7.8.15) sarve 'smin ghoṣāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyā vāco vadanti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1214: (PB 7.9.4) yad dhi putro 'śāntaṃ carati pitā tac chamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1216: ayaṃ vai loko madhyamo vāmadevyam etasmād vā imau lokau viṣvañcāv asṛjyetāṃ bṛhac ca ratantaraṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:1218: yad rathantareṇa stuvanti ye rathantarāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti yad bṛhatā stuvanti ye bārhatāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti te vāmadevyasya stotreṇāvaruddhāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1220: (PB 7.9.8) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1222: antarikṣaṃ vai vāmadevyam adhūnvatevodgeyam adhūtam ivāntarikṣaṃ paśavo vai vāmadevyam ahiṃsatevodgeyaṃ paśūnām ahiṃsāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1223: (PB 7.9.10) katham iva vāmadevyaṃ geyam ity āhuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1224: (PB 7.9.11) yathāṅkulī putrān saṃdaśyāsaṃbhindantī harati yathā vāto 'psu śanair vāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1226: (PB 7.9.13) yo vai svadhūr vāmadevyaṃ gāyati svadhūr bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1227: (PB 7.9.14) yāty asyānyo niyānena nānyasya niyānena yāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1228: (PB 7.9.15) na bṛhato na rathantarasyānurūpaṃ geyaṃ svenaivāyatanena geyam āyatanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1229: (PB 7.9.16) devā vai paśūn vyabhajanta te rudram antarāyaṃs tān vāmadevyasya stotra upekṣate
GV02pncvbr1u:1231: (PB 7.9.18) yan nirāha rudrāya paśūn apidadhāti rudras tāṃ samāṃ paśūn dhātuko bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1233: (PB 7.9.20) āpo vai revatyaḥ paśavo vāmadevyam adbhya evāsmai paśūn prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1234: (PB 7.9.21) anavartiḥ paśuto bhavati prajā svasya mīliteva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1236: (PB 7.10.1) imau vai lokau sahāstāṃ tau viyantāv abrūtāṃv vivāhaṃv vivahāvahai saha nāv astv iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1237: (PB 7.10.2) tayor ayam amuṣmai śyaitaṃ prāyacchan naudhasam asāv asmai
GV02pncvbr1u:1238: (PB 7.10.3) tata enayor nidhane viparyakrāmatāṃ devavivāho vai śyaitanaudhase
GV02pncvbr1u:1239: (PB 7.10.4) pravasīyāṃsaṃ vivāham āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1240: (PB 7.10.5) ito vā ime lokā ūrdhvāḥ kalpamānā yanty amuto 'rvāñcaḥ kalpamānā āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1242: yad rathantareṇa stuvantīmaṃl lokaṃ tena yunakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena naudhasenāmuṃ yad bṛhatā stuvanty amuṃl lokaṃ tena yanakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena śyaitenemam
GV02pncvbr1u:1243: (PB 7.10.7) kḷptān imāl lokān upāste ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1245_0: bṛhadrathantare vai śaitanaudhase yad rathantarāya naudhasaṃ prati prayuñjanti bṛhad
GV02pncvbr1u:1245_1: evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti bṛhad dhy etat paro'kṣaṃ yan naudhasaṃ yad bṛhate śyaitaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1245_2: prati prayuñjanti rathantaram evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti rathantaraṃ hy etat paro'kṣaṃ yac chyaitam
GV02pncvbr1u:1246: (PB 7.10.9) ubhabhyāṃ bṛhadrathantarābhyāṃ stute ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1248: devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tāṃ nodhāḥ kākṣīvata āgacchat te 'bruvann ṛṣir na āgaṃs tasmai brahma dadāmeti tasmā etat sāma prāyacchaṃs tasmān naudhasaṃ brahma vai naudhasam
GV02pncvbr1u:1252: prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān etena sāmnābhivyāharat te 'smā atiṣṭhanta te śetyā abhavan yac chetyā abhavaṃs tasmāc chyaitaṃ paśavo vai śyaitam
GV02pncvbr1u:1255: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā aśocaṃs tāḥ śyaitena huṃmā ity abhyajighrat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā yatraivaṃ vidvāñ chyaitenodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1257: eṣa vai yajamānasya prajāpatir yad udgātā yac chyaitena hiṅ karoti prajāpatir eva bhūtvā prajā abhijihgrati
GV02pncvbr1u:1258: (PB 7.10.17) vasunidhanaṃ bhavati paśavo vai vasu paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1260: āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃv vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanam abhicaraṇīyasya brahmasāma kuryād abhinidhanaṃ mādhyandine pavamāne
GV02pncvbr1u:1262: deveṣur vā eṣā yad vaṣatkāro 'bhīti vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharad abhītyevāsmai vajraṃ prahṛtya deveṣv ā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vidhyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1263: (PB 8.1.3) traikakubhaṃ paśukāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣa ity etāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:1265_0: indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣāṃ traya udaśiṣyanta rāyovājo bṛhadgiriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1265_1: pṛthuraśmis te 'bruvan ko naḥ putrān bhariṣyantīty aham intīndro 'bravīt tāṃs trikakub
GV02pncvbr1u:1265_2: adhinidhāyācarat sa etat sāmāpaśyad yat trikakub apaśyat tasmāt traikakubham
GV02pncvbr1u:1267_0: sa ātmānam eva punar upādhāvat tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyaṃ na tvad
GV02pncvbr1u:1267_1: anyo maghavann asti ca marḍitendra bravīmi te vaca iti sa etena ca pragāthenaitena
GV02pncvbr1u:1267_2: sāmnā sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata tān ebhyaḥ prāyacchat te pratyatiṣṭhan
GV02pncvbr1u:1269: yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syād yah pratiṣṭhākāma etasmin pragātha etena sāmnā stuvīta pra sahasraṃ paśūn āpnoti pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1271: trivīryaṃ vā etat sāma trīndriyam aindrya ṛca aindraṃ sāmaindreti nidhanam indriya eva vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1274: ime vai lokāḥ sahāsaṃs te 'śocantaṃs teṣām indra etena sāmnā śucam apāhan yat trayāṇāṃ śocatām apāhaṃs tasmāt traiśokam
GV02pncvbr1u:1275: (PB 8.1.10) yāsmād apāhan sā puṃścalīṃ prāviśad yām antarikṣāt sā klībaṃ yām amuṣmāt sainasvinam
GV02pncvbr1u:1276: (PB 8.1.11) tasmāt teṣāṃ nāśaitavyā ya eṣām āśāmeti tasmā eva śuco 'pabhajate
GV02pncvbr1u:1278: śucā vā eṣa viddho yasya jyog āmayati yat traiśokaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śucam evāsmād apahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1279: (PB 8.1.13) diveti nidhanam upayanti vyuṣṭir vai divā vy evāsmai vāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1282_0: kaṇvo vā etat sāmarte nidhanam apaśyat sa na pratyatiṣṭhat sa vṛṣadaṃśasyāṣiti kṣuvata
GV02pncvbr1u:1282_1: upāśṛṇot sa tad eva nidhanam apaśyat tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhad yad etat sāma bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:1285: vasiṣṭho vā etat putrahataḥ sāmāpaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad etat sāma bhavati prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1288: atharvāṇo vā etal lokākāmāḥ sāmāpaśyaṃs tenāmartyaṃl lokam apaśyan yad etat sāma bhavati svargasya lokasya prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1291: abhīvartena vai devā asurān abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati bhrātṛvyasyābhivṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1294: prajāpatir uṣasam adhyait svāṃ duhitaraṃ tasya retaḥ parāpatat tad asyāṃ nyaṣicyata tad aśrīṇād idaṃ me mā duṣad iti tat sad akarot paśūn eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1295: (PB 8.2.11) yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śrīṇāti caivenaṃ sac ca karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1297_0: devāś ca vā asurāś caiṣu lokeṣv aspardhanta te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya
GV02pncvbr1u:1297_1: etat sāma prāyacchad etenainān kālayiṣyaddham iti tenainān ebhyo lokebhyo 'kālayanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1298: (PB 8.3.2) ebhyo vai lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ kālayate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1300: stomo vai deveṣu taro nāmāsīd yajño 'sureṣu vidadvasus te devās tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti stomena yajñam asurāṇām āvṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1301: (PB 8.3.4) stomena yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1303: sāhdyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ lokeyena samatanvan yat kāleyaṃ bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya saṃtatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1305: vidadvasu vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti prastauti tṛtīyasavanam eva tad abhyativadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1307_0: sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi kāleyaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato rohān rohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1307_1: tena bārhataṃ yat stobhavān pratihāras tena bārhataṃ yad dravadiḍaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_0: sādhyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te sarveṇa yajñena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs te devāśīchandāṃsy
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_1: abruvan somam āharateti te jagatīṃ prāhiṇvan sā trīṇy akṣarāṇi hitvaikākṣarā bhūtvāgacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_2: triṣṭubhaṃ prāhiṇvan saikam akṣaraṃ hitvā tryakṣarā bhūtvāgacchad gāyatrīṃ prāhiṇvaṃś
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_3: caturakṣarāṇi vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsan sā tāni cākṣarāṇi haranty āgacchad aṣṭākṣarā
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_4: bhūtvā trīṇi ca savanāni hastābhyāṃ dve savane dantair daṃṣṭvā tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_5: dve aṃśumatī savane dhītaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ dantair hi tad daṃṣṭvā dhayanty aharat tasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_6: ye hriyamāṇasyāṃśavaḥ parāpataṃs te pūtīkā abhavan yāni puṣpāṇy avāśīyanta tāny arjjunāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_7: yat prāprothat te praprothās tasmāt tṛtīyasavana āśiram avanayanti yam eva taṃ gāvaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_8: somam adanti tasya taṃ rasam avanayanti sasomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1311_0: te triṣṭub jagatyai gāyatrīm abrūtām upa tvāyāveti sābravīt kiṃ me tataḥ syād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1311_1: yat kāmayasa ity abrūtāṃ sābvravīn mama sarvaṃ prātaḥsavanam aham uttare savane praṇayānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1311_2: tasmād gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ gāyatry uttare savane praṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1313: tān triṣṭup tribhir akṣarair upait saikādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata tāṃ jagaty ekenākṣareṇopait sā dvādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1314: (PB 8.4.4) tasmād āhur gāyatrī vāva sarvāṇi cchandāṃsi gāyatrī hy etān poṣān puṣyanty aid iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1316_0: indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat tad devāḥ svādiṣṭhayeti asvadayan madiṣṭhayeti
GV02pncvbr1u:1316_1: madvad akurvan pavasva soma dhārayety apāvayann indrāya pātave suta iti tato vai
GV02pncvbr1u:1316_2: tad indra upāvartata yat svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti prastauti tṛtīyasavanasya sendratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1318: svādiṣṭhā vai deveṣu paśava āsan madiṣṭhā asureṣu te devāḥ svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti paśūn asurāṇām avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1319: (PB 8.4.7) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1322: sādhyā vai nāmadevā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ saṃhitena samadadhur yat samadadhus tasmāt saṃhitam
GV02pncvbr1u:1323: (PB 8.4.10) kāleyaṃ purastād bhavati saṃhitam upariṣṭād etābhyāṃ hi tṛtīyasavanaṃ saṃtāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1325: sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi saṃhitaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yad padanidhanaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1328_0: uṣṇikkakubbhyāṃ vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat kakubhi parākramatoṣṇihā prāharat
GV02pncvbr1u:1328_1: tasmāt kakubho madhyamaṃ padaṃ bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ parākramaṇaṃ hi tad abhi samauhat
GV02pncvbr1u:1328_2: tasmād uṣṇiha uttamaṃ padaṃ bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ puro gurur iva hi vajraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1329: (PB 8.5.3) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1331: nāsike vā ete yajñasya yad uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt samānaṃ chandaḥ satī nānā yajñaṃv vahatas tasmāt samānāyā nāsikāyāḥ satyā nānā prāṇāv uccarataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1333: prāṇā vā uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vaṣaṭ kurvanti yad vaṣaṭ kuryuḥ prāṇān agnau pradadhyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1335_0: tāsu saphaṃ vipham iva vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanasya saphatvāyāthauṣkalam etena
GV02pncvbr1u:1335_1: vai prajāpatiḥ puṣkalān paśūn asṛjata teṣu rūpam adadhād yad etat sāma bhavati paśuṣv eva rūpaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1337_0: purojitī vo andhasa iti padyā cākṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ padyayā vai devāḥ svargaṃl
GV02pncvbr1u:1337_1: lokam āyann akṣaryayā ṛṣayo nu prājānān yad ete padyā cākṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1340: śyāvāśvam ārvanānasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ dhanvodavahan sa etat sāmāpaśyat tena vṛṣṭim asṛjata tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata gātuvid vā etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1343: indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat taṃ devāḥ śyāvāślvenaihāyi ehiyety anvāhvayan sa upāvartata yad etat sāma bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya sendratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1345_0: athaitad āndhīgavam andhīgur vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1345_1: yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ bhavaty etena vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1345_2: pratiṣṭhitaṃ yan madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1346: (PB 8.5.13) daśākṣaraṃ madhyato nidhanam upayanti daśākṣarā virāḍ virājy eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1347: (PB 8.5.14) abhi priyāṇi pavata iti kāvaṃ prājāpatyaṃ sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1348: (PB 8.5.15) prajā vai priyāṇi paśavaḥ priyāṇi prajāyām eva paśuṣu pratitiṣtśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1350: raśmī vā etau yajñasya yad auśanakāve devakośo vā eṣa yajñam abhisamubjito yad ete antato bhavato yajñasyāriṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1351: (PB 8.6.1) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tasya yo raso 'tyaricyata tad yajñāyajñīyam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1353: brahmaṇo vā eṣa raso yad yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad yajñāyajñīyena stuvanti brahmaṇa eva rase yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1354: (PB 8.6.3) yonir vai yajñāyajñīyam etasmād vai yoneḥ prajāpatir yajñam asṛjata tasmād yajñāyajñīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1356: tasmād vā etena purā brāhmaṇā bahiṣpavamānam astoṣata yoner yajñaṃ pratanavāmahā iti yajñaṃ tataḥ stuvanti yonau yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1358_0: asureṣu vai sarvo yajña āsīt te devā yajñāyajñīyam apaśyaṃs teṣāṃ yajñā-yajñā vo
GV02pncvbr1u:1358_1: agnaya ity agnihotram avṛñjata girā-girā ca dakṣasa iti darśapūrṇamāsau pra-pra vayam
GV02pncvbr1u:1358_2: amṛtaṃ jātavedasam iti cāturmāsyāni priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam iti saumyam adhvaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1360_0: yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣase pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:1360_1: iti vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsaṃs te devā abhyārambham abhinivartyaṃ cchandobhir yajñam asurāṇām avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1361: (PB 8.6.7) chandobhir yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1363: etad dha sma vā āha kūśāmbaḥ svāyavo brahmā lātavyaḥ kaṃ svid adya śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā gariṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1365: eṣā vai śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad girā-girety āhātmānaṃ tad udgātā girati
GV02pncvbr1u:1366: (PB 8.6.10) airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam irāyāṃ yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayaty apramāyuka udgātā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1368: vaiśvānare vā etad udgātātmānaṃ pradadhāti yat pra-pra vayam ity āha praprīṃ vayam iti vaktavyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:1370_0: yo vai nihnuvānaṃ cchanda upaiti pāpīyān ujjagivān bhavaty etad vai nihnuvānaṃ cchando
GV02pncvbr1u:1370_1: yan na śaṃsiṣam iti nu śaṃsiṣam iti vaktavyaṃ suśaṃsiṣam iti vā na nihnuvānaṃ chanda
GV02pncvbr1u:1372_0: yasya vai yajñā vāgantā bhavanti vācaś chidreṇa sravanty ete vai yajñā vāgantā ye
GV02pncvbr1u:1372_1: yajñāyajñīyāntā etad vācaś chidraṃ yad anṛtaṃ yad agniṣṭomayājy anṛtam āha tad anv
GV02pncvbr1u:1372_2: asya yajñaḥ sravaty akṣareṇāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpyam akṣareṇaiva yajñasya cchidram api dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1373: (PB 8.6.14) virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad akṣaraṃ virājy evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1375_0: ito vai prātar ūrdhvāṇi cchandāṃsi yujyante 'muto 'vāñci yajñāyajñīyasya stotre yujyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1375_1: yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣasa iti dvādaśākṣaraṃ pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam ity
GV02pncvbr1u:1375_2: ekādaśākṣaraṃ priyaṃ mitraṃn na śaṃsiṣam ity aṣṭākṣaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1376: (PB 8.7.2) anuṣṭubham uttamāṃ saṃpādayatīyaṃ vā anuṣṭub asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1377: (PB 8.7.3) vāg vā anuṣṭub vācy eva pratitiṣṭhati jyaiṣṭhyaṃ vā anuṣṭub jaiṣṭhya eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1379: katham iva yajñāyajñīyaṃ geyam ity āhur yathānaḍvān prasrāvayamāṇa ittham iva cettham iva ceti
GV02pncvbr1u:1381: vaiśvānaraṃ vā etad udgātānu prasīdann etīty āhur yad yajñāyajñīyasyarcaṃ saṃpratyāheti parikrāmatevodgeyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:1383: vaiśvānare vā etad adhvaryuḥ sadasyān abhisṛjati yad yajñāyajñīyasya stotram upāvartayati prāvṛtenodgeyaṃv vaiśvānareṇānabhidāhāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1385_0: na ha tu vai pitaraḥ prāvṛtaṃ jānanti yajñāyajñīyasya vai stotre pitaro yathāyathaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1385_1: jijñāsanta ākarṇābhyāṃ prāvṛtyaṃ tad eva prāvṛtaṃ tad aprāvṛtaṃ jānanti pitaro na vaiśvānaro hinasti
GV02pncvbr1u:1386: (PB 8.7.8) apaḥ paścāt patnya upasṛjanti vaiśvānaram eva tac chamayanty āpo hi śāntiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1387: (PB 8.7.9) atho reta eva tat siñcanty āpo hi retaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1388: (PB 8.7.10) dakṣiṇān ūrūn abhiṣiñcanti dakṣiṇato hi retaḥ sicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1389: (PB 8.7.11) mahad iva pratyūhyaṃ mana evāsya taj janayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1391: (PB 8.7.13) hiṅkāraṃ prati saṃkhyāpayanti hiṅkṛtād dhi reto 'dhīyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1394_0: devā vā agniṣṭomam abhijityokthāni nāśaknuvann abhijetuṃ te 'gnim abruvaṃs tvayā
GV02pncvbr1u:1394_1: mukhenedaṃ cayāmeti so 'bravīt kiṃ me tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayasa ity abruvan so
GV02pncvbr1u:1396: (PB 8.8.3) tasmād u gāyatrīṣu gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1398: te 'gniṃ mukhaṃ kṛtvā sākam aśvenābhyakrāman yat sākam aśvenābhyakrāmaṃs tasmāt sākamaśvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1399: (PB 8.8.5) tasmāt sākamaśvenokthāni praṇayanty etena hi tāny agre 'bhyajayan
GV02pncvbr1u:1401: sa indro 'bravīt kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti varuṇas taṃv varuṇo 'nvatiṣṭhad indra āharat tasmād aindrāvaruṇam anuśasyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1403_0: sa evābravīt kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti bṛhaspatis taṃ bṛhaspatir
GV02pncvbr1u:1403_1: anvatiṣṭad indra āharat tasmād aindrābārhaspatyam anuśasyate sa evābravīt kaś cāhaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1403_2: cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti viṣṇus taṃ viṣṇur anvatiṣṭad indra āharat tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:1404: (PB 8.8.8) paśūn vā ebhyas tān āharat paśavo vā ukthāni paśukāma ukthena stuvīta paśumān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1405: (PB 8.8.9) bṛhatā vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat tasya tejaḥ parāpatat tat saubharam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1407_0: jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yad rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ rathantaraṃ saṃdhir nāntarā
GV02pncvbr1u:1407_1: bṛhatā stuvantīti yat saubhareṇa stuvanti bṛhataiva tad antarā stuvanti bṛhato hy
GV02pncvbr1u:1409: yadi bṛhat sāmātirātraḥ syāt saubharam ukthānāṃ brahma sāma kāryaṃ bṛhad eva tat tejasā samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1412_0: devānāṃ vai svargaṃl lokaṃ +yatāṃ diśo 'vlīyanta tāḥ saubhareṇo ity udastaṃbhuvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:1412_1: tato vai tā adṛṃhanta tataḥ pratyatiṣṭhaṃs tataḥ svargaṃl lokaṃ prājānan yaḥ svargakāmaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1412_2: syād yaḥ pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta pra svargaṃl lokaṃ jānāti pratitṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1414: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā āśanāyaṃs tābhyaḥ saubhareṇorg ity annaṃ prāyacchat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1415: (PB 8.8.15) samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā yatraivaṃv vidvān saubhareṇodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1416: (PB 8.8.16) tā abruvan subhṛtaṃ no 'bhārṣīr iti tasmāt saubharam
GV02pncvbr1u:1417: (PB 8.8.17) vṛṣṭiṃ vā abhyastāṃ prāyacchad annam eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1418: (PB 8.8.18) yo vṛṣṭikāmaḥ syād yo 'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta
GV02pncvbr1u:1419: (PB 8.8.19) hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryād ūrg ity annādyakāmāyo iti svargakāmāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1420: (PB 8.8.20) sarve vai kāmāḥ saubharaṃ sarveṣv eva kāmeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1423: nṛmedhasam āṅgirasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ śvabhir abhyāhvayan so 'gnim upādhāvat pāhi no agna ekayeti taṃv vaiśvānaraḥ paryudatiṣṭhat tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata
GV02pncvbr1u:1424: (PB 8.8.23) gātuvid vā etat sāma vindate gātuṃ pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1425: (PB 8.8.24) naiva hy etad ahno rūpaṃ na rātrer yad ukthānām
GV02pncvbr1u:1426: (PB 8.8.25) kakup prathamāthoṣṇig atha purauṣṇig anuṣṭup tenānuṣṭubho nayanty acchāvākasāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1429: asurā vā eṣu lokeṣv āsaṃs tān devā hariśriyam ity asmāl lokāt prāṇudanta virājasīty antarikṣād divo-diva ity amuṣmāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1430: (PB 8.9.3) tad ya evaṃ vedaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudyemāṃl lokān abhyārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1432: harivarṇo vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭaiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1434: aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃl lokaṃ yato rakṣāṃsy anvasacanta tāny etena harivarṇo 'pāhanta yad etat sāma bhavati rakṣasām apahatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1436: pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta teṣāṃ yat tejo raso 'tyaricyata tad devāḥ samabharaṃs tad udvaṃśīyam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1438: sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ tejo yad udvaṃśīyaṃ tasmād vā etat purā sajātāya nākran pāpavasīyaso vidhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1439: (PB 8.9.8) eṣa hy eva pṛṣṭhais tuṣṭuvāno ya udvaṃśīyena stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:1441: (PB 8.9.10) gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇa eti rathantarasya rūpam eti hi rathantaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1442: (PB 8.9.11) ādir bṛhata ūrdhvam iva hi bṛhat
GV02pncvbr1u:1446: (PB 8.9.15) ardheḍayā vai devā asurān avahatyātisvāreṇa svargaṃl lokam ārohan
GV02pncvbr1u:1447: (PB 8.9.16) tad ya evaṃv vedārdheḍayaiva bhrātṛvyam avahatyātisvāreṇa svargaṃl lokam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1448: (PB 8.9.17) ardheḍayā vai pūrvaṃ yajñaṃ saṃsthāpayanty atisvāreṇottram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1449: (PB 8.9.18) upainam uttaro yajño namati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1450: (PB 8.9.19) pāṅktaṃ vā etat sāma pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavo yajña eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1453: aṣṭādaṃṣṭro vairūpo 'putro 'prajā ajīryat sa imāṃl lokān vicicchidvāṃ amanyata sa ete jarasi sāmanī apaśyat tayor aprayogād abibhet so 'bravīd ṛdhnavad yobhe sāmabhyāṃ stavatā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1454: (PB 8.9.22) ṛṣer vā etat prāśodbhūtaṃ yad aṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavata ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1456: gāyatrīṣu brahmavarcasakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur gāyatryāṃ brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā gāyatrī saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1457: (PB 8.10.2) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1459: gāyatrīṣu paśukāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣoṣṇik saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1462: gāyatrīṣu puruṣakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyuḥ kakubhi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā kakup saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1465: virāṭsv annādyakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā virāṭ saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1468: akṣarapaṅktiṣu jyaiṣṭhyakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣānuṣṭup saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1471_0: devā vā ukthāny abhijitya rātriṃ nāśaknuvann abhijetuṃ te 'surān rātriṃ tamaḥ praviṣṭāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1471_1: nānuvyapaśyaṃs ta etam anuṣṭupśirasaṃ pragāthm apaśyan virājaṃ jyotiḥ tān virājā
GV02pncvbr1u:1473: yad eṣo 'nuṣṭupśirāḥ pragātho bhavati virāḍ eva jyotiṣānupaśyann anuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātrer bhrātṛvyaṃ nirhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1474: (PB 9.1.3) tān samantaṃ paryāyaṃ prāṇudanta yat paryāyaṃ prāṇudanta tat paryāyāṇāṃ paryāyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1475: (PB 9.1.4) prathamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti prathamasya paryāyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1476: (PB 9.1.5) prathamair hi padaiḥ punar ādāya prathamarātrāt prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1477: (PB 9.1.6) pāntam ā vo andhasa iti prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:1478: (PB 9.1.7) ahar vai pāntam andho rātrir ahnaiva tad rātrim ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1481: vītahavyaḥ śrāyaso jyog niruddha etat sāmāpaśyat so 'vagacchat pratyatiṣṭhad avagacchati pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1483: tam iva vā ete praviśantiye rātrim upayanti yad eko nidhanaṃ rātrer mukhe bhavati prajñātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1484: (PB 9.1.11) yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam oka āgacchati sarvaṃ tarhi prajānāti sarvam asmai divā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1485: (PB 9.1.12) te madhyamaṃ paryāyam aśrayanta teṣām aurdhvasadmanena vācam avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1486: (PB 9.1.13) vācaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1489: yathā vā ahno mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ triṇidhanāyatanam evam eṣa rātrer madhyamaḥ paryāyas triṇidhanāyatanaḥ salokatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1491: madhyamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti madhyamasya paryāyasya madhyamair hi padaiḥ punar ādāyaṃ madhyamarātrāt prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1493: ta uttamaṃ paryāyam aśrayanta teṣāṃ ghṛtaścyun nidhanena paśūn avṛñjata paśavo vai ghṛtaścyutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1494: (PB 9.1.18) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1496: uttamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanty uttamasya paryāyasyottamair hi padaiḥpunar ādāyam uttamarātrāt prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1499: (PB 9.1.22) asaṃhāyyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ gamayati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1500: (PB 9.1.23) eṣā vā agniṣṭomasya saṃmā yad rātriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1501: (PB 9.1.24) dvādaśa stotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśa strotrāṇi rātriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1502: (PB 9.1.25) eṣā vā ukthasya saṃmā yad rātriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1505: yathā vā ahna ukthāny evam eṣa rātreḥ sandhir nānārūpāṇy ahna ukthāni nānārūpā ete tṛcā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1507: (PB 9.1.29) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1509: (PB 9.1.31) svargo loko bṛhat svarga eva loke pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1510: (PB 9.1.32) vāravantīyaṃ vā vāmadevyaṃ vā śruddhyaṃ vai teṣām ekaṃ paśukāmāya sandhiṃ kuryāt

GV02pncvbr1u:1641_0: etad anyat kuryur ukthāni praṇayeyur ukthāni vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo

GV02pncvbr1u:1641_2: 'bhyatiricyate ya ukthyebhyo 'tiricyate yadi rātrer atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1641_3: bṛhatā stuyur eṣu tu vā atiricyata ity āhur yo rātrer atiricyata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1643: amuṃ vā eṣa lokaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo rātrer atiricyate bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhad amuṃ lokam āptum arhati tam evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1645: yadi dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate dagdhvāsthīny upanahya yo nediṣṭhī syāt taṃ dīkṣayitvā saha yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:1647: etad anyat kuryur abhiṣutyānyat somam agṛhītvā grahān yāsau dakṣiṇā sraktis tad vā stuyur mārjālīye vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1648: (PB 9.8.3) api vā etasya yajñe yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate tam etena niravadayante

GV02pncvbr1u:1658: (PB 9.8.12) agna āyūṃṣi pavasa iti pratipatkāryā ya eva jīvanti teṣv āyur dadhāti

GV02pncvbr1u:1661: (PB 9.8.14) vṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ syuḥ saptadaśam itarat sarvam

GV02pncvbr1u:1665: prāṇāpānair vā ete vyṛdhyanta ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīti maitrāvaruṇāgrān grahān gṛhṇate prāṇāpānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇāpānair eva samṛdhyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1666: (PB 9.9.1) yasya kalaśa upadasyati kalaśam evāsyopadasyantaṃ prāṇo 'nūpadasyati prāṇo hi somaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:1670: (PB 9.9.4) prāṇā vā āpo 'mṛtaṃ hiraṇyam amṛta evāsya prāṇān dadhāti sa sarvam āyur eti

GV02pncvbr1u:1672: (PB 9.9.6) yam adhvaryur antato grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tasyāptum avanayet
