GV02pncvbr1u:2253: (PB 12.11.8) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2256_0: aṅgiraso vai sattram āsata teṣām āptaḥ spṛtaḥ svargo loka āsīt panthānaṃ tu devayānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2256_1: na prājānaṃs teṣāṃ kalyāṇa āṅgiraso dhyāyam udavrajat sa ūrṇāyuṃ gandharvam apsarasāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2256_2: madhye preṅkhayamāṇam upait sa iyām iti yāṃ yām abhyadiśat sainam akāmayata tam abhyavadat
GV02pncvbr1u:2256_3: kālyāṇā3 ity āso vai vaḥ spṛtaḥ svargo lokaḥ panthānaṃ tu devayānaṃ na prajānīthedaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2256_4: sāma svargyaṃ lokam eṣy atha mā tu vocoham adarśam iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2258_0: sa ait kalyāṇaḥ so 'bravīd āpto vai naḥ spṛtaḥ svargo lokaḥ panthānaṃ tu devayānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2258_1: prajānīma idaṃ sāma svargyaṃ tena stutvā svargaṃ lokam eṣyāma iti kas te 'vocad ity
GV02pncvbr1u:2258_2: aham evādarśam iti tena stutvā svargaṃ lokam āyann ahīyata kalyāṇo 'nṛtaṃ hi so 'vadat sa eṣaḥ śvitraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2259: (PB 12.11.12) svargyaṃ vā etat sāma svargalokaḥ puṇyaloko bhavaty aurṇāyavena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2262: sāmārṣeyeṇa praśastaṃ tvaṃ hīty annādyasyāvarudhyai hīti vā annaṃ pradīyate ṣoḍaśinam u caivaitenodyacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:2265: (PB 12.11.17) ātamitor nidhanam upayanty āyur eva sarvam āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2268: jyāyo 'bhyārambham atihāya pañcam ahaḥ ṣaṣṭhasyāhna ārambhas tena ṣaṣṭham ahar ārabhante santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2273: (PB 12.11.24) etasmin vai vairājaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ pratitiṣṭhati vātsapreṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2275: vatsaprīr bhālandanaḥ śraddhāṃ nāvindata sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad vātsapram apaśyat sa śraddhām avindata śraddhā vindāmahā iti vai sattram āsate vindate śraddhām
GV02pncvbr1u:2276: (PB 12.11.26) īnidhanaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ nidhanāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanty ahno dhṛtyai stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2278: (PB 12.12.2) avardhanta hy etarhi yajamānam eva tathā vardhayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2280: ''vayam u tvām apūrvya-'' ity apūrvāṃ hy etarhi prajāpates tanūm agacchann apūrvam evaitayā yajamānaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2282: ''imam indra sutaṃ piba jyeṣṭham amartyaṃ madam'' iti jyaiṣṭhaṃ hy etarhi vāco 'gacchan jyaiṣṭhyam evaitayā yajamānaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2285: sindhukṣid vai rājanyarṣir jyog aparuddhaś caran sa etat saindhukṣitam apaśyat so 'vāgacchat pratyatiṣṭhad avagacchati pratitiṣṭhati saindhukṣitena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2287: (PB 12.12.8) pannam iva vai caturtham ahas tad etena bṛhatas tejasottabhnoti saubhareṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:2290: etena vai vasiṣṭha indrasya premāṇam agacchat premāṇaṃ devatānāṃ gacchati vāsiṣṭhena tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2292_0: indraś ca bṛhac ca samabhavatāṃ tam indraṃ bṛhad ekayā tanvāty aricyata tasyā abibhedanayā
GV02pncvbr1u:2292_1: mābhibhaviṣyatīti so 'bravīt ṣoḍaśī te 'yaṃ yajñakratur astv iti sa ṣoḍaśy abhavat tad asya janma
GV02pncvbr1u:2293: (PB 12.13.2) atiśriyā bhrātṛvyaṃ ricyate yo gāyatrīṣu dvipadāsu bṛhatā ṣoḍaśinā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:2294: (PB 12.13.3) ''upa no haribhiḥ stutam'' ity etā vai gāyatryo dvipadā etāsu stotavyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2296: indraḥ prajāpatim upādhāvad vṛtraṃ hanānīti tasmā etām anuṣṭubham apaharasaṃ prāyacchat tayā nāstṛṇuta yad astṛtā vyanadat tan nānadasya nānadatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2297: (PB 12.13.5) taṃ punar upādhāvat tasmai saptānāṃ hotrāṇāṃ haro nirmāya prāyacchat tam astṛṇuta
GV02pncvbr1u:2298: (PB 12.13.6) stṛṇute taṃ yaṃ tustūrṣate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2300: tasmād dharivatīṣu stuvanti harivatīḥ śaṃsanti harivatīṣu graho gṛhyate haro hy asmai nirmāya prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:2302: ekaviṃśāyatano vā eṣa yat ṣoḍaśī sapta hi prātassavane hotrā vaṣaṭkurvanti sapta mādhyandine savane sapta tṛtīyasavane
GV02pncvbr1u:2305: gaurīvitir vā etac chāktyo brahmaṇo 'tiriktam apaśyat tad gaurīvitam abhavad atiriktaṃ etad atiriktena stuvanti yad gaurīvitena ṣoḍaśinaṃ śvastanavān bhavaty api prajāyā upakḷptaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2307: viśālaṃ libjayā śrūtyābhyadhād iti hovācopoditir gopāleyo 'nuṣṭubhi nānadam akar gaurīvitena ṣoḍaśinam astoṣṭāñjasā śriyam upāgān na śriyā avapadyata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2309: eṣa vai viśālaṃ libjayā bhūtyābhidadhāti yo 'nuṣṭubhi nānadaṃ kṛtvā gaurīvitena ṣoḍaśinā stute 'ñjasā śriyam upaiti na śriyā avapadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2310: (PB 12.13.13) śakvarīṣu ṣoḍaśinā stuvīta yaḥ kāmayeta vajrī syām iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2311: (PB 12.13.14) vajro vai ṣoḍaśī vajraḥ śakvaryo vajreṇaivāsmai vajraṃ spṛṇoti vajrī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2312: (PB 12.13.15) anuṣṭupsu ṣoḍaśinā stuvīta yaḥ kāmayeta na mā vāg ativadet
GV02pncvbr1u:2313: (PB 12.13.16) vajro vai ṣoḍaśī vāg anuṣṭub vajreṇaivāsmai vācaṃ spṛṇoti nainaṃ vāg ativadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2314: (PB 12.13.17) ''asāvi soma indra ta'' ity etāsu stotavyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2316: virāṭsv annādyakāmaḥ ṣoḍaśinā stuvīta vajro vai ṣoḍaśī vairājam annaṃ vajreṇaivāsmā annaṃ spṛṇoty annādo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2317: (PB 12.13.19) ''pra vo mahe vṛdhe bharadhvam'' ity etāsu stotavyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2318: (PB 12.13.20) trayastriṃśadakṣarā vā etā virājo yad ekaviṃśatiḥ pratiṣṭhā sā yad dvādaśa prajātiḥ sā
GV02pncvbr1u:2319: (PB 12.13.21) pratiṣṭhāya prajāyate no cāntasthāyāṃ jīryate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2320: (PB 12.13.22) atha vā etā ekapadās tryakṣarā viṣṇoś chando bhurijaḥ śakvaryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2321: (PB 12.13.23) etābhir vā indro vṛtram ahan kṣipraṃ vā etābhiḥ pāpmānaṃ hanti kṣipraṃ vasīyān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2323: catustriṃśadakṣarāḥ saṃstuto bhavati trayastriṃśaddevattāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evopayanty ariṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2324: (PB 12.13.25) hiraṇyaṃ sampradāyaṃ ṣoḍaśinā stuvate jyotiṣmān asya ṣoḍaśī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2325: (PB 12.13.26) aśvaḥ kṛṣṇa upatiṣṭhati sāmyekṣayāya bhrātṛvyalokam eva sa vidhamaṃs tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2327_0: ekākṣaraṃ vai devānām avamaṃ chanda āsīt saptākṣaraṃ paramaṃ navākṣaram asurāṇām
GV02pncvbr1u:2327_1: avamaṃ chanda āsīt pañcadaśākṣaraṃ paramaṃ devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta tān prajāpatir
GV02pncvbr1u:2327_2: ānuṣṭubho bhūtvāntarātiṣṭhat taṃ devāsurā vyahvayanta sa devān upāvartata tato devā abhavan parāsurāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2328: (PB 12.13.28) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2330_0: te devā asurāṇām ekākṣareṇaiva pañcadaśākṣaram avṛñjata dvyakṣareṇa caturdaśākṣaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2330_2: ṣaḍakṣareṇa daśākṣaraṃ saptākṣareṇa navākṣaram aṣṭābhir evāṣṭāv avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:2331: (PB 12.13.30) evam eva bhrātṛvyād bhūtiṃ vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2333: aparuddhayajña iva vā eṣa yat ṣoḍaśī kanīyasvina iva vai tarhi devā āsan bhūyasvino 'surāḥ kanīyasvina bhūyasvinaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2335: ''yasmād anyo na paro 'sti jāto ya ābabhūva bhuvanāni viśvā/ prajāpatiḥ prajayā samvidānas trīṇi jyotīṃ ṣi sacate sa ṣoḍaśī-'' ity udgātā graham avekṣate
GV02pncvbr1u:2336: (PB 12.13.33) jyotiṣmān asya ṣoḍaśī bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2337: (PB 12.13.34) ekaviṃśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2338: (PB 13.1.1) ''govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid'' iti pañcamasyāhnaḥ pratipad bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2339: (PB 13.1.2) govid vā etad vasuvid dhiraṇyavidyac chakvaryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2342: ''tvaṃ suvīro asi somaviśvavid'' ity eṣa yāva suvīro yasya paśavas tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2344: tās te kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtaṃ paya'' iti madhumad vai ghṛtaṃ payaḥ paśavaḥ kṣaranti tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2346: (PB 13.1.7) viśvam eva tadvit tam abhivadati viśvaṃ hi paśubhir vindate
GV02pncvbr1u:2347: (PB 13.1.8) ''pra te sargā asṛkṣata-'' iti sṛṣṭānīva hy etarhy ahāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2349: pūrvam u caiva tad rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpeṇānuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam,
GV02pncvbr1u:2350: anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda stotrīyānurupau tṛcau bhavataḥ prāṇāpānānām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2353: (PB 13.1.12) tṛca uttamo bhavati yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhy udyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2354: (PB 13.1.13) triṇava eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai puṣṭyai trivṛd vā eṣa puṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2355: (PB 13.2.1) ''tava śriyo varṣasy eva vidyuta'' ity āgneyam ājyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2356: (PB 13.2.2) śrīr vai paśavaḥ śrīḥ śakvaryaḥ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2357: (PB 13.2.3) ''agneś cikitra uṣasām ivetaya'' itītānīva hy etarhy ahānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2358: (PB 13.2.4) ''ā te yatente rathyo yathā pṛthag'' ity eva hy etarhy ahāni yatante
GV02pncvbr1u:2359: (PB 13.2.5) ''purūruṇā cid dhy asty avo nūnaṃ vāṃ varuṇa-'' iti maitrāvaruṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2360: (PB 13.2.6) yad vai yajñasya duriṣṭaṃ tad varuṇo gṛhṇāti tad eva tad avayajati
GV02pncvbr1u:2362: (PB 13.2.8) pañca vā ṛtava utthānasya rūpam ojasā sahety ojasaiva vīryeṇa sahottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2364: (PB 13.2.10) rathantaram etat parokṣaṃ yac chakvaryo rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2365: (PB 13.3.1) ''arṣā soma dyumattama'' iti viṣṇumatyo gāyatryo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2366: (PB 13.3.2) brahma vai gāyatrī yajño viṣṇur brahmaṇy eva tad yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2367: (PB 13.3.3) ''soma uṣvāṇas sotṛbhir'' iti simānāṃ rūpaṃ svenaivaitās tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2369: ''yat soma citram ukthyam'' iti gāyatryaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa tasmāt triṣṭubhāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2370: (PB 13.3.5) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2371: (PB 13.3.6) yaṇvaṃ bhavati paśavo vai yaṇvaṃ paśūnām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2375: (PB 13.3.10) etena vai śakalaḥ pañcame 'hani pratyatiṣṭhat pratitiṣṭhati śākalena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2378_0: vṛśo vaijānas tryaruṇasya traidhātavasyaikṣvākasya purohita āsīt sa aikṣvāko 'dhāvayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2378_1: brāhmaṇakumāraṃ rathena vyacchinat sa purohitam abravīt tava mā purodhāyām idam īdṛg
GV02pncvbr1u:2378_2: upāgād iti tam etena sāmnā samairayat tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata kāmasani sāma vārśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2382: etena vai manuḥ prajāpatiṃ bhūmānam agacchat prajāyate bahur bhavati mānavena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2385: etena vai vadhryaśva ānūpaḥ paśūnāṃ bhūmānam āśnuta paśūnāṃ bhūmānam aśnuta ānūpena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2388: māmārṣeyeṇa praśastaṃ yaṃ vai gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ praśaṃsanti vāma iti taṃ praśaṃsanty ahar evaitena praśaṃsanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2392: agriḥ sṛṣṭo nodadīpyata taṃ prajāpatir etena sāmnopādhamat sa udadīpyata dīptiś ca vā etat sāma brahmavarcasaṃ ca dīptiś caivaitena brahmavarcasaṃ cāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2395: śiśur vā āṅgiraso mantrakṛtāṃ mantrakṛd āsīt sa pit.ṛn putrakā ity āmantrayata,
GV02pncvbr1u:2396: taṃ pitaro 'bruvan na dharmaṃ karoṣi yo naḥ pit.ṛn sataḥ putrakā ity āmantrayama iti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2397: so 'bravīd ahaṃ vāva vaḥ pitāsmi yo mantrakṛd asmīti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2398: taṃ deveṣv apṛcchanta te devā abuvann eṣa vāva pitā yo mantrakṛd iti tad vai sa udajayad ujjayati śaiśavena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2400: gāyatrīṣu stuvanti pratiṣṭhāyai brahmavarcasāya yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2401: (PB 13.3.26) viṣṇumatyo gāyatryo bhavanti tad u traiṣṭubhād rūpān na yanti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2403_0: indraḥ prajāpatim upādhāvad vṛtraṃ hanānīti tasmā etac chandobhya indriyaṃ vīryaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2403_1: nirmāya prāyacchad etena śaknuhīti tac chakvarīṇāṃ śakvarītvaṃ sīmānam abhinat tat
GV02pncvbr1u:2403_2: simā mahnyam akarot tan mahnyā mahān ghoṣa āsīt tan mahānāmnyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2404: (PB 13.4.2) diśaḥ pañcapadā dādhārartūn ṣaṭpadā chandāṃsi saptapadā puruṣaṃ dvipadā
GV02pncvbr1u:2405: (PB 13.4.3) dvyopaśāḥ saṃstutā bhavanti tasmād dvyopaśāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2406: (PB 13.4.4) iḍe abhito 'thakāraṃ tasmāc chṛṅge tīkṣṇīyasī stūpāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2411: āpo vai kṣīrarasā āsaṃste devāḥ pāpavasīyasād abibhayur yad apa upanidhāya stuvate pāpavasīyaso vidhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2412: (PB 13.4.9) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2414: gāyatram ayanaṃ bhavati brahmavarcasakāmasya svarṇidhanaṃ madhunāmuṣmiṃl loka upatiṣṭhate,
GV02pncvbr1u:2415: traiṣṭubham ayanaṃ bhavaty ojaskāmasyāthakāraṇidhana mājyenāmuṣmiṃl loka upatiṣṭhate,
GV02pncvbr1u:2416: jāgatam ayanaṃ bhavati paśukāmasyeḍānidhanaṃ payasāmuṣmiṃl loka upatiṣṭhate
GV02pncvbr1u:2418_0: añjasāryo mālyaḥ śakvarīḥ prārautsīd iti hovācālammaṃ pārijānataṃ rajanaḥ kauṇayo
GV02pncvbr1u:2418_1: yady enāḥ pratiṣṭhāpaṃ śakṣyatīty etad vā etāsām añjayati pratiṣṭhitā ya ābhiḥ kṣipraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2421: paśavo vai śakvaryo gauṣṭhaḥ purīṣaṃ goṣṭham eva tat paśubhyaḥ paryasyanti tam evainān pravartyanty avisraṃsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2422: (PB 13.4.14) ''indro madāya vāvṛdha'' ity avardhanta hy etarhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2424: (PB 13.4.16) ''svādor itthā viṣuvata'' iti viṣuvān vai pañcamam ahas tāsu rāyovājīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2426_0: indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣāṃ traya udaśiṣyanta pṛthuraśmir bṛhadgirī
GV02pncvbr1u:2426_1: rāyovājas te 'bruvan ko na imān putrān bhariṣyatīty aham itīndro 'bravīt tān ādhinidhāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2427: vardhayaṃs tān vardhayitvābravīt kumārakā varān vṛṇīdhvam iti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2428: kṣatraṃ mahyam ity abravīt pṛthuraśmis tasmā etena pārthuraśmena kṣatraṃ prāyacchat kṣatrakāma etena stuvīta kṣatrasyaivāsya prakāśo bhavati,
GV02pncvbr1u:2429: brahmavarcasaṃ mahyam ity abravīt bṛhādgiris tasmā etena bārhadgireṇa prāyacchat brahmavarcasakāma etena stuvīta brahmavarcasī bhavati,
GV02pncvbr1u:2430: paśūn mahyam ity abravīd rāyovājas tasmā etena rāyovājīyena paśūn prāyacchat paśukāma etena stuvīta paśumān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2432: pārthuraśmaṃ rājanyāya brahmasāma kuryāt bārhadgiraṃ brāhmaṇāya rāyovājīyaṃ vaiśyāya svenaivenāṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati stomaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:2722_0: indraṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny astuvan sa śarkaraṃ śiśumārarṣim upetyābravīt stuhi meti so

GV02pncvbr1u:2722_2: sa hīna ivāmanyata sa etat sāmāpaśyat tenāpo 'nusamāśnuta tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata

GV02pncvbr1u:2726: (PB 14.5.18) ativiśvāni duritā taremeti yad evaiṣāṃ duṣṭutaṃ duśśastaṃ tad etena taranti

GV02pncvbr1u:3434: (PB 16.16.5) tā u catasras saṃpadyante catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3435: (PB 16.16.6) gāyatrīṃ saṃpadyate tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3436: (PB 16.16.7) prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3437: (PB 16.16.8) ''ayā rucā hariṇyā punāna'' ity ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3439: sarveṣāṃ vā eṣā chandasāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva chandaḥsv ārbhavaṃ pavamānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3440: (PB 16.16.10) tasyāṃ gāyatrapārśvaṃ na gāyatrād eti na sāmno na nidhanāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3442_0: devā vai svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ daivā ahīyanta vrātyāṃ pravasantas ta āgacchan
GV02pncvbr1u:3442_1: yato devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tena taṃ stomaṃ na chando 'vindan yena tān āpsyaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:3442_2: te devā maruto 'bruvann etebhyas taṃ stomaṃ tac chandaḥ prayacchata yenāsmān āpnavān
GV02pncvbr1u:3442_3: iti tebhya etaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ stomaṃ prāyacchan parokṣam anuṣṭubhaṃ tato vai te tān āpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:3444: hīnā vā ete hīyante ye vrātyāṃ pravasanti na hi brahmacaryaṃ caranti na kṛṣiṃ vaṇijyāṃ ṣoḍaśo vā etat stomaḥ samāptum arhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3445: (PB 17.1.3) marutstomo vā eṣa yāni kṣudrāṇi chandāṃsi tāni marutām
GV02pncvbr1u:3447: kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhaty atha yad eṣā dvipadā kakubho loke kriyate rūpeṇaivenāṃs tat samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3449: ''adhāhīndra girvaṇa'' iti viṣamaṃ chando viṣama iva vai vrātaḥ sarvān evaitān samān karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3452: dyutāno mārutas teṣāṃ gṛhapatir āsīt ta etena stomenāyajanta te sarva ārdhnuvan yad etat sāma bhavaty ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3454: yan niruktaṃ nidhanam upeyur gṛhapatir evardhnuyād apetara ārdhnītātha yad aniruktam upayanti sarvān evaitān ṛddhau bhūtau pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3456_0: garagiro vā ete ye brahmādyaṃ janyam annam adanty aduruktavākyaṃ duruktam āhur adaṇḍyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3456_1: daṇḍena ghnantaś caranty adīkṣitā dīkṣitavācaṃ vadanti ṣoḍaśo vā eteṣāṃ stomaḥ pāpmānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3456_2: nirhantum arhati yad ete catvāraḥ ṣoḍaśā bhavanti tena pāpmano 'dhi nirmucyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3457: (PB 17.1.10) ''devo vo draviṇodā'' ity agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ devatāsv evainān pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3459: atho khalv āhuḥ ''adarśi gātuvittama'' ity eva satobṛhatīṣu kāryaṃ viṣama iva vai vrātaḥ sarvān evainān satobṛhataḥ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3461: tad āhuḥ śithilam iva vā etat chandaś carācaraṃ yat satobṛhatī ''devo vo draviṇodā '' ity eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:3463: eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā bṛhatī yā punaḥpadā tad yat padaṃ punar ārabhate tasmāt putro mātaram adhyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3465: uṣṇīṣaṃ ca pratodaś ca jyāhṇoḍaś ca vipathaś ca phalakāstīrṇaḥ kṛṣṇaśaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇavalakṣe ajine rajato niṣkas tad gṛhapateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3466: (PB 17.1.15) valūkāntāni dāmatūṣāṇītareṣāṃ dve dve dāmanī dve dve upānahau dviṣaṃhitāny ajināni
GV02pncvbr1u:3467: (PB 17.1.16) etad vai vrātyadhanaṃ yasmā etad dadati tasminn eva mṛjānā yānti
GV02pncvbr1u:3469: trayastriṃśatā trayastriṃśatā gṛhapatim abhisamāyanti trayastriṃśad dhi devā ārdhnuvan ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3470: (PB 17.2.1) athaiṣa ṣaṭṣoḍaśī ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:3472: abhipūrveṇa vā ete pāpmanā gṛhītā ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat ṣaṭṣoḍaśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti tena pāpmāno 'dhi nirmucyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3473: (PB 17.2.3) yad ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśo madhyata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3475: uktho bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśavo nṛśaṃsam agryaṃ pariṇayanti paśubhir evainān agryaṃ pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3476: (PB 17.3.1) athaiṣa dviṣoḍaśo ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:3478: hīnā vā ete ahīyante ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti mukhaṃ vai trivṛt stomānāṃ mukhata evainān yajñasya pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3479: (PB 17.3.3) yad vai ṣoḍaśe stotre bhavatas tena pāpmano 'dhi nirmucyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3480: (PB 17.3.4) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3481: (PB 17.4.1) athaiṣa śamanīcāmeḍhrāṇāṃ stomo ye jyeṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:3482: (PB 17.4.2) agrād agraṃ rohanty ūrdhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3484_0: etena vai śamanīcāmeḍhrā ayajanta teṣāṃ kuṣītakaḥ sāmaśravaso gṛhapatir āsīt tān
GV02pncvbr1u:3484_1: luśākapiḥ khārgalir anuvyāharad avākīrṣata kanīyāṃsau stomāv upāgur iti tasmāt kauṣītakānāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3484_2: na kaś canātīva jihīte yajñāva kīrṇā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:3486: indro vai triśirasaṃ tvāṣṭram ahaṃs tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat so 'gnim upādhāvat sa etad agnistotram apaśyat tad ātmany adhividhāya tenainam ayājayat tenāsyāślīlāṃ vācam apāhan
GV02pncvbr1u:3487: (PB 17.5.2) apāślīlāṃ vācaṃ hate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3489: yo 'pūta iva syād agniṣṭutā yajetāgninaivāsya pāpmānam apahatya trivṛtā tejo brahmavarcasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3490: (PB 17.5.4) tad āhur yat trivṛd bhavaty ekasmād evāṅgāt pāpmānam apahanti mukhād eveti
GV02pncvbr1u:3493_0: yat trivṛd bhavati yad evāsya mukhato 'pūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat pañcadaśo yad evāsyorasto
GV02pncvbr1u:3493_1: bāhvor apūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat saptadaśo yad evāsya madhyato 'pūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3493_2: yad ekaviṃśo yad evāsya pador aṣṭhīvator apūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3495: vaiśvānaraṃ vā eṣa praviśatīty āhur yo 'gniṣṭutā yajata iti vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ tasya yad apūtaṃ tad agniḥ kṣāpayaty athetaraḥ śuciḥ pūta udeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3496: (PB 17.6.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomas tasya vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma
GV02pncvbr1u:3499: tejo vai trivṛd brahmavarcasaṃ yad vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma bhavaty upaivainaṃ tad dhamati
GV02pncvbr1u:3500: (PB 17.6.4) yathā hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭaped evam enam agniṣṭun niṣṭapati
GV02pncvbr1u:3501: (PB 17.7.1) etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3503_0: jaratkakṣo vā eṣa yo 'paśur yathā vai jaratkakṣe paśavo na ramanta evam etasmin paśavo
GV02pncvbr1u:3503_1: na ramante yo 'paśur yadā vai jaratkakṣam agnir dahaty athainam abhivarṣaty athāsminn
GV02pncvbr1u:3503_2: oṣadhayo jāyante 'tha vai tasmin paśavo ramante
GV02pncvbr1u:3506: yad evāsyāpaśavyaṃ tad agniṣṭun nirdahati yad agniṣṭun nirdahati tad adbhī revatībhiḥ śamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3510: agnir vā etasya havyam atti yo yajñe vibhraṃśate na devatā havyaṃ gamayaty agnim evaikadhardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3512_0: yad vai saṃśīryate 'thānyan niṣkurvanti tena tad yāti yadā vāva tan niṣkurvanty atha
GV02pncvbr1u:3512_1: tad yāti yeṣv eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau tair eva yajeta yeṣv eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3512_2: stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau teṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3514: (PB 17.9.2) annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'gnir annādyasya pradātāgnir evāsmā annādyaṃ prayacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:3516: (PB 17.9.4) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3519: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāman sa etad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanam apaśyat tenāsāṃ madhyaṃ vyavait tā enam upāvartanta pary enam āviśan
GV02pncvbr1u:3521: grāmakāmo yajeta yad etad aniktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavati madhyam evāsāṃ vyavaity upainam āvartante pary enaṃ viśanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3522: (PB 17.10.4) sa eṣa prajāpater apūrvo nāsmāt pūrvo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3525: tasya prātaḥsavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣv ekādaśadakṣiṇā vyādiśaty aśvadvādaśā madhyandine tā ubhayīr apākaroty ekādaśa tṛtīyasavane tā vaśāyām apākaroti
GV02pncvbr1u:3527: trayastriṃśad etā dakṣiṇā bhavanti trayastriṃśad devatā devatā evāpnoty aśvaś catustriṃśo dakṣiṇānāṃ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3529: sa eṣa bṛhaspatisavo bṛhaspatir akāmayata devānāṃ purodhāṃ gaccheyam iti sa etenāyajata sa devānāṃ purodhām agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:3531: (PB 17.11.6) sa eṣa sthapatisavo yaṃ sthāpatyāyābhiṣiñceran sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3534: kṛṣṇājine 'dhy abhiṣicyata etad vai pratyakṣaṃ brahmavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasa evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3535: (PB 17.11.9) ājyenābhiṣicyate teja ājyaṃ teja ātman dhatte
GV02pncvbr1u:3536: (PB 17.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ sa sarvasvāro yaḥ kāmayetānāmayatāmuṃ lokam iyām iti sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3537: (PB 17.12.2) prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evāsya bahir ṇirādadhāti tājak pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3539: trivṛd vai stomānāṃ kṣepiṣṭho yat trivṛd bhavaty āśīyaḥ saṃgacchātā ity ananto vai svaro 'nanto 'sau loko 'nantam evainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3540: (PB 17.12.4) abhivatyaḥ pravatyo bhavanty asmād evainaṃ lokāt svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3541: (PB 17.12.5) ārbhavapavamāne stūyamāna audumbaryā dakṣiṇā prāvṛto nipadyate tad eva saṃgacchate
GV02pncvbr1u:3543: sa eṣa śunaskarṇastoma etena vai śunaskarṇo bāṣkiho 'yajata tasmāc chunaskarṇastoma ity ākhyāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3549: (PB 17.13.6) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3550: (PB 17.13.7) tataś caturṣu māseṣu varuṇapraghāsānāṃ loke dvidivaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3553: (PB 17.13.10) maitrāvaruṇy anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśū niyuñjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3555: śataṃ dakṣiṇā ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3556: (PB 17.13.12) tataś caturṣu māseṣu sākamedhānāṃ loke trirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3558_0: anīkavatī pratipad āgneyaḥ paśur mārutī pratipad aindrāgnaḥ paśur vaiśvakarmaṇī pratipad
GV02pncvbr1u:3558_1: ekādaśinī paśavaḥ sauryānūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśūn
GV02pncvbr1u:3559: (PB 17.13.14) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3560: (PB 17.13.15) tataś caturṣu māseṣu śunāsīryasya loke jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3562: upavatī pratipad vāyavyaḥ paśur āśviny anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśuṃ niyuñjanti dvādaśaṃ śataṃ dakṣiṇā
GV02pncvbr1u:3564_0: agniḥ saṃvatsaraḥ sūryaḥ parivatsaraś candramā idāvatsaro vāyur anuvatsaro 'gniṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3564_1: saṃvatsaraṃ vaiśvadevenāpnoti sūryaṃ parivatsaraṃ varuṇapraghāsaiś candramasam idāvatsaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3566: haviryajñair vai devā imaṃ lokam abhyajayann antarikṣaṃ paśumadbhiḥ somair amum imān eva lokān āpnoty eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3568: yadāgnihotraṃ juhoty atha daśa gṛhamedhina āpnoty ekayā rātryā,
GV02pncvbr1u:3569: yadā daśa saṃvatsarān agnihotraṃ juhoty atha darśapūrṇamāsayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3570: yadā daśa saṃvatsarān darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajate 'thāgniṣṭomayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3571: yadā daśabhir agniṣṭomair yajate 'tha sahasrayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3573: yadā daśabhir ayutair yajate 'tha prayutayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3574: yadā daśabhiḥ prayutair yajate 'tha niyutayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3576: yadā daśabhir arbudair yajate 'tha nyarbudayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3577: yadā daśabhir nyarbudair yajate 'tha nikharvakayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3578: yadā daśabhir nikharvakair yajate 'tha badvayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3579: yadā daśabhir badvair yajate 'thākṣitayājinam āpnoti yadā daśabhir akṣitair yajate 'tha gaur bhavati,
GV02pncvbr1u:3580: yadā gaur bhavaty athāgnir bhavati yadāgnir bhavaty atha saṃvatsarasya gṛhapatim āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3582: yadā saṃvatsarasya gṛhapatir bhavaty atha vaiśvadevasya mātrām āpnoty ato vā itare parastarāṃ parastarām eva sarve
GV02pncvbr1u:3583: (PB 17.14.3) etān eva lokān āpnoty etān lokān jayati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3586: devāś ca vā asurāś ca prajāpater dvayāḥ putrā āsaṃs te 'surā bhūyāṃso balīyāṃsa āsan kanīyāṃso devās te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvan sa etam upahavyam apaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:3587: (PB 18.1.3) sa aikṣata yan niruktam āhariṣyāmy asurā me yajñaṃ haniṣyantīti so 'niruktam āharat
GV02pncvbr1u:3588: (PB 18.1.4) sa uttame stotre ''devo vo draviṇodā'' iti devān abhiparyāvartata
GV02pncvbr1u:3590: (PB 18.1.6) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3591: (PB 18.1.7) atho khalv āhuḥ ''yajñāyajñā vo agnaya'' ity eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:3592: (PB 18.1.8) agnir vai sarvā devatās tena na devatānāṃ kāṃ canāntar eti
GV02pncvbr1u:3594: indro yatīn sālāvṛkeyebhyaḥ prāyacchat tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat sa prajāpatim upādhāvat tasmā etam upahavyaṃ prāyacchat taṃ viśve devā upāhvayanta tasmād upahavyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3596: (PB 18.1.11) devatā vā etaṃ parivrajanti yam anṛtam abhiśaṃsanti devatā evāsyānnam ādayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3597: (PB 18.1.12) tasya pūtasya svaditasya manuṣyā annam adanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3600: mārutī bhavati marutau vai devānāṃ viśo viśam evāsmā anuniyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3603: (PB 18.1.17) vaiśvadevī bhavati viśve hy enaṃ devā upāhvayanta
GV02pncvbr1u:3609: (PB 18.1.23) brahmā vā ṛtvijām aniruktaḥ svenaivainaṃ tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3610: (PB 18.1.24) yāvad dha vai kumāre sadyo jāta eno nāsmiṃs tāvac ca naino bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3614: (PB 18.2.4) dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3616: (PB 18.2.6) devavrataṃ vai ghṛtaṃ devavratenaiva devatā apyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3617: (PB 18.2.7) uttareṇottareṇa kāṇḍenopaity uttara uttara eṣāṃ lokānāṃ jyāyān svargasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3618: (PB 18.2.8) bṛhatsāma bhavati bṛhatā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargam evetena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3619: (PB 18.2.9) ṛtam uktvā prasarpanty ṛtenaivainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3621: (PB 18.2.11) audumbaro bhavaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3625: dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavaḥ sa vai saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti

GV02pncvbr1u:3628_2: aṣṭau caturviṃśatimānāny aparāhṇe prathamāyām upasadi ṣoḍaśacaturviṃśatimānāni prātar
GV02pncvbr1u:3628_3: madhyamāyām upasadi dvātriṃśataṃ caturviṃśatimānāny aparāhṇe madhyamāyām upasadi
GV02pncvbr1u:3628_4: catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ caturviṃśatimānāni prātar uttamāyām upasady aṣṭāviṃśatiśataṃ caturviṃśatimānāny
GV02pncvbr1u:3628_5: aparāhṇa uttamāyām upasadi dve aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamāne agnīṣomīyasya paśor vapāyāṃ catvāry

GV02pncvbr1u:3628_9: nārāśaṃseṣu catuḥṣaṣṭim aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamānāny udayanīyāyām iṣṭāv aṣṭāviṃśatiśatam

GV02pncvbr1u:3648: (PB 18.5.4) chidra iva vā eṣa yaṃ somo 'tipavate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai

GV02pncvbr1u:3671: iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyāṃ vā eṣa na pratitiṣṭhati yo na pratitiṣṭhaty asyām evainaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati

GV02pncvbr1u:3686_0: yad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavaty anirukto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti yad
GV02pncvbr1u:3686_1: vājavan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ annaṃ vai vājo 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai yac citravat tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3688: viyonir vājapeya ity āhuḥ prājāpatyaḥ san niruktasāmeti yad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ tena sayoniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3690: (PB 18.6.11) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3693: (PB 18.6.14) abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati brahmaṇo vā eṣa ṛṣabha ṛṣabhatām evainaṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3695: yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi bhavati vāg anuṣṭup vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3698: udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3700: (PB 18.6.19) atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atiriktaḥ ṣoḍaśy atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3701: (PB 18.6.20) tad āhur jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyate yad udvaṃśīyād gaurīvitena stuvate svārāt svāreṇeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3704: (PB 18.6.23) apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yat ṣoḍaśī tenājāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:3705: (PB 18.6.24) yajñāraṇye saṃtiṣṭhata ity āhur aty ukthāny ety ati ṣoḍaśinaṃ na rātriṃ prāpnotīti
GV02pncvbr1u:3708: eṣā vai prajāpateḥ paśuṣṭhā tanūr yac chipiviṣṭaḥ prāṇo vai bṛhat prāṇa eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3709: (PB 18.6.27) bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhad amuṃ lokam āptum arhati tam evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3711: prajāpatir akāmayata vājam āpnuyāṃ svargaṃ lokam iti sa etaṃ vājapeyam apaśyad vājapeyo vā eṣa vājam evaitena svargaṃ lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3712: (PB 18.7.2) śukravatyo jyotiṣmatyaḥ prātaḥsavane bhavanti tejo brahmavarcasaṃ tābhir avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3713: (PB 18.7.3) vājavatyo mādhyandine bhavanti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3714: (PB 18.7.4) annavatyo gaṇavatyaḥ paśumatyas tṛtīyasavane bhavanti bhūmānaṃ tābhir avarunadhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3715: (PB 18.7.5) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3716: (PB 18.7.6) hiraṇyasraja ṛtvijo bhavanti mahasa eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3718: (PB 18.7.8) jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ jyotir evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3719: (PB 18.7.9) ājiṃ dhāvanti yajamānam ujjāpayanti svargam evainaṃ tal lokam ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3720: (PB 18.7.10) nākaṃ rohati svargam eva tal lokaṃ rohati
GV02pncvbr1u:3721: (PB 18.7.11) sarajase rohati manuṣyalokād evainam antar dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3723: vājināṃ sāma brahmā rathacakre 'bhigāyati vājo vai svargo lokaḥ svargam evainaṃ tal lokam ujjāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3725: viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu bṛhaduttamaṃ bhavati svargam eva tal lokaṃ rūḍhvā bradhnasya viṣṭapam abhyatikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:3727: agniṣṭomaṃ prathamam āharati yajñamukhaṃ vā agniṣṭomo yajñamukham evārabhya savamākramate
GV02pncvbr1u:3729: (PB 18.8.3) tasya dvātriṃśāḥ pavamānā dvātriṃśadakṣarā 'nuṣṭub vāg anuṣṭub yāvatī vāk tayaiva sūyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3730: (PB 18.8.4) saṃśara iva vā eṣa chandasāṃ yad viṣamā stomā ayathāpūrvam iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3731: (PB 18.8.5) yat samāḥ pavamānās tenāsaṃśaras tena yathāpūrvam
GV02pncvbr1u:3733: ātmanā vā agniṣṭomenardhnoty ātmanā puṇyo bhavaty atha yad ukthāni paśavo vā ukthāni viḍ ukthāni yad ukthāni bhavanty anusantatyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3735: ''vāyo śukro ayāmita'' iti vāyavyā pratipad bhavati vāg vai vāyur vācam evāsya yajñamukhe yunakti tayābhiṣicyate sarvasyā eva vācaḥ sūyate sarvā enaṃ vāco rājeti vadanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3737: saṃbhāryā bhavanti pṛṣṭhāny eva tābhir yunakti yan nānādevatyās tena yunakti vīryaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3738: (PB 18.8.9) yanti vā ete yajñamukhād ity āhur ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3739: (PB 18.8.10) yat ''pavasya vāco agriya'' iti tena yajñamukhān na yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3741: ''davidyutatyā rucā-'' iti chandasāṃ rūpaṃ chandāṃsy evāsya yajñamukhe yunakti tair abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3742: (PB 18.8.12) ''etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipa'' ity ādityā ādityā vā imāḥ prajās tāsām eva madhyataḥ sūyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3744: ''pavasvendo vṛṣā suta'' vṛṣaṇvatyo bhavanti triṣṭubho rūpaṃ vīryaṃ vai triṣṭup vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3746: ''utte śuṣmāsa īrata'' ity udvatyo bhavanty udvad vā anuṣṭubho rūpam ānuṣṭubho rājanyas tasmād udvatyo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3749: ''adha kṣapā pariṣkṛta'' ity anuṣṭup prathamānuṣṭub uttamā vāg vā anuṣṭub vācaiva prayanti vācam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3751: chinnam iva vā etad yad ekarcā yad etāvānuṣṭubhau tṛcāv abhito bhavato bahavaḥ puraetāro bhavanti bahavaḥ paścāpinaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3752: (PB 18.8.18) sauryānuṣṭub uttamā bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

GV02pncvbr1u:3756_0: yad bhārgavo hotā bhavati tenaiva tad indriyaṃ vīryam āptvāvarundhe yat śrāyantīyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3756_1: brahmasāma bhavati tenaiva tad indriyaṃ vīryam āptvārundhe yat puṣkarasrajaṃ pratimuñcate
GV02pncvbr1u:3759_0: daśa camasā daśa camasādhvaryavo daśa daśa camasam abhiyanty ā daśamāt puruṣād anvākhyāya

GV02pncvbr1u:3763: indro vṛtram ahaṃs tasyeyaṃ citrāṇy upaid rūpāṇy asau nakṣatrāṇām avakāśena puṇḍarīkaṃ jāyate yat puṣkarasrajaṃ pratimuñcate vṛtrasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kṣatraṃ pratimuñcate

GV02pncvbr1u:3766: (PB 18.9.8) srag udgātus saurya udgātā na vai tasmai vyaucchad atho vy evāsmai vāsayati

GV02pncvbr1u:3775: (PB 18.9.16) varāsī neṣṭur anulambeva hy eṣā hotrā
GV02pncvbr1u:3777: sthūri yavācitam acchāvākasya sthūrir iva hy eṣā hotrātho nirvaruṇatvāyaiva yavā na vai tarhi yad asyāṃ dakṣiṇā abhy abhavann atho asya ta eva tenābhīṣṭāḥ prītā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3780: (PB 18.9.20) vatsatary unnetuḥ sāṇḍas trivatso grāvastuto mithunatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3782_0: dvādaśa paṣṭhauhyo garbhiṇyo brahmaṇo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsara eva pratitiṣṭhaty
GV02pncvbr1u:3782_1: atha yad garbhiṇyo vāg vai dhenur mantro garbho vācy evāsya mantraṃ dadhāty āmantraṇīyo
GV02pncvbr1u:3782_2: bhavaty atha yad dhenubhavyā dvādaśa payāṃsi tāny evāsmin dadhāti tasmād āhuḥ payasvī rājā puṇya iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3783: (PB 18.10.1) yo vai savād eti nainaṃ sava upanamaty atha yaḥ sāmabhya eti pāpīyān suṣuvāṇo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3784: (PB 18.10.2) saṃbhāryā bhavanti pṛṣṭhāny eva tābhir yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:3786: (PB 18.10.4) yat saṃbhāryā bhavanti tad eva sāmabhyo naiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3788: yāni devarājñāṃ sāmāni tair amuṣmin loka ṛdhnoti yāni manuṣyarājñāṃ tair asminn ubhayor anayor lokayor ṛdhnoti devaloke ca manuṣyaloke ca
GV02pncvbr1u:3789: (PB 18.10.6) sāmatriṣṭubhy adhy abhiṣicyate vīryaṃ vai sāma triṣṭup vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3791: ekādaśa rājasāmāni bhavanty ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub ojo vīryaṃ triṣṭub ojasy eva vīrye 'dhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3793_0: yat trivṛtam abhiṣecanīye kuryur brahma kṣatrāyāpidadhyur yat trivṛtam uddharanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3793_1: brahma tat kṣatrād uddharanti tasmād bharatāṃ pratidaṇḍā brahmaṇā na hi te trivṛtam
GV02pncvbr1u:3795_0: ekaviṃśo 'bhiṣecanīyasyottamaḥ saptadaśo daśapeya ekaviṃśaḥ keśavapanīyasya prathamaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3795_1: kṣatraṃ vā ekaviṃśo viṭ saptadaśaḥ kṣatreṇaivāsmai viśam ubhayataḥ parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukāsmād viṭ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3797_0: yad vai rājasūyenābhiṣicyate tat svargaṃ lokam ārohati sa yad imaṃ lokaṃ nopāvarohed
GV02pncvbr1u:3797_1: ati janaṃ vā gacched ud vā mādyed yad eṣo 'rvācīnastomaḥ keśavapanīyo bhavaty asya
GV02pncvbr1u:3797_2: lokasyānuddhānāya yathā śākhāyāḥ śākhām ālambham upāvarohed evam etenemaṃ lokam upāvarohati pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3799_0: indro vṛtram ahan sa viṣyaṅvīryeṇa vyabhraṃśata sa etac chrāyantīyam apaśyat tenātmānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3799_1: samaśrīṇād indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate vṛtraṃ hi hanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3799_2: yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati punar evātmānaṃ saṃśrīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3801: yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi bhavati vācā vā eṣa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate vṛtraṃ hi hanti vāg anuṣṭub vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3803: vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīndriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate vṛtraṃ hi hanti yad vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīndriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3804: (PB 18.11.4) aśrayan vāva śrāyantīyenāvārayanta vāravantīyenendriyasya vā eṣā vīryasya parigṛhītiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3806: apratiṣṭhito vā eṣa yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate yadā vā etena dvirātreṇa yajate 'thaiva pratiṣṭhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3807: (PB 18.11.6) yāvanti saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇi tāvatya etāḥ stotrīyāḥ saṃvatsara eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3808: (PB 18.11.7) agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar atirātra uttaraṃ nānaivāhorātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3811_0: uddṛṣṭa] uttaraṃ nānaivārdhamāsayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati paurṇamāsyāṃ pūrvam ahar vyaṣṭakāyām
GV02pncvbr1u:3811_1: uttaraṃ nānaiva māsoḥ pratitiṣṭhati tad āhur ya eva samānapakṣe puṇyāhanī syātāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3813: apaśavyo dvirātra ity āhur dve hy ete chandasī gāyatraṃ ca traiṣṭubhaṃ ca jagatīm antaryantīti na tena jagatī kṛtā yat tṛtīyasavane kriyate

GV02pncvbr1u:3819: yo rājya āśaṃsamāno rājyaṃ na prāpnuyāt sa etena yajeta rājaivainaṃ rājānaṃ karoti taṃ tu vairājeti vadeyur yaṃ rājā rājānaṃ kuryād rājaivainaṃ rājānaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3820: (PB 19.1.3) chando 'nye yajñāḥ saṃpadyante stomam eṣa vīryaṃ vai stomo vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3822_0: aṣṭāv ekaviṃśāḥ saṃstuto bhavaty aṣṭau vai vīrā rāṣṭraṃ samudyacchanti rājabhrātā
GV02pncvbr1u:3822_1: ca rājaputraś ca purohitaś ca mahiṣī ca sūtaś ca grāmaṇī ca kṣattā ca saṃgrahītā
GV02pncvbr1u:3822_2: caite vai vīrā rāṣṭraṃ samudyacchanty eteṣv evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3823: (PB 19.1.5) kṣatraṃ vā ekaviṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhā kṣatrasyevāsya prakāśo bhavati pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3825: (PB 19.2.2) parokṣam anye yajñā virājaṃ saṃpadyante pratyakṣam eṣa virājaṃ saṃpannaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3826: (PB 19.2.3) pratyakṣam etenānnādyam avarundhe 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3827: (PB 19.2.4) sarvo daśadaśī bhavati daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3828: (PB 19.2.5) tā u pañca pañca bhavanti pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktā paśavo yajña eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3830: etenaiva pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta daśabhir vā idaṃ puruṣaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'syām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3833_0: gandharvāpsarasāṃ stomaḥ prajākāmo yajeta gandharvāpsaraso vai manuṣyasya prajāyā
GV02pncvbr1u:3833_1: vāprajastāyā veśate teṣām atra somapīthas tān svena bhāgadheyena prīṇāti te 'smai
GV02pncvbr1u:3835: (PB 19.3.4) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhati puruṣo vai kakub garbha eva sa madhyato dhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3836: (PB 19.3.5) atha yad eṣā dvipadā kakubho loke kriyate garbha eva tad dhi taṃ prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3838: (PB 19.3.7) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3840: vasiṣṭhasya janitre bhavato vasiṣṭho vā ete putrahataḥ sāmanī apaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad ete sāmanī bhavataḥ prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3842: dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyete dve striyā ūne prajananāya prajananam eva tat kriyate prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3844: (PB 19.4.2) yo bahu pratigṛhya garagīr iva manyeta sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3846: yaikādaśī yad eva pūrvavayase bahu pratigṛhṇāti yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti prātaḥsavanāya tan niharati
GV02pncvbr1u:3848: atha yā dvādaśī yad evottaravayase bahu pratigṛhṇati yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti tṛtīyasavanāya tan niharati
GV02pncvbr1u:3849: (PB 19.4.5) vairājo vai puruṣaḥ sa madhyato 'śuddho madhyata evainaṃ pāpmano muñcati
GV02pncvbr1u:3852: indro yatīn sālāvṛkeyebhyaḥ prāyacchat tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat so 'śuddho 'manyata sa ete śuddhāśuddhīye apaśyat tābhyām aśudhyat
GV02pncvbr1u:3854: yad eva bahu pratigṛhṇāti yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti yad aśuddho manyate tad etābhyāṃ śudhyati
GV02pncvbr1u:3857: gauṣūktiś cāśvasūktiś ca bahu pratigṛhya garagirāv amanyetāṃ tāv ete sāmanī apaśyatāṃ tābhyāṃ garaṃ niraghnātām
GV02pncvbr1u:3858: (PB 19.4.11) yad eva bahu pratigṛhṇāti yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti tad etābhyāṃ nirhate
GV02pncvbr1u:3860: pañcadaśa stotrāṇi bhavanty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśaḥ pāpmana evainaṃ muktvaujasā vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3863: (PB 19.5.3) yac catasṛbhir bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3864: (PB 19.5.4) yad aṣṭābhir ājyāny aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3866: yat dvādaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāno dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tān evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3867: (PB 19.5.6) yat ṣoḍaśāni pṛṣṭhāni ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3868: (PB 19.5.7) yad viṃśa ārbhavaḥ pāṅktatvam eṣāṃ tad āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3870: yac caturviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaś caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3871: (PB 19.5.9) prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3872: (PB 19.5.10) ekaṃ sāma bahūni chandāṃsi tasmād eko bahūn poṣān puṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:3874: ātmā vā agniṣṭomaḥ paśavaś chandāṃsy ātmany eva tat paśūn pratiṣṭhāpayati noktho nāgniṣṭomo na hi grāmyāḥ paśavo nāraṇyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3876: atha yasya catvāri stotrāṇi catasṛbhiś catvāry aṣṭābhiś catvāri dvādaśabhiś catvāri ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sa gāṃ nātivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:3877: (PB 19.6.2) ṣoḍaśakalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn [KSS & BI: praśūn] āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3879: ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśimān bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni vajraḥ ṣoḍaśī vajreṇaivāsmai paśūn parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukā asmāt paśavo bhavanti noktho nātirātro na hi grāmyāḥ paśavo nāraṇyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3881_0: asurāṇāṃ vai balas tamasā prāvṛto 'śmāpidhānaś cāsīt tasmin gavyaṃ vasv antar āsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:3881_1: taṃ devā nāśaknuvan bhettuṃ te bṛhaspatim abruvann imān na utsṛjeti sa udbhidaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:3881_2: balaṃ vyacyāvayad balabhidābhinat tān utsedhenaivodasṛjan niṣedhena paryagṛhṇāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3883: (PB 19.7.3) yad udbhidā yajeta balam evasmai vicyāvayati yad balabhidā balam evāsmai bhinatti
GV02pncvbr1u:3885: utsedhaniṣedhau brahmasāmanī bhavata utsedhenaivāsmai paśūn utsidhya niṣedhena parigṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3886: (PB 19.7.5) ''yajña indram avardhayad'' iti brahmaṇa ājyaṃ rūpeṇa samṛddham
GV02pncvbr1u:3888_0: saptisaptadaśau bhavato yat saptabhiḥ stuvanti sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evāvarūndhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3888_1: saptapadā śakvarī paśavaḥ śakvarī paśūn evāvarūndhe 'tha yat saptadaśabhiḥ prajāpatir
GV02pncvbr1u:3890: gāyatrīṃ saṃpadyate tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3893: tasya caturviṃśau pavamānau caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī tejasaivāsmai brahmavarcasenāpacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3894: (PB 19.8.3) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavata ubhābhyām evāsmai bṛhadrathantarābhyām apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3895: (PB 19.8.4) bhargayaśasī bhavato bhargeṇaivāsmai bhargo dadhāti yaśasā yaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3896: (PB 19.8.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś cobhayair evāsmai stomair apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3897: (PB 19.8.6) tad āhur vilomāna stomā īśvarā yajamānaṃ vikṣetor vi hy atiyantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:3898: (PB 19.8.7) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3899: (PB 19.9.1) athaiṣa sarvastomo 'pacitir apacitikāmo yajeta sarvair evāsmai stomair apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3900: (PB 19.9.2) virājaṃ saṃpadyata eṣa vā apacito yo 'nnādo 'nnaṃ virāḍ annādyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3902: ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavato bhargayaśasī bhavata ubhaye stomāś chandomāś ca pṛṣṭhyāś cobhayair evāsmai stomair apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3904: tasya chandomāḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśavo vai chandomā annaṃ pṛṣṭhāny abhipūrvam evāsminn annādyaṃ paśūn dadhāti yac chandomavāṃs tena dvādaśāhayājinam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3906: tad āhur nānālokāḥ stomāś chandomāś ca pṛṣṭhyāś ca yad ekasmin yajñakratau samavarudhyanta īśvaro [corr. Caland;
GV02pncvbr1u:3908: (PB 19.9.6) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhām eva tad abhyāyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3912: na vā apakṣaḥ pakṣiṇam āpnoty atha yad eṣa pakṣy apakṣiṇi nidhīyate tasmāt pakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaiḥ patanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3913: (PB 19.10.4) pakṣī jyotiṣmān puṇyān lokān saṃcarati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3914: (PB 19.10.5) trivṛtāv abhito bhavatas tejo brahmavarcasaṃ trivṛt teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3915: (PB 19.10.6) atha pañcadaśau vīryaṃ vai pañcadaśo vīryam evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3916: (PB 19.10.7) atha saptadaśau paśavo vai saptadaśaḥ paśūn evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3917: (PB 19.10.8) athaikaviṃśau pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo madhyata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3918: (PB 19.10.9) atha triṇavāv ime vai lokās triṇava eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3920: (PB 19.10.11) varṣma svānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3922: eṣa vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapo yad etau trayastriṃśau madhyataḥ saṃdhīyete tena bradhnasya viṣṭapam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:3923: (PB 19.10.13) madhyato vā agnir variṣṭhas tasmād ete stomā madhyato variṣṭhāḥ kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3924: (PB 19.10.14) trivṛtā praiti trivṛtodeti prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇenaiva praiti prāṇam abhyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3927: tasya trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni caturviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3929: (PB 19.11.4) mukhaṃ gāyatry annaṃ vai saptadaśo mukhata eva tad annaṃ dhatte
GV02pncvbr1u:3930: (PB 19.11.5) annam atty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3932_0: mādhyandinena vai pavamānena devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan yad eṣa caturviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3932_1: pavamāno bhavati svargasya lokasyākrāntyai caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3932_2: gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3933: (PB 19.11.7) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3934: (PB 19.11.8) pakṣi vā etac chandaḥ pakṣī jyotiṣmān puṇyān lokān saṃcarati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3935: (PB 19.11.9) madhyato vā agnir variṣṭhas tasmād ete stomā madhyato variṣṭhāḥ kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3936: (PB 19.11.10) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyata ekākinam evainam annādyasyādhyakṣaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3937: (PB 19.11.11) jyotir vā eṣo 'gniṣṭomo jyotiṣmantaṃ puṇyaṃ lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ vidvān etena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:3939: (PB 19.12.2) ṛṣabho vā eṣa stomānām ṛṣabhatāṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3940: (PB 19.12.3) rājanyaṃ yājayed ṛṣabho vai paśūnām adhipatī rājanyo manuṣyāṇām
GV02pncvbr1u:3942: (PB 19.12.5) adhipatiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3944: tasya sadoviśīyaṃ mādhyandine pavamāne bhavati viśam evāsmai savanābhyāṃ parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3945: (PB 19.12.7) samantaṃ bhavati samantām evāsmai viśaṃ karoty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3947: ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavata iyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ dyaur bṛhadevāsmāl lokād gāyatry evāmuṣmād ubhayor anayor lokayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3949: anuṣṭubhi bṛhad bhavaty anto vā anuṣṭup chandasām anto bṛhat sāmnām anto rājanyo manuṣyāṇām anta eva tad antaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmād yo rājanyānāṃ hīyate na sa punaragraṃ paryeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3951: yo vai vājapeyaḥ sa rājasūyo yo rājasūyaḥ sa varūṇasavo 'thaiṣa gosavaḥ svārājyo vā eṣa yajñaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3955: (PB 19.13.5) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavatas tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3956: (PB 19.13.6) ayutaṃ dakṣiṇās tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3957: (PB 19.13.7) pratiduhābhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3958: (PB 19.13.8) bṛhataḥ stotra pratyabhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3962: athaiṣa marutstoma etena vai maruto 'parimitāṃ puṣṭim apuṣyann aparimitāṃ puṣṭiṃ puṣyati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3963: (PB 19.14.2) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomās tena marutstomo gaṇaśo hi marutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3965: (PB 19.14.4) yat trīṇi trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3971: athaiṣa indrāgnyoḥ kulāyaḥ prajākāmo vā paśukāmo vā yajeta prajā vai kulāyaṃ paśavaḥ kulāyaṃ gṛhāḥ kulāyaṃ kulāyam eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3974_0: yat ṣaṭ trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhato yat dve pañcadaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:3974_1: nānā vīrye yat dve saptadaśe nānā paśuṣu yat dve ekaviṃśe nānā pratitiṣṭhataḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3976: (PB 19.16.2) etena vā indro 'ty anyā devatā abhavad aty anyāḥ prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3978: (PB 19.16.4) sarvaḥ pañcadaśo bhavaty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa ojasaivainaṃ vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3981: ukthyo bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni viḍ ukthāni viśam evāsmai paśūn anuniyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3983: pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśāni bhavanty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśo 'bhipūrvam evāsminn ojo vīryaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3985: athaiṣa indrāgnyoḥ stoma etena vā indrāgnī aty anyā devatā abhavatām aty anyāḥ prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3988: brahma vai trivṛt kṣatraṃ pañcadaśo brahmaṇa iva cāsya kṣatrasyeva ca prakāśo bhavati ya evaṃ veda

GV02pncvbr1u:4008: trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni pañcadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśa ārbhava ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthyaḥ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4010: jyotiṣṭomenātirātreṇarddhikāmo yajetābhikramo vā eṣa stomānām abhikrāntyā abhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti

GV02pncvbr1u:4019_0: trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4019_1: pṛṣṭhāni triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:4023_0: yat trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati tat trivṛtaṃ stomam āpnoti gāyatrīṃ chando yat

GV02pncvbr1u:4023_3: ekaviṃśaṃ stomam āpnoty anuṣṭubhaṃ chando yat triṇava ārbhavas tat triṇavaṃ stomam

GV02pncvbr1u:4025_0: prāñcaṃ vai trayastriṃśo yajñaṃ prabhujati tam adhvaryur ekādaśinyā purastāt pratyudyacchaty

GV02pncvbr1u:4027: tayā samudyatayā rātryā yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ tam abhyaśnute yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ tam abhyaśnute ya evaṃ veda

GV02pncvbr1u:4029_2: ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamam athaikaviṃśam atha saptadaśam ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī

GV02pncvbr1u:4031_0: prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān agniṣṭomena nāpnot tān ukthair
GV02pncvbr1u:4031_1: nāpnot tān ṣoḍaśinā nāpnot tān rātryā nāpnot tān sandhinā nāpnot tān āśvinena nāpnot
GV02pncvbr1u:4031_2: tān agnim abravīd imān ma īpseti tān agnis trivṛtā stomena jarābodhīyena sāmnā nāpnot
GV02pncvbr1u:4031_3: tān indram abravīd imān ma īpseti tān indraḥ pañcadaśena stomena sattrāsāhīyena sāmnā
GV02pncvbr1u:4031_4: nāpnot tān viśvān devān abravīd imān ma ipsateti tān viśve devāḥ saptadaśena stomena
GV02pncvbr1u:4031_5: mārgīṃyaveṇa sāmnā nāpnuvaṃs tān viṣṇum abravīd imān ma īpseti tān viṣṇur ekaviṃśena
GV02pncvbr1u:4031_6: stomenāpnod vāravantīyenāvārayatedaṃ viṣṇur vicakrama iti vyakramata
GV02pncvbr1u:4032: (PB 20.3.3) yasmāt pra preva paśavo bhraṃśeran sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4034: etena vai devā jaitvāni jitvā yaṃ yaṃ kāmam akāmayanta taṃ tam āpnuvan yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4037: trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ navasaptadaśāni stotrāṇy ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaḥ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4039: navasaptadaśenātirātreṇa prajākāmo yajeta nava vai prāṇāḥ prajāpatiḥ saptadaśaḥ prāṇebhya eva tad adhi prajāpateḥ prajāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4040: (PB 20.4.3) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhati puruṣo vai kakup garbho vā eṣa madhyato dhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4043: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā na prājāyanta sa etat sāmāpaśyat tā aśvo bhūtvābhyajighrat tāḥ prājāyanta prajananaṃ vā etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:4044: (PB 20.4.6) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4045: (PB 20.4.7) dvipadāṃ kakubho loke karoti garbham eva taddhitaṃ madhyataḥ prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:4047: atirātro bhavaty ahorātre vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante 'horātre evānu prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4049_0: trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni pañcadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4049_1: pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśa ārbhava ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśāny ukthāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4051_0: viṣuvatātirātreṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ jyaiṣṭhineyaṃ yājayed viṣuvān vā eṣa stomānāṃ viṣuvān
GV02pncvbr1u:4051_1: eva bhavati yad eka ekaviṃśo bhavaty ekaviṃśo vā ito 'sāv āditya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā

GV02pncvbr1u:4053: (PB 20.5.4) eṣa vā udeti na vā enam anyat jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ pratyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:4054: (PB 20.5.5) nainam anyaḥ sveṣu pratyudeti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4056_0: pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trivṛnty ājyāni saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4056_1: tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir goṣṭomenātirātreṇa bhrātṛvyavān
GV02pncvbr1u:4056_2: yajeta gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudanta rātryānapajayyam ajayann ebhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:4058_0: trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4058_1: tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir āyuṣṭomenātirātreṇa svargakāmo
GV02pncvbr1u:4058_2: yajetordhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya yad atirātro bhavaty ahorātrābhyām eva svargaṃ lokam eti
GV02pncvbr1u:4060_0: trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ saptadaśaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya pañcadaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4060_1: brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ saptadaśam acchāvākasyaikaviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:4060_3: triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:4060_5: yajetābhijitā vai devā asurān imān lokān abhyajayat rātryānapajayyam ajayann abhijitaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:4060_6: bhrātṛvyam imān lokān abhijitya rātryānapajayyaṃ jayati

GV02pncvbr1u:4062_1: brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ pañcadaśam acchāvākasya saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4064_0: saptadaśaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsina ekaviṃśam acchāvākasya triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:4064_1: 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:4064_2: rātriḥ trivṛt sandhir viśvajitātirātreṇa paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4066_0: reto hi nābhānediṣṭhīyaṃ paśavo vālakhilyā yan nābhānediṣṭhīyaṃ pūrvaṃ śasyata uttarā
GV02pncvbr1u:4066_1: vālakhilyā retasas tat paśavaḥ prajāyante rūpāṇi vikaroti yad vārṣākapam ṛtuṣu pratitiṣṭhati yad evayāmarut
GV02pncvbr1u:4068_0: trivṛt ātirātreṇa brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta tejo vai trivṛt brahmavarcasaṃ teja eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4068_1: brahmavarcasam avarundhe tejasi brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhati pañcadaśenātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:4068_2: vīryakāmo yajetaujo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa oja eva vīryam avarundha ojasi vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4068_3: saptadaśenātirācreṇānnādyakāmo yajetānnaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnādyam evāvarundha ekaviṃśenātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:4068_4: pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo yad atirātro bhavaty ahorātrayor eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4071_0: tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna
GV02pncvbr1u:4071_1: ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4071_2: triṇavaṃ prathamam athaikaviṃśam atha saptadaśam ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4073_0: aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ haviṣmāṃś ca haviṣkṛc cāṅgirasāv ahīyetā tāv
GV02pncvbr1u:4073_1: āgacchetāṃ yato 'ṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tāv atapyetāṃ tāv ete sāmanī apaśyatāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4073_2: tābhyāṃ dvirātram atanvātāṃ tena svargaṃ lokam aitām
GV02pncvbr1u:4074: (PB 20.11.4) yaḥ pauṇyo hīna iva syāt sa etena yajetāpnoti pūrveṣāṃ prahām āpnutāṃ hi tāv aṅgirasaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4075: (PB 20.11.5) prajākāmo yajeta dvitīyaṃ hy etad yat prajāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4077: svargakāmo yajeta dvitīyād dhi lokāt paro loko 'bhiprakramyo durādho dvirātra ity āhur yad agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavaty ukthyam antaryanti yady ukthyo 'gniṣṭomam
GV02pncvbr1u:4078: (PB 20.11.7) yaj jyotir ukthyaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavati nāgniṣṭomam antaryanti nokthāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4080: tad āhur eṣā vāva yajñasya mātrā yad agniṣṭomo yad agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavati yajñasya mātrāṃ nātikrāmaty athottarasyāhna ukthebhyo 'dhi rātrim upayanti tenokthāny anantaritāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4082: caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavaty uttarasyāhnaś caturviṃśaty akṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4083: (PB 20.11.10) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate

GV02pncvbr1u:4086: (PB 20.12.1) atha yasya jyotir ukthyaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavaty āyur atirātra uttaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4088: tisraḥ pūrvasyāhno virājam atiricyante dvābhyām uttaram ahar virāja ūnam ūnātiriktaṃ vā anuprajāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4089: (PB 20.12.3) pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4090: (PB 20.12.4) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyate ekākinam evainam annādyasyādhyakṣaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4092: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayaṃs tam ekākinam annādyasyādhyakṣam akurvaṃs tasmāc caitrarathīnām ekaḥ kṣatrapatir jāyate 'nulamba iva dvitīyaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:4095_1: vā ete sākaṃvṛtī yat trivṛt pañcadaśau stomau yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenābhyaśnute

GV02pncvbr1u:4096: (PB 20.13.3) atha yad āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:4097: (PB 20.13.4) etena vai kapivano bhauvāyana iṣṭvārūkṣatām agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4098: (PB 20.13.5) arūkṣo bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān etena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:4100_0: trivṛt prātaḥsavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4100_1: prātaḥsavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ soktham ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4100_2: prātaḥsavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśa ārbhavaś catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭoma
GV02pncvbr1u:4100_3: ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni ṣoḍaśaṃ prathamaṃ rātriṣāma pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4102_0: prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt tasya vāg eva svam āsīd vāg dvitīyā sa aikṣatemām eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4102_1: vācaṃ visṛjā iyaṃ vā idaṃ sarvaṃ vibhavanty eṣyatīti sa vācaṃ vyasṛjata sedaṃ sarvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4102_2: vibhavanty ait sordhvodātanod yathāpāṃ dhārā santataivaṃ tasyā eti tṛtīyam acchinat
GV02pncvbr1u:4102_3: tad bhūmir abhavad abhūd iva vā idam iti tad bhūmer bhūmitvaṃ keti tṛtīyam acchinat
GV02pncvbr1u:4102_4: tad antarikṣam abhavad antar eva vā idam iti tad antarikṣasyāntarikṣatvaṃ ho iti
GV02pncvbr1u:4102_5: tṛtīyam ūrdhvam udāsyat tat dyaur abhavad adyutad iva vā iti tad divo divatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:4104: eṣā vāva pratyakṣaṃ vāg yaj jihvāgreṇaitad vāco vadati yad eti madhyenaitad vāco vadati yat keti sarvayaitad vāco raso 'dhyūrdhva udvad ati yaddho iti
GV02pncvbr1u:4106: yad etāni rūpāṇy anvahaṃ vyajyante mukhata eva tad vācaṃ visṛjante mukhato yajñiyaṃ karma

GV02pncvbr1u:4401: (PB 22.6.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4403_0: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho 'tha trayastriṃśām ahas tasya catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4403_1: mahāvratam atirātras tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trivṛc chiraḥ pañcadaśau pakṣau
GV02pncvbr1u:4404: (PB 22.7.2) etena vai jamadagniḥ sarvān poṣān apuṣyat sarvān evaitena poṣān puṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:4405: (PB 22.7.3) yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastād bhavati santatyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4406: (PB 22.7.4) athaitat trayastriṃśam ahas trayastriṃśad devatā devatā evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4407: (PB 22.7.5) tasya catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4409: caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati mahāvratasya caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4410: (PB 22.7.7) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4412_0: yat trivṛc chiro bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati yat pañcadaśau pakṣau
GV02pncvbr1u:4412_1: savīvadhatvāya saptadaśa ātmā bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoty
GV02pncvbr1u:4414: jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaur ukthya āyur ukthyo 'bhijid agniṣṭomo viśvajid agniṣṭomaḥ sarvajid agniṣṭomaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4415: (PB 22.8.2) etena vā indro 'ty ānyā devatā abhavad aty anyā prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4417: yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ purastād bhavati prajñātān stomānupaitīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4419: athābhijid abhijitā vai devā imān lokān abhyajayan viśvajitā viśvam ajayan sarvajitā sarvam ajayan
GV02pncvbr1u:4421: sarvastomātirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:4422: (PB 22.9.1) catvāri trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhāni viśvajin mahāvrataṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4423: (PB 22.9.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ purūṣam asṛjata sa sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyam agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4426: śiro vā agre sambhavataḥ sambhavati caturdhā vihitaṃ vai śiraḥ prāṇaś cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgātmā vai pṛṣṭhāni yat pṛṣṭhāny upaiti śira evātmānam anusandadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:4427: (PB 22.9.5) etad vai purūṣam akas tasmā annam eva vratam apidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:4428: (PB 22.9.6) atha yat jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātro bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4431_0: anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tat sattreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ yajño na
GV02pncvbr1u:4431_1: tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattraṃ sattram iva vā etad yad anulomaṃ pṛṣṭhāni yadaikadhā
GV02pncvbr1u:4431_2: pṛṣṭhāni bhavaty ekadhaivāsmiṃs tejo vīryaṃ dadhāty annaṃ pṛṣṭhāny annādyam evāsmin
GV02pncvbr1u:4431_3: dadhāti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4433: yad vai manuṣyāṇāṃ pratyakṣaṃ taddevānāṃ parokṣamatha yanma manuṣyāṇāṃ parokṣaṃ taddevānāṃ pratyakṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:4434: (PB 22.10.4) etad vai parokṣaṃ vrataṃ yad viśvajit pratyakṣam evaitenānnādyam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:4438: (PB 22.11.4) etad vai vratam āptaṃ yad aṣṭarātre 'gniṣṭomo hi vrataṃ sampadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4439: (PB 22.11.5) atha yat jyotiṣṭhomo 'tirātro bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4443: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho jyotir gaur āyur atirātro devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etena navarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4444: (PB 22.12.2) etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4445: (PB 22.12.3) sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4446: (PB 22.12.4) navarātro vā eṣa nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4448: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati pratyakṣam ṛddhayā atha yat jyotir gaur āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:4450: jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭhomo gaur ukthya āyur ukthyo 'bhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho viśvajid atirātraḥ paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4452: yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ purastād bhavati prajñātān stomānupaitīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4454: atha yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho madhyato bhavati pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4457_0: trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyas trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśa
GV02pncvbr1u:4457_1: ukthyaḥ saptadaśo 'gniṣṭomas triṇavo 'gniṣṭomas trayastriṃśa ukthyas triṇavo 'gniṣṭomo viśvajid atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4459: indro 'surān hatvākāryaṃ cakṛvāṃ amanyata taṃ devā etena stomenāyājayan sa pāpmano nairdaśyam agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4460: (PB 22.14.3) tasmād iṣuhato vā daṇḍahato vā daśamīṃ nairdaśyaṃ gacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:4461: (PB 22.14.4) daśa daśinī vā eṣā virāḍ annaṃ virāḍ annādyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:4463: agniṣṭomena vai devā asurān nigṛhya madhyata ukthaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyantāgniṣṭomenaiva bhrātṛvyaṃ nigṛhya madhyata ukthyaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4465: (PB 22.14.7) trikakup samānānāṃ ca prajānāṃ ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4467: trayastrivṛto 'gniṣṭomās trayaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyās trayaḥ saptadaśa ukthyā ekaviṃśo 'tirātraḥ kusuruvindadaśarātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4468: (PB 22.15.2) yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4469: (PB 22.15.3) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomo bahur eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4470: (PB 22.15.4) saha trivṛta saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4473: (PB 22.15.7) jyotiṣ prajānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4474: (PB 22.15.8) catuṣṭomo vā eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4475: (PB 22.15.9) ekaviṃśaṃ stomā nātiyanti pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśaḥ praty eva tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4476: (PB 22.15.10) etena vai kusurūvinda auddālakir iṣṭvā bhūmānam āśnuta
GV02pncvbr1u:4478: (PB 22.16.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaś catvāraś chandomaḥ viśvajid atirātraḥ paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4480: yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastād bhavati pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4481: (PB 22.16.3) chandomā madhyato bhavanti paśavo vai chandomāḥ paśūnām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4484: triṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo jyotir ukthyas triṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaurukthyo 'bhijid agniṣṭomo gaur ukthyo viśvajid agniṣṭoma āyur ukthyo viśvajid agniṣṭomasya sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4486: devā vā asurair hanyamānās te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etāṃ devapuraṃ prāyacchat tāṃ prāviśan
GV02pncvbr1u:4487: (PB 22.17.3) abhicāryamāṇaṃ yājayed etām eva devapuraṃ praviśaty asṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4488: (PB 22.18.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayaś chandomāś catuṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo viśvajid atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4494: ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavatas tad dhi svārājyam ayutaṃ dakṣiṇās tad dhi svārājyaṃ ṣaḍviṃśastomo bhavati sa hi svārājyaṃ catuṣṭomastomaḥ sa hy anto 'nte śriyā gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4495: (PB 22.18.7) etena vai kṣema dhṛtvā pauṇḍarīkaṃ iṣṭvā sudāmnas tīra uttare
GV02pncvbr1u:4496: (PB 22.18.8) sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvāmṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4497: (PB 23.1.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraś catvāraś chandomā atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4498: (PB 23.1.2) eṣa vā āpto dvādaśāho yat trayodaśarātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4500: samāno hy eṣa yat prayaṇīyaś codayanīyaś cātirātrau kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etābhir abhyaśnuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:4502: gṛhapates tu vāg upadāsukā bhavati tad yan madhye sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati tena gṛhapater vāg anupadāsukā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4504: etā vā aryalagṛhapataya ārūṇihotāraḥ subhagāsūpayanti te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4505: (PB 23.2.1) atirātro dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4506: (PB 23.2.2) vāg vā eṣā pratāyate yad eṣa dvādaśāhas tāṃ vicchindyur yan madhye 'tirātraṃ kuryuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4507: (PB 23.2.3) yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti na vācaṃ vicchindanty āpnuvanti trayodaśaṃ māsam
GV02pncvbr1u:4508: (PB 23.2.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitās trayodaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4509: (PB 23.3.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4511: (PB 23.3.3) virāḍh ḍhi daśātmaikādaśī prajā dvādaśī paśavas trayodaśī kāmāya caturdaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:4514: etā vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapo yad etau trayastriṃśau madhyataḥ saṃdhīyete tena bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ rohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4515: (PB 23.3.6) dviḥ pṛṣṭhāny upayanty abhipūrvam evaitābhir annādyaṃ dadhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4516: (PB 23.4.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ pṛṣṭhya ṣaḍaha āyur gaur jyotir atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4517: (PB 23.4.2) yāṃs talpe vodake vā vivāhe vā mīmāṃseraṃs ta etā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4518: (PB 23.4.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajñātāṃ stomān upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4519: (PB 23.4.4) imān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhānti
GV02pncvbr1u:4521: atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho madhyato bhavaty eṣu vāva devatalpo devatalpam eva tad ārohanti talpyā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4523: (PB 23.4.7) atha yad āyur gaur jyotir atirātro yeneto yanti tena punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4524: (PB 23.5.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4525: (PB 23.5.2) yad gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī bhavato mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4526: (PB 23.5.3) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4527: (PB 23.5.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāś caturdaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4528: (PB 23.6.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho mahāvrataṃ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4529: (PB 23.6.2) etābhir vai devā devatvam agacchan devatvaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4530: (PB 23.6.3) etad vai devānāṃ sattraṃ tad adyāpi devāḥ sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:4532: paurṇamāsy atirātro 'tha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaha ekāṣṭakā mahāvratam atha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho 'māvāsyātirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4534: tasmāt tarhi manuṣyāṇāṃ na suto devānāṃ hi tarhi sutaḥ pratyakṣam evaitābhir devatā abhyārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4535: (PB 23.6.6) pratinodāt tu bhayyam itaram anupakṣo dīkṣerann apratinodāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4537: atirātras trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaha āyur gaur jyotir atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4540: (PB 23.7.4) yat trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo bhavati brahma tad yaśasārdhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:4543_0: yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajñātān stomān upayantīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:4543_1: pratitiṣṭhanty atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho madhyato bhavaty annaṃ vai pṛṣṭāny annam
GV02pncvbr1u:4543_2: eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoty atha yad āyur gaur jyotir
GV02pncvbr1u:4543_3: atirātro yeneto yanti tena punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4544: (PB 23.8.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4546: anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tat sattreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:4547: (PB 23.8.3) yad anyato 'tirātrās tena yajño 'tha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni tena sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:4549: (PB 23.9.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ prajākāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4550: (PB 23.9.2) etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyante ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4552: yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajātān stomān upayantīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4553: (PB 23.9.4) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4554: (PB 23.9.5) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ pañcadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4556: (PB 23.10.2) etābhir vā indraḥ paramāṃ vijitiṃ vyajayata paramām evaitābhir vijitiṃ vijayante
GV02pncvbr1u:4558: pañcadaśo vai vajro na vā agṛhītena vajreṇa vīryaṃ karoti yā ṣoḍaśy ārambhaṇam eva tad gṛhītena vajreṇa vīryaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4559: (PB 23.11.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyur gaur āyuḥ pañcāho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4560: (PB 23.11.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir anantāṃ śriyam ajayad anantā vā etā yat pañcāhavidhāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4562: (PB 23.11.4) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4563: (PB 23.11.5) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ saptadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4566: devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etenāṣṭādaśarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4567: (PB 23.12.3) etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4568: (PB 23.12.4) sarvam āyur yanti vasīyāṃso bhavanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4569: (PB 23.12.5) dvir vā etā nava nava prāṇā abhipūrvam evaitābhir āyur dadhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4571: (PB 23.13.2) etābhir vai vāyur āraṇyānāṃ paśunām ādhipatyaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4573: (PB 23.13.4) etābhir vā āraṇyāḥ paśavo nākṛtāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4574: (PB 23.13.5) anākṛtam eṣāṃ prajāyate ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4576: atrirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'bhijic ca viśvajic ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4577: (PB 23.14.2) purūṣakāmā upeyur etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ purūṣam asṛjata
GV02pncvbr1u:4579: sa sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyam agacchat sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4581: (PB 23.14.5) viṃśo vai purūṣo daśa hi hastyā aṅgulyo daśa pādyāḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:4827_8: 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ prathamam ahar atha catuścatvāriṃśaṃ catvāriṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ dvātriṃśaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:4873_0: māsaṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti te māsi somaṃ krīṇanti teṣāṃ dvādaśopasada upasadbhiś caritvā

GV02pncvbr1u:4879_0: yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ sa potā ya udgātā sa neṣṭā so 'cchāvāko yo maitrāvaruṇaḥ sa

GV02pncvbr1u:4880: (PB 25.5.1) saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti saṃvatsaraṃ prasuto bhavati
