GV02pncvbr1u:4891: (PB 25.6.4) etena vai naimiśīyāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4893: te ha saptadaśebhya evādhyuttasthus ta u hocur yo naḥ prajāyām ṛdhyātai sa etat sattraṃ samāpayād iti tad etat samīpsanto brāhmaṇās sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:4895: nava trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā nava pañcadaśā nava saptadaśā navaikaviṃśāḥ śāktyānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4897: etena vai gaurīvitiḥ śāktas tarasapuroḍāśo yavyāvatyāṃ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4899: bṛhatī vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ svārājyaṃ chandasāṃ bṛhatī pra svārājyam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4900: (PB 25.7.4) tad etac chāktyānāṃ daśavīram eṣāṃ daśa vīrā jāyante ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4902: pañcaviṃśatis trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pañcadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ saptadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatir ekaviṃśāḥ sādhyānāṃ śatasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4904_0: sādhyā vai nāma devebhyo devāḥ pūrva āsaṃs ta etat sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs tenārdhnuvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:4904_1: te sagavaḥ sapuruṣāḥ sarva eva saha svargaṃ lokam āyann evaṃ vāva te saha svargaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4906: āyur vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ śatāyuḥ puruṣo yāvad evāyus tad avarundhate na hy atyāyuṣaṃ sattram asti
GV02pncvbr1u:4908: tad abhyanūktā tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty ūṣā (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:4912: ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4914: (PB 25.9.2) etena vā agniḥ savasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4915: (PB 25.9.3) agner vai sarvam ādyaṃ sarvam eṣām ādyaṃ bhavati ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4917: atha yat sahasrasāvyaṃ bhavati sahasrākṣarā vai paramā virāṭ paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4921: yad ahar atirātro bhavati tad ahar vatsān apākurvanti saṃsthite 'tirātre sānnāyyena yajante
GV02pncvbr1u:4923: sānnāyyeneṣṭvādhvaryuḥ śamyāṃ parāsyati sā yatra nipatati tad gārhapatyas tataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ prakramān prakramati tad āhavanīyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4925: cakrīvat sadaś cakrīvad dhavirdhānaṃ cakrīvad āgnīdhram ulūkhalabudhno yūpaḥ prakṛṣya upopta eva noparavān khananti
GV02pncvbr1u:4927: (PB 25.10.7) teṣāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ goṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo bṛhatsāmā
GV02pncvbr1u:4929: saṃsthite goṣṭome paurṇamāsaṃ nirvapante te tam apakṣīyamāṇaṃ paurṇamāsena yanti teṣām amāvāsyāyām āyuṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo rathantarasāmā
GV02pncvbr1u:4932_0: etena vai mitrāvaruṇāv imān lokān ājayatām ahorātrau vai mitrāvaruṇāv ahar mitro
GV02pncvbr1u:4932_1: rātrir varuṇo 'rdhamāsau vai mitrāvaruṇau ya āpūryate sa mitro yo 'pakṣīyate sa varuṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4932_2: sa eṣa mitro varuṇe retaḥ siñcati
GV02pncvbr1u:4934_0: sarasvatyā vai devā ādityam astabhnuvan sā nāyacchat sābhyavlīyata tasmāt sā kubjimatīva
GV02pncvbr1u:4934_1: taṃ bṛhatyāstabhnuvan sāyacchat tasmād bṛhatī chandasāṃ vīryavattamādityaṃ hi tayāstabhnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:4935: (PB 25.10.12) pratīpaṃ yanti na hy anvīpam aṣṭa vai pūrveṇa pakṣasā yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4940: catuścatvāriṃśad āśvīnāni sarasvatyā vinaśanāt plakṣaḥ prāsravaṇas tāvad itaḥ svargo lokaḥ sarasvatīsammitenādhvanā svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4942: etena vai namī sāpyo vaideho rājāñjasā svargaṃ lokam aid añjasāgāmeti tad añjaskīyānām añjaskīyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:4944: sa etad avabhṛtham abhyavaid ya eṣa uttareṇa sthūlārmaṃ hradas tad dhāsya śataṃ gāvaḥ sahasraṃ sampeduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4945: (PB 25.10.19) śate goṣv ṛṣabham apy ṛjanti(?) tā yadā sahasraṃ sampadyante 'thotthānam
GV02pncvbr1u:4946: (PB 25.10.20) yadā sarvajyāniṃ jīyante 'thotthānaṃ yadā gṛhapatir mriyate 'thotthānam
GV02pncvbr1u:4949: plakṣaṃ prāsravaṇam āgamyāgnaye kāmāyeṣṭiṃ nirvapante tasyām aśvāṃ ca puruṣīṃ ca dhenuke datvā
GV02pncvbr1u:4951: (PB 25.11.1) atirātras trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4952: (PB 25.11.2) etena vā indrāgnī atyanyā devatā abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4953: (PB 25.11.3) indrāgnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhā ojiṣṭhā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4954: (PB 25.11.4) atha yat trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4955: (PB 25.12.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4957: (PB 25.12.3) yad āhur aryamṇaḥ panthā ity eṣa vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4958: (PB 25.12.4) pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4959: (PB 25.12.5) tasmād eṣo 'ruṇatama iva diva upadadṛśe 'ruṇatama iva hi panthāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4960: (PB 25.12.6) atha yat jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4962: saṃvatsaraṃ brāhmaṇasya gā rakṣet saṃvatsaraṃ vyarṇe naitandhave 'gnim indhīta saṃvatsare parīṇahy agnīn ādadhīta
GV02pncvbr1u:4963: (PB 25.13.2) sa dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyā āgneyenāṣṭākapālena śamyāparāsīyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:4965_0: indraś ca ruśamā cāṃśaṃ prāsyetāṃ yataro nau pūrvo bhūmiṃ paryeti sa jayatīti bhūmim
GV02pncvbr1u:4965_1: indraḥ paryait kurukṣetraṃ ruśamā so 'bravīd ajaiṣaṃ tv ety aham eva tvām ajaiṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:4965_2: itīndro 'bravīt tau deveṣv apṛcchetāṃ te devā abruvann etāvatī vāva prajāpater vedir
GV02pncvbr1u:4965_3: yāvat kurukṣetram iti tau na vyajayetām
GV02pncvbr1u:4967: sa ya āgneyenāṣṭākapālena dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyāḥ śamyāparāsyeti triplakṣān prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavaiti tad eva manuṣyebhyas tiro bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4970: adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yad adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yo mānuṣy ṛddhis tāṃ tenardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4971: (PB 25.14.3) atha yat tapas tapyate yā daivī tāṃ tena
GV02pncvbr1u:4973_0: yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavaty agnimukhā vai devatā mukhata eva tad devatā ṛdhnoty
GV02pncvbr1u:4973_1: atho prātassavanam eva tenāpnoty atha yad aindra ekādaśakapālo bhavaty aindraṃ vai
GV02pncvbr1u:4973_2: mādhyandinaṃ savaṇaṃ mādhyandinam eva savanaṃ tenāpnoty atha yad vaiśvadevaś carur
GV02pncvbr1u:4973_3: bhavati vaiśvadevaṃ vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanam eva tenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4974: (PB 25.14.5) etena vai puro devamuniḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya etad upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:4976: atirātrāv abhito 'gniṣṭomā madhye sarvo daśadaśī saṃvatsaro dvādaśo viṣuvān sarpasāmāni viṣuvati kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4977: (PB 25.15.2) etena vai sarpā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhann eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4979_0: jarvaro gṛhapatiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato brahmā pṛthuśvarā daureśravasa udgātā glāvaś
GV02pncvbr1u:4979_1: cājagāvaś ca prastotṛpratihartārau dattastāpaso hotā śitipṛṣṭho maitrāvaruṇaḥ takṣako
GV02pncvbr1u:4979_2: vaiśāleyo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī śikhānuśikhau neṣṭāpotārau aruṇa āṭocchāvākaḥ timirgho
GV02pncvbr1u:4979_3: daureśruto 'gnīt kautastāv adhvaryū arimejayaś ca janamejayaś cārbudo grāvas tu dajiraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4981_0: etena vai sarpā apamṛtyum ajayann apamṛtyuṃ jayanti ya etad upayanti tasmāt te hitvā
GV02pncvbr1u:4981_1: jīrṇāṃ tvacam atisarpanty apa hi te mṛtyum ajayan sarpā vā ādityā ādityānām ivaiṣāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4984_0: etena vai gāvaḥ prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchan prajāyante bahavo bhavanti ya etad upayanty
GV02pncvbr1u:4984_1: etena vā ādityā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad upayanty etena vā
GV02pncvbr1u:4984_2: aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4986_0: para āhṇāras trasadasyuḥ paurukutso vītahavyaḥ śrāyasaḥ kakṣīvān auśijas ta etat
GV02pncvbr1u:4986_1: prajātikāmāḥ sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān apuṣyann evaṃ vāva te
GV02pncvbr1u:4986_2: sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān puṣyanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4987: (PB 25.17.1) atirātraḥ sahasraṃ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā atirātraḥ prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4989: etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4990: (PB 25.17.3) etad vai prajāpatir jīryā mūra upait tena jarām apāhatāpa jarāṃ ghnate ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4992: tad etat prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4994: pañca pañcāśatas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ pañcadaśā pañca pañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ pañca pañcāśata ekaviṃśā viśvasṛjāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4995: (PB 25.18.2) etena vai viśvasṛja idaṃ viśvam asṛjanta yad viśvam asṛjanta tasmāt viśvasṛjaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4996: (PB 25.18.3) viśvam enān anu prajāyate ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4998_0: tapo gṛhapatir brahma brahmerā patny amṛtam udgātā bhūtaṃ prastotā bhaviṣyat pratihartartava
GV02pncvbr1u:4998_1: upagātāra ārtavāḥ sadasyāḥ satyaṃ hotartaṃ maitrāvaruṇa ojo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī tviṣiś
GV02pncvbr1u:4998_2: cāpacitiś ca neṣṭāpotārau yaśo 'cchāvāko 'gnir evāgnīd bhago grāvastud ūrg unnetā
GV02pncvbr1u:4998_3: vāk subrahmaṇyaḥ prāṇo 'dhvaryur apānaḥ pratiprasthātā diṣṭir viśāstā balaṃ dhruvagopam
GV02pncvbr1u:4998_4: āśā haviṣyeṣy ahorātrāv idhmavāhau mṛtyuḥ śamitaite dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:5000: tad eṣa śloko viśvasṛjaḥ prathame sattram āsata sahasrasamaṃ prasutena yantas te ha yajñe bhuvanasya gopā hiraṇmayaḥ śakuno brahmanām eti
GV02pncvbr1u:5002_0: brahmaṇaḥ salokatāṃ sārṣṭitāṃ sāyujyaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti tad etad viśvasṛjāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:5002_1: sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai viśvasṛjaḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
